children.name: Izne Dukhul common to all Ziyarats

text.html:
(Stand in front of the forecourt and recite the Izne Dukhul) :

اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي وَقَفْتُ عَلَى بَابٍ مِنْ أَبْوَابِ بُيُوتِ نَبِيِّكَ صَلَوَاتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ وَ قَدْ مَنَعْتَ النَّاسَ أَنْ يَدْخُلُوا إِلا بِإِذْنِهِ فَقُلْتَ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لا تَدْخُلُوا بُيُوتَ النَّبِيِّ إِلا أَنْ يُؤْذَنَ لَكُمْ اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْتَقِدُ حُرْمَةَ صَاحِبِ هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ الشَّرِيفِ فِي غَيْبَتِهِ كَمَا أَعْتَقِدُهَا فِي حَضْرَتِهِ وَ أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ رَسُولَكَ وَ خُلَفَاءَكَ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ أَحْيَاءٌ عِنْدَكَ يُرْزَقُونَ يَرَوْنَ مَقَامِي وَ يَسْمَعُونَ كَلامِي وَ يَرُدُّونَ سَلامِي وَ أَنَّكَ حَجَبْتَ عَنْ سَمْعِي كَلامَهُمْ وَ فَتَحْتَ بَابَ فَهْمِي بِلَذِيذِ مُنَاجَاتِهِمْ وَ إِنِّي أَسْتَأْذِنُكَ يَا رَبِّ أَوَّلا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ رَسُولَكَ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ ثَانِيا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ خَلِيفَتَكَ الْإِمَامَ الْمَفْرُوضَ عَلَيَّ طَاعَتُهُ

(say the name of the imam you are visiting)

وَ الْمَلائِكَةَ الْمُوَكَّلِينَ بِهَذِهِ الْبُقْعَةِ الْمُبَارَكَةِ ثَالِثا أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا حُجَّةَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا مَلائِكَةَ اللَّهِ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ الْمُقِيمِينَ فِي هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ فَأْذَنْ لِي يَا مَوْلايَ فِي الدُّخُولِ أَفْضَلَ مَا أَذِنْتَ لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ أَوْلِيَائِكَ فَإِنْ لَمْ أَكُنْ أَهْلا لِذَلِكَ فَأَنْتَ أَهْلٌ لِذَلِكَ

O Allah, I am standing at the door of one of the houses of Your Prophet; Your peace be upon him and his family. You have prohibited the people from entering his house except by the permission of Your Prophet and You said: “O You who believe do not enter the house of the Prophet unless permitted to do so”. O Allah, I believe in this in his absence just as I believe it in his presence and I know that Your Prophet and Your vicegerents upon whom be peace, are Alive in Your presence, they are being nourished, they see my position and hear my speech and they return my greetings and (I believe) that You have covered my ears from hearing their speech and have opened the door of perception of their secret conversations (with You); I seek Your permission first, O’ my Lord; then I seek the permission of Your Prophet_ peace be upon him and his family_ secondly, and I seek the permission of Your vicegerent, Imam Hussain Bin Ali (a) whose obedience is incumbent upon me and (the permission of) Your angels entrusted over this blessed site thirdly. May I enter, O Prophet of Allah, may I enter O the proof of Allah, may I enter, O angels of Allah who are stationed close to this shrine, so permit me O my master to enter the best of way that You have permitted any of Your friends, if I am not deserving of that then You surely are deserving of that.

Allahhumma innee wa qafto alla babinn min abwabe boyute nabiyyeka salawaatoka a’layhe wa alehi, wa qad mana’ta ann-nasa ann yad kholu illa be idhnehi faqulta yaa ayyohal ladhina aamanu laa tad kholu boyutan-nabiyeenn illa ann yu dha na lakum, allahhumma inni aa’ataqedo hurmata sahebe hadha al mash-hade ash-shareefe, fee ghaybatehi kamaa aa’ataqedoha fee hazratehi,wa aa’alamo anna rasoolaka wa kholafaoka alayhome assalaamo ahhyao indaka yurzaqoona,yarawna maqaamee wa yasmaoona kalamee wa yarudduna salamee,wa annaka hajabta ann sam’ee kalamahum wa fatahhta baba fahmi be ladide munajatehim,wa inni astadhenoka yaa rabbe awwalan,wa astadenu rasoolaka sallallaaho a’layhe wa aalehi thaneyan, wa asstadheno khalayafataka al-imamal mafruza alaiyya ta aatohu al-hussaynabna Aliyan alayhissalamo,wal malaaa-ekata al-mowakkalina behadhehi al-buq’aatil mobarakate thalethan, aa adkhulu yaa rasoolallahe, aa adkhulu yaa hujjatallaahe, aa adkhulu yaa malaaa-ekatallahe al-moqarrabina al-muqimeena fee hadha al mash-hade,fa dann lee yaa maulaee feedd-dokhule,afdhala maa adinta laa hadinn min awleyaaa-eka, fa inn lam akun ahlann ledaleka fa anta ahlun le dhaleka.

children.name: Ziyarat to the children of Imams (A)

text.html:
Sayyed 'Alî Ibn Ta'us (may God be pleased with him) reported in Misbah az-Za'ir two ziyarat with whom one visits the children of the Imam (A).

The first ziyarat to the children of Imams

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها السَّيّدُ الزَّكِيُّ الطَّاهِرُ الْوَلِيُّ وَالدَّاعِي الْحَفِيُّ ، أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ قُلْتَ حَقَّاً وَنَطَقْتَ حَقّاً وَصِدْقاً وَدَعَوْتَ إِلَى مَوْلايَ وَمَوْلاكَ عَلانِيَةً وَسِرّاً ، فازَ مُتَّبِعُكَ وَنَجا مُصَدّقُكَ وَخابَ وَخَسِرَ مُكَذّبُكَ وَالْمُتَخَلِّفُ عَنْكَ ، إشْهَدْ لِي بِهذِهِ الشَّهَادَةِ لأِكُونَ مِنَ الْفائِزِينَ بِمَعْرِفَتِكَ وَطاعَتِكَ وَتَصْدِيقِكَ وَاتّباعِكَ ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا سَيّدِي وَابْنَ سَيّدِي
أَنْتَ بابُ اللَّهِ الْمُؤْتَى وَالْمَأْخُوذُ عَنْهُ
أَتَيْتُكَ زائِراً وَحاجاتِي لَكَ مُسْتَوْدِعاً وَها أَنَا ذا أَسْتَوْدِعُكَ دِينِي وَأَمانَتِي وَخَواتِيمَ عَمَلِي وَجَوامِعَ أَمَلِي إِلَى مُنْتَهَى أَجَلِي
وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ

Assalamo alayka ayyohas sayyeduz zakiyut taheerul waliyyo wad da’eeyil hafeeyo, ash'hado annak qul'taa haqqan wa nataq'taa haqqan wa sidqan wa da’aw'taa ela mawlaya wa mawlak aala niyatan wa sirra, faaz muttabeok wa naja mosaddeqok wa khab wa khaser mokadhebok wal motakhallefo ankaa, ish'had lee be hadeheesh shahadate le akun menal faizeen be marefatek wa taa'tek wa tas'deeqek wat'tabayek was salamo alayka ya sayyidi wab'na sayyidi antaa babul'llahil mowta wal makhuzoo an'hu. Atay'tok zaeran wa hajatee lak mus'taw dean waha aana zaa astawdi‘ook deeni wa amanatee wa khawateema aamalee wa jawameaa aamali elaa munta'haa aajali, was salamo alyek wa rahmtullahe waba rakatooh.

Peace be upon you, O the noble, pure, purified, beloved and a prudent preacher. I bear witness that verily you told aright and spoke truth and invited to my and your lord publicly and secretly. Successful is one who obeyed you, survived who testified you while disappointed and lost who disapproved and opposed you. Be the witness of my acknowledgment of you, my compliance, ratification and obedience of you. Peace be upon you, O my lord and son of my lord. You are the door from where (benefit) is provided and taken. I have come to you for pilgrimage and ask you for my needs. Fulfil my needs of religion, duty, (better) costs of my deeds and (fulfil) all my hopes before my death. Peace, mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you.

The second ziyârat to the children of Imams

السَّلامُ عَلَى جَدّكَ الْمُصْطَفَى
السَّلامُ عَلَى أَبِيكَ الْمُرْتَضَى الرّضا
السَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ
السَّلامُ عَلَى خَدِيجَةَ أُمّ سَيّدَةِ نِساءِ الْعالَمِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَى فاطِمَةَ أُمّ الأَئِمَّةِ الطَّاهِرِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ بُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزَّاخِرَةِ شُفَعائِي فِي الآخِرَةِ وَأَوْلِيائِي عِنْدَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ إِلَى الْعِظامِ النَّاخِرَةِ أَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقّ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها الشَّخْصُ الشَّرِيفُ الطَّاهِرُ الْكَرِيمُ
أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ
وَأَنَّ عَلِيّاً وَلِيُّهُ وَمُجْتَبَاهُ وَأَنَّ الإْمامَةَ فِي وُلْدِهِ إِلَى يَوْمِ الدّينِ
نَعْلَمُ ذلِكَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ وَنَحْنُ لِذلِكَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفِي نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ .

Assalamo aala jaddekal mus'tafa, assalamo aala abeekal murtadhaa ridha, assalamo aala sayyedani'l hasane wal Hussain, assalamo aala khadijat umma sayyedatin nisaiil aa’lamin, assalamo aala fatemata ummil ayimmati't twahereen, assalamo aala nufuseel fakherate bihureel uluum zakherate shofaa'ii feel aakherate wa awlayi inda aawdee ruhe elal edhami nakherate aimmatil khalqee wa wolateel haqqe, assalamo alayka ayyoh'sh shakhso shareefu taherul kareemo, ash'hado an la elaha illallahoo wa an mohammadan abdohu wa mus'tafahu wa anna aliyen wa waliyyohu wa mujtabahoo wa annal imamata fee wul'dehi ela yawmid deen, na’alamo dhaleka ilmal yaqeen wa nahno le dhaleka mu’taqeduna wa fee nas'rehim mujtahedun.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, peace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace be upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of creatures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

Ziyarat to the daughters of Imams (A)

السَّلامُ اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ جَدِّكِ الْمُصْطَفى‏، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى اَبيكِ الْمُرْتَضَى الرِّضا، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيِّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ خَديجَةَ اُمِّ سَيِّدَةِ نِساءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ فاطِمَةَ اُمِّ الْائِمَّةِ الطاهِرينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ، وَبُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزَّاخِرَةِ، وَشُفَعائى فِى الْآخِرَةِ، وَاَوْلِيائى عِندَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ الَى الْعِظامِ الناخِرَةِ، اَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقِّ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكِ اَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الشَّريفَةُ الطاهِرَةُ الْكَريمَةُ، اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا الهَ الَّا اللَّهُ، وَاَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ، وَاَنَّ عَليّاً وَليُّهُ وَمُجْتَباهُ، وَاَنَّ الْاِمامَةَ فى وُلْدِهِ الى‏ يَوْمِ الدينِ، نَعْلَمُ ذلِكَ عِلْمَ اْليَقينِ، وَنَحْنُ لِذلِكَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفى نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ.

Assalaamo alaa jaddekil mustafaa, assalaamo alaa abeekil murtadhee ar redhaa, assalaamo alaa as-sayyedaynil hasane wal husayne, assalaamo alaa khadijata umme sayyedate nesaail aalamina, assalaamo alaa faatemata ummil a-immatit taaherina, assalaamo alaa an-nofusil faakherate, wa johuril olumiz zaakherate, wa shofa’aaee feel aakherate, wa awliyaaee inda awdir roohe alal edhaame an-naakherate, a-immatil khalqe wa wulaatil haqqin, assalaamo a’layke ayyatohan nafso ash-shareefato at-taaheratul kareemato, ash-hado an laa elaaha illallaaho, wa anna muhammadan abdohu wa mustafaao, wa anna alayyan waliyyohu wa mujtabaao, wa annal imaamata fee wuldehi alaa yawmiddine, na’a-lamo dhaaleka ilmal yaqeene, wa nahno le dhaaleka mu’ataqeduna wafee nasrehim mujtaheduna.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, peace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace be upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of creatures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat (Leadership of Ummah) is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

Tip :For Ziyarat in Tehran, it is advisable to do it preferably on a Friday because it is a day of rest in Iran. Indeed, there will be less traffic and it will facilitate your movements. During working days, you could lose valuable time because of traffic jams in the capital.

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امام خمینی (ره) تهران در کنار گلزار شهداء بهشت زهرا (ع) بنا شده است .

Near Ayatollah Khomeini is buried his son Ahmed, his wife Khadija, his son-in-law Mahmoud Burujardi and Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani who served as president of Iran in the past.

Imam Khomeini was born on September 24, 1902 to a very godly family in the city of Khomeyn. He had an eventful and difficult youth, like the death of his father, Sayed Mustapha Mousavi, at the age of 6 months. It was therefore his mother and his paternal aunt who ensured his education. At 15, he found himself alone losing these two dear ones.

He began his studies in his hometown and then continued his studies in Iraq. He studied gnosis, philosophy and Islamic jurisprudence (fiqh). And finally, he studied in Iran in the holy city of Qum. He has become one of the most eminent scholars in these fields. It should also be noted that he had the rank of ijtihad and was the author of nearly thirty books in different areas of Islamic science.

Imam Khomeini is also largely known for his political life and involvement in Iranian society. Indeed, in 1963, Ayatollah Khomeini was recognized as one of the main opponents of the Shah regime. He was at the origin of the 1979 Islamic revolution that overthrew Shah Mohammed Reza Pahlavi. Khomeini established an Islamic republic, which he ruled until his death as supreme leader. The Imam died on June 4, 1989 in Tehran. He is buried near the Beheshte Zahra cemetery 25km from Tehran. It should be emphasized that Imam Khomeini is a descendant of Imam al-Kadhim (A).47

47: Sahife Nour, vol 1, page 56
Sahife Imam, vol 4, page 479

children.name: 2) Imamzadeh (children of Imams) buried in Tehran

text.html:
It should be noted that many descendants of imams are buried in Tehran. Unfortunately, since their graves are a bit far from our path, all are not mentioned in the book.

In Tehran, there are 330 Imamzadeh. The most known and visited are :

a) Imamzadeh Shâh Abdoul Azim

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه شاه عبد العظیم . شهر ری میدان نماز . خیابان کمیل . میدان داری شهر . خیابان مدرس . میدان مدرس

At this place, there are different buried personalities among which :
• Shâh Abdoul Azim
• Hamza
• Tahir

The shrine of Shâh Abdoul Azim is located in Rey, south of Tehran. It is one of the most visited sanctuaries. Shâh Abdoul Azim was a descendant of Imam al-Hassan (A). He fled from his homeland to flee political persecution and began to travel through the cities as a messenger. After his arrival in Rey, he decided to live there hidden.

This illustrious man was a great scholar and was one of the companions of the 9th and 10th Imam and he transmitted many hadiths of these two imams.

He was born during the year 173 AH in Medina. He lived 79 years. He was lucky enough to know 4 imams : 7th to 10th imam. Imamzadeh Shah Abdul Azim visited Imam Ali al-Hadi (A) so much that the enemies of Ahl al-Bayt (A) had suspicions about him and decided to imprison him, but Imamzadeh Shah Abdul Azim escaped his pursuers and went through several cities until arriving at the city of Rey. He took refuge in the house of à supporter of Ahl-al-Bayt in Rey.

He went out very little and lived in hiding. Very few people knew him. His close followers came secretly to visit him. As time went by, visits became more intense and more and more people came to see him and benefit from his knowledge. He was the vakil of Imam Ali al-Hadi (A). The last years of his life, he was sick and he died of a natural death on the 15th Shawwal of the year 252 AH.48

It is said among the benefits of this Imamzadeh's visit that paradise will be obligatory to him.49

A story tells that one day a man from Rey, returning from Karbala, passed through the city of Samarra to Imam Ali al-Hadi (A). The imam asked him where he came from. He replied that he had just visited Imam Hussein (A). Imam Ali al-Hadi (A) replied that if he had gone to visit the shrine of Imamzadeh Shah Abdul Azim, he would have had the same reward as he had when he visited Imam Hussein (A).50

Ziyarat of Shâh Abdoul Azim (a)

السَّلامُ عَلَى ادَمَ صِفْوَةِ اللَّهِ ،
السَّلامُ عَلَى عِيسى رُوحِ اللَّهِ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا خَيْرَ خَلْقِ اللَّهِ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا صَفِيَّ اللَّهِ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا مُحَمَّدَ بْنَ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ خَاتَمَ النَّبِيِّينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا أَمِيرَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ عَلِيَّ بْنَ أَبِي طالِبٍ وَصِيَّ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكِ يا فاطِمَةُ سَيّدَةَ نِساءِ الْعالَمِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكُما يا سِبْطَيِ الرَّحْمَةِ وَسَيّدَيْ شَبابِ أَهْلِ الْجَنَّةِ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا عَلِيَّ بْنَ الْحُسَيْنِ سَيّدَ الْعابِدِينَ وَقُرَّةَ عَيْنِ النَّاظِرِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا مُحَمَّدَ بْنَ عَلِيّ باقِرَ الْعِلْمِ بَعْدَ النَّبِيّ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا جَعْفَرَ بْنَ مُحَمَّدٍ الصَّادِقَ الْبارَّ الأَمِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا مُوسَى بْنَ جَعْفَرٍ الطَّاهِرَ الطُّهْرَ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا عَلِيَّ بْنَ مُوسَى الرّضَا الْمُرْتَضَى
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا مُحَمَّدَ بْنَ عَلِيّ التَّقِيَّ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا عَلِيَّ بْنَ مُحَمَّدٍ النَّقِيَّ النَّاصِحَ الأَمِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا حَسَنَ بْنَ عَلِيّ
السَّلامُ عَلَى الْوَصِيّ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ
اللَّهُمَّ صَلّ عَلَى نُورِكَ وَسِراجِكَ وَوَلِيّ وَلِيّكَ وَوَصِيّ وَصِيّكَ وَحُجَّتِكَ عَلَى خَلْقِكَ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها السَّيّدُ الزَّكِيُّ وَالطَّاهِرُ الصَّفِيُّ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يابْنَ السَّادَةِ الأَطْهارِ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يابْنَ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الأَخْيارِ
السَّلامُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ وَعَلَى ذُرِّيَّةِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ
السَّلامُ عَلَى الْعَبْدِ الصَّالِحِ الْمُطِيعِ لِلَّهِ رَبّ الْعالَمِينَ وَلِرَسُولِهِ وَلأَمِيرِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا أَبَا الْقاسِمُ ابْنَ السِبْطِ الْمُنْتَجَبِ الْمُجْتَبَى
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا مَنْ بِزِيارَتِهِ ثَوابُ زِيارَةِ سَيّدِ الشُّهَداءِ يُرْتَجَى السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ
عَرَّفَ اللَّهُ بَيْنَنا وَبَيْنَكُمْ فِي الْجَنَّةِ وَحَشَرَنا فِي زُمْرَتِكُمْ
وَأَوْرَدَنا حَوْضَ نَبِيّكُمْ وَسَقانا بِكَأْسِ جَدّكُمْ مِنْ يَدِ عَلِيّ بْنِ أَبِي طالِبٍ صَلَواتُ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ
أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ أَنْ يُرِيَنا فِيكُمْ السُّرُورَ وَالْفَرَجَ
وَأَنْ يَجْمَعَنا وَإِيَّاكُمْ فِي زُمْرَةِ جَدّكُمْ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ وَأَنْ لا يَسْلُبَنا مَعْرِفَتَكُمْ إِنَّهُ وَلِيٌّ قَدِيرٌ
أَتَقَرَّبُ إِلَى اللَّهِ بِحُبّكُمْ وَالْبَراءَةِ مِنْ أَعْدائِكُمْ وَالتَّسْلِيمِ إِلَى اللَّهِ رَاضِياً بِهِ غَيْرَ مُنْكِرٍ وَلا مُسْتَكْبِرٍ وَعَلَى يَقِينِ ما أَتَى بِهِ مُحَمَّدٌ
نَطْلُبُ بِذلِكَ وَجْهَكَ يا سَيّدِي اللَّهُمَّ وَرِضاكَ وَالدَّارَ الآخِرَةَ
يا سَيّدِي وَابْنَ سَيّدِي اشْفَعْ لِي فِي الْجَنَّةِ فَإِنَّ لَكَ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ شَأْناً مِنَ الشَّأْنِ
اللَّهُمَّ إِنّي أَسْأَلُكَ أَنْ تَخْتِمَ لِي بِالسَّعادَةِ فَلا تَسْلُبَ مِنّي ما أَنَا فِيهِ وَلا حَوْلَ وَلا قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللَّهِ الْعَلِيّ الْعَظِيمِ
اللَّهُمَّ اسْتَجِبْ لَنا وَتَقَبَّلْهُ بِكَرَمِكَ وَعِزَّتِكَ وَبِرَحْمَتِكَ وَعافيَتِكَ
وَصَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَالِهِ أَجْمَعِينَ وَسَلَّمَ تَسْلِيماً يا أَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِينَ .

Assalamo a’laa Aadama Saf ‘watillah, Assalamo a’laa E’Esaa Roohillah, assalamo alayka ya Rasoolallah, assalamo alayka ya khaira khalqillah, assalamo alayka ya swafi Allah, assalamo alayka ya Mohammad ibn Abdillahe khataman nabiyyin, assalamo alayka ya Ameeral momenin Ali ibne abi talebin wasi e rasoolillah, assalamo alaykae ya Fatematoo sayyedat nesaiil aalamin, assalamo alaykaomaa ya sibtayir rahmate wa sayyadee shababe ahlil jannah, assalamo alayka ya Ali yabnal Hussain sayyedal aabedin wa qurrat aynin nadherin, assalamo alayka ya Mohammad'bana Aliyin Baqarl ila'mee badan nabee, assalamo alayka ya Jafarab'naa Mohammadis' swadeqal barrel amen, assalamo alayka ya Musa'bnaa Jafar taherat' tuhar, assalamo alayka ya Ali ibne Musar redhal murtadha, assalamo alayka ya Mohammad'bana Ali't taqee, assalamo alayka ya Ali ibne Mohammad naqeean naseeh amen, assalamo alayka ya Hasan'bnaa Ali, assalamo alal wasiye min bade'hee, allahumma salle aala noorek wa serajek wa waliyye waliyek wa wasiyye wasiyek wa hujjetek aala khalqek, assalamo alayka ya ayyohas sayyeduz zakeeo wat taheroos safeeyo, assalamo alayka yab'nas sadatil' athar, assalamo alayka yab'nal mustafayna'l akhyar, assalamo aala rasoolillahe wa aala dhurriyatehi rasoolillahe warah'matullahe waba rakatooh, assalamo alal abdee's saleh al motiyeel'llahee rabbil aalamin wale rasulehee wale ameeril momenin, assalamo alayka ya abal Qasemo'ibn sib'tee muntajabi'l mujtabaa, assalamo alayka ya man be ziyaratehee thawaboo ziyaratee sayyedi'sh shohdae yurtaja, assalamo alayka aarraf'llaho bay'nana wa bay nakum feel jannate wa hasharana fee zumratekum wa awradnaa hawza nabiyekum wa saqana be kaase jadde'kum min yade Ali'ibne Abi talebin salwatullahe alaykum ass aloo'llah an yoriaana fee'kum soroor wal faraj wa an yaj'maana wa iyyakum fee zum'rate jadde'kum mohammadin salla'llahoo alayhee wa aalehee wa an la yaslub'na marefate'kum innahu waliyun qadeer, attaqar'raboo elalla'hee bee hubbekum wal bara'aate min aadayekum wat'tasleeme elalla'hee razeeyen behee ghayr munkerin wala mustak berin wa aala yaqeen ne ma aata behee Mohammadun nat'lobo be zalek waj hak ya sayyedi, allahumma wa rezak wad dar'l aakhera, ya sayyedi wab'na sayyedi ish'feaa lee fil'jannate fa'inna lak indal'llahe sha'nan min sha'nee, allahumma inni as'alok an takhtem lee bis' saadate fala tas'lob minni ma aana feehe wala hawla wala quwwat illa billahil aliyil adheem, allahumma's tajeeb lana wa taqabbalohu be karameek wa izzateka wa be rah matek wa aafiyatek wa salla'llaho aala mohammadiw wa aale aaj mayin wa sallam tasleeman ya ar'hamar rahemin

Peace be on Adam, the Choice of Allah! Peace be on Isa, the Spirit of Allah. Peace be upon you O Messenger of Allah! Peace be upon you O the best of all creatures of Allah! Peace be on you O the choice of Allah! Peace be on you O Muhammad bin Abdullah, the last of the Prophets! Peace be upon you, O Ali bin Abi Talib, Commander of the faithful and the Successor of the Messenger of Allah.

Peace be upon you, O Fatimah, the Leader of the women of the worlds, Peace be on you, O the two grandsons of the Prophet of mercy, and the leaders of the youth of paradise. Peace be upon you, O Ali bin Husain, the leader of worshippers and freshness of exploring eyes! Peace be on you, O Muhammad bin Ali, O the explorer of the knowledge after the prophet! Peace be upon you, O Jafar bin Muhammad, the most pious, the most trustworthy! Peace be upon you, O Musa bin Jafar, the pure, the purified! Peace be upon you, O Ali bin Musa, the contented, the gratified! Peace be upon you, O Muhammad bin Ali, the pious one! Peace be upon you, O Ali bin Muhammad, the pure, the advice-giver, and the trustworthy! Peace be upon Hasan the son Ali (Naqi), the successor after him. O Allah, bestow blessing upon your light, the successor and vicegerent of Thy Messenger and Thy decisive argument over your creatures. Peace be upon you, O the lord, the pure, the chosen! Peace be upon you O the son of infallible lords! Peace be upon you O the son of the best choices of Allah! Peace be upon the Messenger of Allah! Peace, mercy and blessings be upon offspring of the Messenger of Allah. Peace be upon the noble, obedient slave of Allah_ the Lord of the worlds, (Slave of) His Messenger and (Slave of) the Commander of the faithful! Peace be on you, O Abul Qasim, the grandson of the chosen! Peace be upon whose pilgrimage’s (Ziarat) reward is hoped to be equivalent to the visit (Ziarat) of the Leader of the Martyrs of the world. Peace be on you! May Allah grant us your companionship on the Day of Judgment and make us stand with you and lead us to your grandfather's fountain and quench our thirst out of it, with Muhammad's own bowl from the hands of Ali bin Abu Talib, Peace of Allah be upon all of you. I beseech Allah to grant us, through you, happiness and ease and grant us your companionship under the umbrella of your grandfather Muhammad (peace be upon him and his progeny) on the Day of Judgment. (I beseech Allah) not to take away your cognition from us. Indeed, He is Guardian and Authoritative on everything.

I seek Allah's closeness through my love for you and through my enmity for your enemies and my surrender to Allah eagerly, not reluctantly. With my unshaken faith on what Muhammad brought, I seek Thy Face, O my Lord! Thy gratification, and the next world, O Master! O my leader and the son of my leader intercede to Allah on my behalf in paradise, because you have special status near Allah. O Allah, I beseech You to make me have a blissful ending, and not to deprive me from what you have given me. There is neither might nor power but with Allah, the Great, the Exalted. So by Your generosity, honor, Mercy and bounteousness, comply with our supplication. O Allah, bless Mohammed, and all his Progeny and give them abundant peace, O the Most Merciful of the Merciful.

Imamzadeh Hamza

He is among the descendants of Imam al-Kadhim (A) and the brother of Imam ar-Redha (A). His mausoleum is next to Shah Abdul Azim. He was a pious scholar.

He died around 204 AH. Shâh Abdoul Azim often visited his Tomb. Some scholars say he was killed by Mamoun Rashid's soldiers.51

Imamzadeh Tahir ibn Mohammed

He was a scholar who was born around the beginning of the year 4 AH. After 1000 years, when he was exhumed, his body was still intact.

He is of the descent of Imam Sajjad (A).52

b) Imamzadeh Ibrahim

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امامزاده ابراهیم . در شهر ری . خیابان شهید رجایی . بعد از میدان 13 آبان . سمت چاپ امامزاده ابو الحسن .

He is among the descendants of Imam al-Kadhim (A).53

c) Imamzadeh Aboul Hassan

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امامزاده ابراهیم . در شهر ری . خیابان شهید رجایی . بعد از میدان 13 آبان

He is among the descendants of Imam as-Sadiq (A).54

Ayatullah Mojtahedi Tehrani said : Anyone who goes to the Ziyarat of Imamzadeh Shah Abdul Azim and who knows Imamzadeh Aboul Hassan but does not visit him beforehand, it is as if he had not fulfilled his right.

d) Imamzadeh Nassiroudine

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امامزاده نصر االدین . ضلع غربی خیابان خیام بین 15 خرداد و میدان محمدیه واقع شده است .

This Imamzadeh is of the lineage of Imam al-Baqir (A).55

e) Imamzadeh Hassan

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امامزاده حسن . در جنوب غربی تهران در خیابان امین الملک میان پل امامزاده معصوم و سه راه آذری واقع شده است .

This Imamzadeh is from the lineage of Imam al-Hassan (A). He lived during the year 4 AH.56

f) Imamzadeh Massoum

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امامزاده معصوم . خیابان قزوین بین گمرگ و سه راه آذری در محل پل امامزاده معصوم در تهران فعلی واقع شده .

Imamzadeh, known in Iran, is of the lineage of Imam al-Baqir (A). He was expelled from Baghdad under the command of Harun al-Rashid. He fled to Tehran accompanied by Imam ar-Redha (A) during the year 203 AH.57

g) Imamzadeh Saleh

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امامزاده صالح . در ضلع جنوب شرقی میدان تجریش قرار دارد.

Imamzadeh Saleh is a descendant of the 7th Imam, Imam al-Kadhim (A) and the brother of Imam Ar-Redha (A). His sanctuary is one of the most visited places in Iran. Imamzadeh Saleh lived in Iraq and wanted to visit his brother Imam ar-Redha (A) when he was assassinated by the enemies of Ahl-al-Bayt (A).58

children.name: Izne Dukhul common to all Ziyarats

text.html:
(Stand in front of the forecourt and recite the Izne Dukhul) :

اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي وَقَفْتُ عَلَى بَابٍ مِنْ أَبْوَابِ بُيُوتِ نَبِيِّكَ صَلَوَاتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ وَ قَدْ مَنَعْتَ النَّاسَ أَنْ يَدْخُلُوا إِلا بِإِذْنِهِ فَقُلْتَ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لا تَدْخُلُوا بُيُوتَ النَّبِيِّ إِلا أَنْ يُؤْذَنَ لَكُمْ اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْتَقِدُ حُرْمَةَ صَاحِبِ هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ الشَّرِيفِ فِي غَيْبَتِهِ كَمَا أَعْتَقِدُهَا فِي حَضْرَتِهِ وَ أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ رَسُولَكَ وَ خُلَفَاءَكَ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ أَحْيَاءٌ عِنْدَكَ يُرْزَقُونَ يَرَوْنَ مَقَامِي وَ يَسْمَعُونَ كَلامِي وَ يَرُدُّونَ سَلامِي وَ أَنَّكَ حَجَبْتَ عَنْ سَمْعِي كَلامَهُمْ وَ فَتَحْتَ بَابَ فَهْمِي بِلَذِيذِ مُنَاجَاتِهِمْ وَ إِنِّي أَسْتَأْذِنُكَ يَا رَبِّ أَوَّلا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ رَسُولَكَ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ ثَانِيا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ خَلِيفَتَكَ الْإِمَامَ الْمَفْرُوضَ عَلَيَّ طَاعَتُهُ

(say the name of the imam you are visiting)

وَ الْمَلائِكَةَ الْمُوَكَّلِينَ بِهَذِهِ الْبُقْعَةِ الْمُبَارَكَةِ ثَالِثا أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا حُجَّةَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا مَلائِكَةَ اللَّهِ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ الْمُقِيمِينَ فِي هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ فَأْذَنْ لِي يَا مَوْلايَ فِي الدُّخُولِ أَفْضَلَ مَا أَذِنْتَ لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ أَوْلِيَائِكَ فَإِنْ لَمْ أَكُنْ أَهْلا لِذَلِكَ فَأَنْتَ أَهْلٌ لِذَلِكَ

O Allah, I am standing at the door of one of the houses of Your Prophet; Your peace be upon him and his family. You have prohibited the people from entering his house except by the permission of Your Prophet and You said: “O You who believe do not enter the house of the Prophet unless permitted to do so”. O Allah, I believe in this in his absence just as I believe it in his presence and I know that Your Prophet and Your vicegerents upon whom be peace, are Alive in Your presence, they are being nourished, they see my position and hear my speech and they return my greetings and (I believe) that You have covered my ears from hearing their speech and have opened the door of perception of their secret conversations (with You); I seek Your permission first, O’ my Lord; then I seek the permission of Your Prophet_ peace be upon him and his family_ secondly, and I seek the permission of Your vicegerent, Imam Hussain Bin Ali (a) whose obedience is incumbent upon me and (the permission of) Your angels entrusted over this blessed site thirdly. May I enter, O Prophet of Allah, may I enter O the proof of Allah, may I enter, O angels of Allah who are stationed close to this shrine, so permit me O my master to enter the best of way that You have permitted any of Your friends, if I am not deserving of that then You surely are deserving of that.

Allahhumma innee wa qafto alla babinn min abwabe boyute nabiyyeka salawaatoka a’layhe wa alehi, wa qad mana’ta ann-nasa ann yad kholu illa be idhnehi faqulta yaa ayyohal ladhina aamanu laa tad kholu boyutan-nabiyeenn illa ann yu dha na lakum, allahhumma inni aa’ataqedo hurmata sahebe hadha al mash-hade ash-shareefe, fee ghaybatehi kamaa aa’ataqedoha fee hazratehi,wa aa’alamo anna rasoolaka wa kholafaoka alayhome assalaamo ahhyao indaka yurzaqoona,yarawna maqaamee wa yasmaoona kalamee wa yarudduna salamee,wa annaka hajabta ann sam’ee kalamahum wa fatahhta baba fahmi be ladide munajatehim,wa inni astadhenoka yaa rabbe awwalan,wa astadenu rasoolaka sallallaaho a’layhe wa aalehi thaneyan, wa asstadheno khalayafataka al-imamal mafruza alaiyya ta aatohu al-hussaynabna Aliyan alayhissalamo,wal malaaa-ekata al-mowakkalina behadhehi al-buq’aatil mobarakate thalethan, aa adkhulu yaa rasoolallahe, aa adkhulu yaa hujjatallaahe, aa adkhulu yaa malaaa-ekatallahe al-moqarrabina al-muqimeena fee hadha al mash-hade,fa dann lee yaa maulaee feedd-dokhule,afdhala maa adinta laa hadinn min awleyaaa-eka, fa inn lam akun ahlann ledaleka fa anta ahlun le dhaleka.

children.name: Ziyarat to the children of Imams (A)

text.html:
Sayyed 'Alî Ibn Ta'us (may God be pleased with him) reported in Misbah az-Za'ir two ziyarat with whom one visits the children of the Imam (A).

The first ziyârat to the children of Imams

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها السَّيّدُ الزَّكِيُّ الطَّاهِرُ الْوَلِيُّ وَالدَّاعِي الْحَفِيُّ ، أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ قُلْتَ حَقَّاً وَنَطَقْتَ حَقّاً وَصِدْقاً وَدَعَوْتَ إِلَى مَوْلايَ وَمَوْلاكَ عَلانِيَةً وَسِرّاً ، فازَ مُتَّبِعُكَ وَنَجا مُصَدّقُكَ وَخابَ وَخَسِرَ مُكَذّبُكَ وَالْمُتَخَلِّفُ عَنْكَ ، إشْهَدْ لِي بِهذِهِ الشَّهَادَةِ لأِكُونَ مِنَ الْفائِزِينَ بِمَعْرِفَتِكَ وَطاعَتِكَ وَتَصْدِيقِكَ وَاتّباعِكَ ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا سَيّدِي وَابْنَ سَيّدِي
أَنْتَ بابُ اللَّهِ الْمُؤْتَى وَالْمَأْخُوذُ عَنْهُ
أَتَيْتُكَ زائِراً وَحاجاتِي لَكَ مُسْتَوْدِعاً وَها أَنَا ذا أَسْتَوْدِعُكَ دِينِي وَأَمانَتِي وَخَواتِيمَ عَمَلِي وَجَوامِعَ أَمَلِي إِلَى مُنْتَهَى أَجَلِي
وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ

Assalamo alayka ayyohas sayyeduz zakiyut taheerul waliyyo wad da’eeyil hafeeyo, ash'hado annak qul'taa haqqan wa nataq'taa haqqan wa sidqan wa da’aw'taa ela mawlaya wa mawlak aala niyatan wa sirra, faaz muttabeok wa naja mosaddeqok wa khab wa khaser mokadhebok wal motakhallefo ankaa, ish'had lee be hadeheesh shahadate le akun menal faizeen be marefatek wa taa'tek wa tas'deeqek wat'tabayek was salamo alayka ya sayyidi wab'na sayyidi antaa babul'llahil mowta wal makhuzoo an'hu. Atay'tok zaeran wa hajatee lak mus'taw dean waha aana zaa astawdi‘ook deeni wa amanatee wa khawateema aamalee wa jawameaa aamali elaa munta'haa aajali, was salamo alyek wa rahmtullahe waba rakatooh.

Peace be upon you, O the noble, pure, purified, beloved and a prudent preacher. I bear witness that verily you told aright and spoke truth and invited to my and your lord publicly and secretly. Successful is one who obeyed you, survived who testified you while disappointed and lost who disapproved and opposed you. Be the witness of my acknowledgment of you, my compliance, ratification and obedience of you. Peace be upon you, O my lord and son of my lord. You are the door from where (benefit) is provided and taken. I have come to you for pilgrimage and ask you for my needs. Fulfil my needs of religion, duty, (better) costs of my deeds and (fulfil) all my hopes before my death. Peace, mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you.

The second ziyârat to the children of Imams

السَّلامُ عَلَى جَدّكَ الْمُصْطَفَى
السَّلامُ عَلَى أَبِيكَ الْمُرْتَضَى الرّضا
السَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ
السَّلامُ عَلَى خَدِيجَةَ أُمّ سَيّدَةِ نِساءِ الْعالَمِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَى فاطِمَةَ أُمّ الأَئِمَّةِ الطَّاهِرِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ بُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزَّاخِرَةِ شُفَعائِي فِي الآخِرَةِ وَأَوْلِيائِي عِنْدَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ إِلَى الْعِظامِ النَّاخِرَةِ أَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقّ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها الشَّخْصُ الشَّرِيفُ الطَّاهِرُ الْكَرِيمُ
أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ
وَأَنَّ عَلِيّاً وَلِيُّهُ وَمُجْتَبَاهُ وَأَنَّ الإْمامَةَ فِي وُلْدِهِ إِلَى يَوْمِ الدّينِ
نَعْلَمُ ذلِكَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ وَنَحْنُ لِذلِكَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفِي نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ .

Assalamo aala jaddekal mus'tafa, assalamo aala abeekal murtadhaa ridha, assalamo aala sayyedani'l hasane wal Hussain, assalamo aala khadijat umma sayyedatin nisaiil aa’lamin, assalamo aala fatemata ummil ayimmati't twahereen, assalamo aala nufuseel fakherate bihureel uluum zakherate shofaa'ii feel aakherate wa awlayi inda aawdee ruhe elal edhami nakherate aimmatil khalqee wa wolateel haqqe, assalamo alayka ayyoh'sh shakhso shareefu taherul kareemo, ash'hado an la elaha illallahoo wa an mohammadan abdohu wa mus'tafahu wa anna aliyen wa waliyyohu wa mujtabahoo wa annal imamata fee wul'dehi ela yawmid deen, na’alamo dhaleka ilmal yaqeen wa nahno le dhaleka mu’taqeduna wa fee nas'rehim mujtahedun.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, peace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace be upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of creatures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

Ziyarat to the daughters of Imams (A)

السَّلامُ اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ جَدِّكِ الْمُصْطَفى‏، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى اَبيكِ الْمُرْتَضَى الرِّضا، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيِّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ خَديجَةَ اُمِّ سَيِّدَةِ نِساءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ فاطِمَةَ اُمِّ الْائِمَّةِ الطاهِرينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ، وَبُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزَّاخِرَةِ، وَشُفَعائى فِى الْآخِرَةِ، وَاَوْلِيائى عِندَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ الَى الْعِظامِ الناخِرَةِ، اَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقِّ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكِ اَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الشَّريفَةُ الطاهِرَةُ الْكَريمَةُ، اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا الهَ الَّا اللَّهُ، وَاَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ، وَاَنَّ عَليّاً وَليُّهُ وَمُجْتَباهُ، وَاَنَّ الْاِمامَةَ فى وُلْدِهِ الى‏ يَوْمِ الدينِ، نَعْلَمُ ذلِكَ عِلْمَ اْليَقينِ، وَنَحْنُ لِذلِكَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفى نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ.

Assalaamo alaa jaddekil mustafaa, assalaamo alaa abeekil murtadhee ar redhaa, assalaamo alaa as-sayyedaynil hasane wal husayne, assalaamo alaa khadijata umme sayyedate nesaail aalamina, assalaamo alaa faatemata ummil a-immatit taaherina, assalaamo alaa an-nofusil faakherate, wa johuril olumiz zaakherate, wa shofa’aaee feel aakherate, wa awliyaaee inda awdir roohe alal edhaame an-naakherate, a-immatil khalqe wa wulaatil haqqin, assalaamo a’layke ayyatohan nafso ash-shareefato at-taaheratul kareemato, ash-hado an laa elaaha illallaaho, wa anna muhammadan abdohu wa mustafaao, wa anna alayyan waliyyohu wa mujtabaao, wa annal imaamata fee wuldehi alaa yawmiddine, na’a-lamo dhaaleka ilmal yaqeene, wa nahno le dhaaleka mu’ataqeduna wafee nasrehim mujtaheduna.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, peace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace be upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of creatures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat (Leadership of Ummah) is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

Imam ar-Redha (A) was born in Medina on the 11th of Zilkaad in the year 148 AH. He is our 8th imam. His father is the 7th Imam, Imam al-Kadhim (A), and his mother is Najma.59

The 8th Imam had the reins of the Imamate at the age of thirty-five after the martyrdom of the 7th Imam. He assumed the role of the imam of his time for twenty years. He spent seventeen years in Medina during the caliphate of Harun and his sons Amine and Ma'moun and the last three years in Khorasan (called Mashhad).

He was known for his knowledge, kindness, generosity and piety.

After seventeen years of living in Medina, the Imam was forced to leave this city to go to Mashhad under the order of Ma'moun.

Ma'moun tried to find a new solution to his political difficulties which for seventy years had not been solved by his Abbasid predecessors. Indeed, he wished to name Imam ar-Redha as his successor. The Imam declined his offer because he saw a trick on his part. However, Ma'mun forced him to accept the offer and the Imam agreed on condition of not taking part in the administration of the government.

Ma'mun wanted to name the Imam as his successor for two main reasons. The first reason was to prevent the descendants of the prophet from rebelling against the government. The second reason was to make people lose their spiritual belief and attachment to imams.

The imam died poisoned on the last day of the month of Safar of year 203 AH. His funeral was led by his son, Imam Imam al-Jawād (A).60
