a) Izne Dukhul ( Permission to enter)

(Stand in front of the forecourt and recite the Izne Dukhul) :

اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي وَقَفْتُ عَلَى بَابٍ مِنْ أَبْوَابِ بُيُوتِ نَبِيِّكَ صَلَوَاتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ وَ قَدْ مَنَعْتَ النَّاسَ أَنْ يَدْخُلُوا إِلا بِإِذْنِهِ فَقُلْتَ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لا تَدْخُلُوا بُيُوتَ النَّبِيِّ إِلا أَنْ يُؤْذَنَ لَكُمْ اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْتَقِدُ حُرْمَةَ صَاحِبِ هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ الشَّرِيفِ فِي غَيْبَتِهِ كَمَا أَعْتَقِدُهَا فِي حَضْرَتِهِ وَ أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ رَسُولَكَ وَ خُلَفَاءَكَ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ أَحْيَاءٌ عِنْدَكَ يُرْزَقُونَ يَرَوْنَ مَقَامِي وَ يَسْمَعُونَ كَلامِي وَ يَرُدُّونَ سَلامِي وَ أَنَّكَ حَجَبْتَ عَنْ سَمْعِي كَلامَهُمْ وَ فَتَحْتَ بَابَ فَهْمِي بِلَذِيذِ مُنَاجَاتِهِمْ وَ إِنِّي أَسْتَأْذِنُكَ يَا رَبِّ أَوَّلا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ رَسُولَكَ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ ثَانِيا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ خَلِيفَتَكَ الْإِمَامَ الْمَفْرُوضَ عَلَيَّ طَاعَتُهُ

(say the name of the imam you are visiting)

وَ الْمَلائِكَةَ الْمُوَكَّلِينَ بِهَذِهِ الْبُقْعَةِ الْمُبَارَكَةِ ثَالِثا أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا حُجَّةَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا مَلائِكَةَ اللَّهِ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ الْمُقِيمِينَ فِي هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ فَأْذَنْ لِي يَا مَوْلايَ فِي الدُّخُولِ أَفْضَلَ مَا أَذِنْتَ لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ أَوْلِيَائِكَ فَإِنْ لَمْ أَكُنْ أَهْلا لِذَلِكَ فَأَنْتَ أَهْلٌ لِذَلِكَ

O Allah, I am standing at the door of one of the houses of Your Prophet; Your peace be upon him and his family. You have prohibited the people from entering his house except by the permission of Your Prophet and You said: “O You who believe do not enter the house of the Prophet unless permitted to do so”. O Allah, I believe in this in his absence just as I believe it in his presence and I know that Your Prophet and Your vicegerents upon whom be peace, are Alive in Your presence, they are being nourished, they see my position and hear my speech and they return my greetings and (I believe) that You have covered my ears from hearing their speech and have opened the door of perception of their secret conversations (with You); I seek Your permission first, O’ my Lord; then I seek the permission of Your Prophet_ peace be upon him and his family_ secondly, and I seek the permission of Your vicegerent, Imam Hussain Bin Ali (a) whose obedience is incumbent upon me and (the permission of) Your angels entrusted over this blessed site thirdly. May I enter, O Prophet of Allah, may I enter O the proof of Allah, may I enter, O angels of Allah who are stationed close to this shrine, so permit me O my master to enter the best of way that You have permitted any of Your friends, if I am not deserving of that then You surely are deserving of that.

Allahhumma innee wa qafto alla babinn min abwabe boyute nabiyyeka salawaatoka a’layhe wa alehi, wa qad mana’ta ann-nasa ann yad kholu illa be idhnehi faqulta yaa ayyohal ladhina aamanu laa tad kholu boyutan-nabiyeenn illa ann yu dha na lakum, allahhumma inni aa’ataqedo hurmata sahebe hadha al mash-hade ash-shareefe, fee ghaybatehi kamaa aa’ataqedoha fee hazratehi,wa aa’alamo anna rasoolaka wa kholafaoka alayhome assalaamo ahhyao indaka yurzaqoona,yarawna maqaamee wa yasmaoona kalamee wa yarudduna salamee,wa annaka hajabta ann sam’ee kalamahum wa fatahhta baba fahmi be ladide munajatehim,wa inni astadhenoka yaa rabbe awwalan,wa astadenu rasoolaka sallallaaho a’layhe wa aalehi thaneyan, wa asstadheno khalayafataka al-imamal mafruza alaiyya ta aatohu al-hussaynabna Aliyan alayhissalamo,wal malaaa-ekata al-mowakkalina behadhehi al-buq’aatil mobarakate thalethan, aa adkhulu yaa rasoolallahe, aa adkhulu yaa hujjatallaahe, aa adkhulu yaa malaaa-ekatallahe al-moqarrabina al-muqimeena fee hadha al mash-hade,fa dann lee yaa maulaee feedd-dokhule,afdhala maa adinta laa hadinn min awleyaaa-eka, fa inn lam akun ahlann ledaleka fa anta ahlun le dhaleka.

b) Ziyarat best known to Imam ar-Redha (A)

The best known of these is the one reported in the books and is attributed to Sheikh Mohammed son of al-Hassan son of al-Walid who is one of the Sheikhs as-Sadûq (may God have mercy on him !). And it appears from al-Mazar Ibn Qûlûyah that it is reported Imams (A). And his way of doing it is, according to the book Man lâ Yahduruhu al-Faqîh : If you want to visit the Tomb of ar-Redha (A) to Tûs, you do the ritual shower (ghusl) before leaving the house, saying :

اَللّـهُمَّ طَهِّرْني وَطَهِّرْ لي قَلْبي وَاشْرَحْ لي صَدْري وَاَجْرِ عَلى لِساني مِدْحَتَكَ وَمَحَبَّتَكَ وَالثَّناءَ عَلَيْكَ، فَاِنَّهُ لا قُوَّةَ اِلاّ بِكَ، اَللّـهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ لي طَهُوراً وَشِفاءً .

Allâhumma, tahhirnî wa tahhir lî qalbî, wa ashrah lî sadrî wa ajri ‘alâ lisânî mid’hataka wa mahabbataka wa-th-thanâ’a ‘alayka, fa-innahu lâ quwwata illâ bika, Allâhumma, aj‘alhu lî tahûrann wa shifâ’ann.

O Allah, purify me and my heart. Expand my chest and allow my tongue to praise and glorify You and speak of Your love. Indeed there is no power except with You. I have definitely understood that the foundation of my religion is submitting to Your orders, following the traditions of Your Prophet, and testifying that You are the Creator of all the creation. O Allah, make this my cure and light. Indeed You have power over everything.

Say, coming out :

بِسْمِ اللهِ وَبِاللهِ وَاِلَى اللهِ وَاِلَى ابْنِ رَسُولِ اللهِ، حَسْبِىَ اللهُ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللهِ،
اَللّـهُمَّ اِلَيْكَ تَوَجَّهْتُ وَاِلَيْكَ قَصَدْتُ وَما عِنْدَكَ اَرَدْتُ .

Bi-smi-llâhi, wa bi-llâhi, wa ilâ-llâhi, wa ilâ bni rasûli-llâhi, hasbiya-llâhu, tawakkaltu ‘alâ-llâhi.
Allâhumma, ilayka tawajjahtu, wa ilayka qasadtu wa mâ ‘indaka aradtu.

In the name of Allah ; the All-beneficent, the All-merciful. In the Name of Allah (I begin), in Allah (I trust), to Allah and towards the son of Allah’s Messenger (I trun my face). Allah is Sufficient unto me and on Allah do I rely. O Allah, I have set out to You, directed toward You, and desired for what You have in possession.

When you have gone out, stop at the door of your house and say :

اَللّـهُمَّ اِلَيْكَ وَجَّهْتُ وَجْهي، وَعَلَيْكَ خَلَّفْتُ اَهْلي وَمالي وَما خَوَّلْتَني، وَبِكَ وَثِقْتُ يا مَنْ لا يُخَيِّبُ مَنْ اَرادَهُ، وَلا يُضَيِّعُ مَنْ حَفِظَهُ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّد وَآلِ مُحَمَّد وَاحْفَظْني بِحِفْظِكَ فَاِنَّهُ لا يَضيعُ مَنْ حَفِظْتَ .

Allâhumma, ilayka wajjahtu wajhî, wa ‘alayka khallaftu ahlî wa mâlî wa mâ khawwaltanî, wa bika wathiqtu, fa-lâ tukhayyibnî.
Yâ man lâ yukhayyibu man arâdahu, wa lâ yudhayyi‘u man hafidhahu, salli ‘alâ Muhammadinn wa âli Muhammadinn wa ahfadhnî bi-hifdhika fa-innahu lâ yadî‘u man hafidhhta.

O Allah, to You am I turning my face and with You do I keep my family members, my property, and everything with which You have allowed me to behave. I have trusted in You ; so, do not disappoint me. O He Who saves those who trust in Him from disappointment and He Who does not give up those whom He safeguards. O Allah, (please do) send blessings upon Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad and guard me under Your custody, since nothing that You guard may be ruined.

When you arrive safe and sound with the Will of God, shower ritually (ghusl) when you want to visit and say during the shower :

اَللّـهُمَّ طَهِّرْني وَطَهِّرْ لي قَلْبي وَاشْرَحْ لي صَدْري وَاَجْرِ عَلى لِساني مِدْحَتَكَ وَمَحَبَّتَكَ وَالثَّناءَ عَلَيْكَ، فَاِنَّهُ لا قُوَّةَ اِلاّ بِكَ،وَقَدْ عَلِمْتُ اَنَّ قِوامَ ديني التَّسْليمُ لاِمْرِكَ وَالاْتِّباعُ لِسُنَّةِ نَبِيِّكَ، وَالشَّهاَدَةُ عَلى جَميعِ خَلْقِكَ، اَللّـهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ لي شِفاءً وَنُوراً اِنَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْء قَديرٌ .

Allâhumma, tahhirnî wa tahhir lî qalbî, wa ashrah lî sadrî wa ajri ‘alâ lisânî mid’hataka wa mahabbataka wa-th-thanâ’a ‘alayka, fa-innahu lâ quwwata illâ bika,
wa qad ‘alimtu anna qiwâma dînî at-taslîmu li-amrika wa al-ittibâ‘u li-sunnati nabiyyika, wa-sh-shahâdatu ‘alâ jamî‘i khaliqika. Allâhumma, aj‘alhu lî shifâ’ann wa nûrann innaka ‘alâ kulli shay’inn qadîrunn.

O Allah, (please) cleanse me, cleanse my heart for me, expand my breast, and let Your praise, eulogy, and love flow out from my tongue ; since indeed there is no power except with You. I know for sure that the basis of my faith is to submit to Your decree, to keep to the traditions of Your Prophet, and to bear witness to all Your creatures. O Allah, (please) make it curative and light for me. You verily have power over all things.

Put-on pure clothes, walk barefoot, with tranquility and gravity. Evoke God in the heart and say :

اَللهُ اَكْبَرُ ولا اِلـهَ اِلاّ اللهُ وسُبْحانَ اللهِ والْحَمْدُ للهِ،

Allâhu akbaru, wa lâ ilâha illâ-llâhu, wa subhâna-lllâhi wa-l-hamdu li-llâhi !

Allah is the Most Great. There is no god save Allah. All glory be to Allah. All praise be to Allah.

Take small steps and say when entering Holy Rawdha :

بِسْمِ اللهِ وَبِاللهِ وَعَلى مِلَّةِ رَسُولِ اللهِ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ،
اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا اِلـهَ اِلاّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَريكَ لَهُ،
وَاَشْهَدُ اَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ، وَاَنَّ عَلِيّاً وَلِيُّ اللهِ،

Bi-smi-llâhi, wa bi-llâhi, wa ‘alâ millati rasûli-llâhi, sallâ-llâhu ‘alayhi wa âlihi,
ash’hadu an lâ ilâha illâ-llâhu, wahdahu lâ sharîka lahu,
wa ash’hadu an Muhammadinn ‘abduhu wa rasûluhu, wa anna ‘Aliyyann waliyyu-llâhi.

In the Name of Allah (I begin), in Allah (I trust), and the course of Allah’s Messenger (I follow), peace be upon him and his Household. I bear witness that there is no god save Allah, One and Only God and having no partner. And I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and Messenger and `Ali is Allah’s most intimate servant.

Then walk and stop at the grave, turn your face to his face and say :

اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا اِلـهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَريكَ لَهُ، وَاَشْهَدُ اَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ، وَاَنَّهُ سَيِّدُ الاْوَّلينَ وَالآخِرِينَ، وَأَنَّهُ سَيِّدُ الأَنْبِياءِ وَالْمُرْسَلينَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ عَبْدِكَ وَرَسُولِكَ وَنَبِيِّكَ وَسَيِّدِ خَلْقِكَ اَجْمَعينَ صَلاةً لا يَقْوَى عَلى إِحْصائِها غَيْرُكَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى اَميرِ الْمُؤمِنينَ عَلِيِّ بْنِ اَبي طالِبٍ عَبْدِكَ وَأَخي رَسُولِكَ الَّذِي أنْتَجَبْتَهُ بِعِلْمِكَ وَجَعَلْتَهُ هَادِياً لِمَنْ شِئْتَ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ، وَالدَّلِيلَ عَلى مَنْ بَعَثْتَهُ بِرِسالاتِكَ، وَدَيّانَ الدِّينِ بِعَدْلِكَ، وَفَصْلِ قَضَائِكَ بَيْنَ خَلْقِكَ، وَالْمُهَيْمِنَ عَلى ذَلِكَ كُلِّهِ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْهِ وَرَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى فَاطِمَةَ بِنْتِ نَبِيِّكَ وَزَوْجَةِ وَلِيِّكَ وَاُمِّ السِّبْطَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ سَيِّدَيْ شَبابِ اَهْلِ الْجَنَّةِ، الطُّهْرَةِ الطّاهِرَةِ الْمُطَهَّرَةِ التَّقِيَّةِ النَّقِيَّةِ الرَّضِيَّةِ الزَّكِيَّةِ، سَيِّدَةِ نِساءِ اَهْلِ الْجَنَّةِ اَجْمَعينَ صَلاةً لا يَقْوى عَلى إِحْصائِها غَيْرُكَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ سِبْطَيْ نَبِيِّكَ وَسَيِّدَيْ شَبابِ اَهْلِ الْجَنَّةِ الْقائِمَيْنِ في خَلْقِكَ، وَالدَّليلَيْنِ عَلى مَنْ بَعَثْتَ بِرِسالاتِكَ، وَدَيَّانَيِ الدِّينِ بِعَدْلِكَ وَفَصْلَيْ قَضَائِكَ بَيْنَ خَلْقِكَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَبْدِكَ الْقائِمِ في خَلْقِكَ، وَالدَّليلِ عَلى مَنْ بَعَثْتَ بِرِسالاتِكَ، وَدَيَّانِ الدِّينِ بِعَدْلِكَ، وَفَصْلِ قَضَائِكَ بَيْنَ خَلْقِكَ سَيِّدِ الْعَابِدينَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ عَبْدِكَ وَخَليفَتِكَ فِي أَرْضِكَ بَاقِرِ عِلْمِ النَّبِيّينَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى جَعْفَرِ بْنِ مُحَمَّد الصّادِقِ عَبْدِكَ وَوَلِيِّ دِينِكَ وَحُجَّتِكَ عَلى خَلْقِكَ اَجْمَعينَ الصَّادِقِ الْبَارِّ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُوسَى بْنِ جَعْفَرٍ عَبْدِكَ الصَّالِحِ وَلِسَانِكَ فِي خَلْقِكَ النَّاطِقِ بِحُكْمِكَ وَالْحُجَّةِ عَلى بَرِيَّتِكَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى عَليِّ بْنِ مُوسَى الرِّضَا الْمُرْتَضى عَبْدِكَ وَوَلِيِّ دِينِكَ الْقَائِمِ بِعَدْلِكَ وَالدَّاعِي اِلَى دِينِكَ وَدينِ آبَائِهِ الصَّادِقِينَ صَلاةً لا يَقْوَى عَلى إِحْصَائِهَا غَيْرُكَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ عَبْدِكَ وَوَلِيِّكَ الْقَائِمِ بِأَمْرِكَ وَالدَّاعِي اِلَى سَبِيلِكَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى عَليِّ بْنِ مُحَمَّد عَبْدِكَ وَوَلِيِّ دينِكَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ الْعَامِلِ بِأَمْرِكَ الْقَائِمِ فِي خَـلْقِكَ وَحُجَّتِكَ الْمُؤَدِّي عَنْ نَبِيِّكَ وَشَاهِدِكَ عَلى خَلْقِكَ، الْمَخْصُوصِ بِكَرَامَتِكَ الدَّاعِي اِلَى طَاعَتِكَ وَطَاعَةِ رَسُولِكَ صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِمْ اَجْمَعينَ، اَللّـهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى حُجَّتِكَ وَوَلِيِّكَ الْقائِمِ فِي خَلْقِكَ صَلاةً تامَّةً نامِيَةً باقِيَةً تُعَجِّلُ بِها فَرَجَهُ وَتَنْصُرُهُ بِها وَتَجْعَلُنا مَعَهُ في الدُّنْيا وَالآْخِرَةِ، اَللّـهُمَّ اِنّي اَتَقَرَّبُ اِلَيْكَ بِحُبِّهِمْ وَأُوَالِي وَلِيَّهُمْ وَأُعَادِي عَدُوَّهُمْ، فَارْزُقْنِي بِهِمْ خَيْرَ الدُّنْيَا وَالآْخِرَةِ، وَاصْرِفْ عَنِّي بِهِمْ شَرَّ الدُّنْيَا والآْخِرَةِ وَاَهْوَالَ يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَة.ِ

Ash’hadu an lâ ilâha illâ-llâhu, wahdahu lâ sharîka lahu, wa ash’hadu anna Muhammadann ‘abduhu wa rasûluhu, wa annahu sayyidu-l-awwalîna wa-l-âkhirîna, wa annahu sayyidu-l-anbiyâ’i wa-l-mursalîna.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ Muhammadinn ‘abdika wa rasûlika wa nabiyyika wa sayyidi khalqika ajma‘îna, salâtann lâ yaqwâ ‘alâ ihsâ’ihâ ghayruka.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ amîri-l-mu’minîna, ‘Aliyyi bni abî tâlibinn, ‘abdika wa akhî rasûlika, al-ladhî-antajabtahu bi-‘ilmika wa ja‘altahu hâdiyann liman shi’ta min khalqika wa-d-dalîla ‘alâ man ba‘athtahu bi-risâlâtika, wa dayyâna-d-dîni bi-‘adlika, wa fasli qadâ’ika bayna khalqika, wa-l-muhaymina ‘alâ dhâlika kullihi, wa-s-salâmu ‘alayhi wa rahmatu-llâhi wa barakâtuhu.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ Fâtimata binti nabiyyika, wa zawjati waliyyika, wa ummi-s-sibtayni al-Hasani wa-l-Husayni, sayyiday shabâbi ahli-l-jinnati, at-tuhrati, at-tâhirati, al-mutahharati, at-taqiyyati, an-naqiyyati, ar-radiyyati, az-zakiyyati, sayyidati nisâ’i ahli-l-jannati ajma‘îna, salâtann lâ yaqwâ ‘alâ ihsâ’ihâ ghayruka.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ-l-Hasani wa-l-Husayni sibtay nabiyyika wa sayyiday shabâbi ahli-l-jannati, al-qâ’imayni fî khalqika, wa-d-dalîlayni ‘alâ man ba‘athta bi-risâlâtika, wa dayyânî-d-dîni bi-‘adlika wa faslay qadhâ’ika bayna khalqika.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ ‘Aliyyi bni-l-Husayni, ‘abdika, al-qâ’imi fî khalqika, wa-d-dalîli ‘alâ man ba‘athta bi-risâlâtika wa-d-dayyâni-d-dîni bi-‘adlika, wa fasli qadhâ’ika bayna khalqika, sayyidi-l-‘âbidîna.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ Muhammadi bni ‘Aliyyinn ‘abdika wa khalîfatika fî ardhika bâqiri ‘ilmi-n-nabiyyîna.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ Ja‘fari bni Muhammadinn as-sâdiqi, ‘abdika wa waliyyi dînika wa hujjatika ‘alâ khalqika ajma‘îna, as-sâdiqi, al-bârri.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ Mûsâ bni Ja‘farinn ‘abdika as-sâlihi wa lisânika fî khalqika, an-nâtiqi bi-hukmika, wa-l-hujjati ‘alâ bariyyatika
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ ‘Aliyyi bni Mûsâ ar-Ridhâ al-murtadhâ ‘abdika wa waliyyi dînika al-qâ’imi bi-‘adlika wa-d-dâ‘î ilâ dînika wa dîni âbâ’ihi as-sâdiqîna, salâtann lâ yaqwâ ‘alâ ihsâ’ihâ ghayruka.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ Muhammadi bni ‘Alîyyinn ‘abdika wa waliyyika al-qâ’imi bi-amrika wa-d-dâ‘î ilâ sabîlika.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ ‘Aliyyi bni Muhammadinn ‘abdika wa waliyyi dînika.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ-l-Hasani bni ‘Aliyyinn al-‘âmili bi-amrika, al-qâ’imi fî khalqika wa hujjatika, al-mu’addî ‘an nabiyyika, wa shâhidika ‘alâ khalqika, al-makhsûsi bi-karâmatika ad-dâ‘î ilâ tâ‘atika wa tâ‘ati rasûlika, salawâtuka ‘alayhim ajma‘îna.
Allâhumma, salli ‘alâ hujjatika wa waliyyika, al-qâ’imi fî khalqika, salâtann tâmmatann, nâmiyatann, bâqiyatann, tu‘ajjilu bihâ farajahu wa tansuruhu bihâ wa taj‘alunâ ma‘ahu fî-d-dunyâ wa-l-âkhirati.
Allâhumma, innî ataqarrabu ilayka bi-hubbihim wa uwâlî waliyyahum, wa u‘âdî ‘aduwwahum, fa-rzuqnî bihim khayra-d-dunyâ wa-l-âkhirati, wa-srif ‘annî bihim sharra-d-dunyâ wa-l-âkhirati wa ahwâla yawmi-l-qiyâmati.

In the name of Allah, The Beneficent, The Merciful. I bear witness that there is no God save Allah, the One; and there is no partner to share with Him. I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and His Messenger, verily, he is the lord of the ancients and the moderns, verily, he is the head of the Prophets and the Messengers. O Allah send blessing on Muhammad, Thy servant, Thy Messenger and Thy Prophet, the chief of all that has been created by Thee, blessings which no one is able to measure other than Thee. O Allah send blessings on the Ameer ul Moomineen, Ali ibna Abi Talib, Thy servant, the brother of Thy Messenger, whom Thou elected to have Thy Knowledge, made him a guide to show the right path to those of Thy servants who want to be led aright, an evident proof for those who pay careful attention to Thy Message, he managed the affairs of the religion according to Thy system of justice, made application of Thy commands to settle the issues which cropped up among the people, and let Thy will and command rule supreme in all matters; peace be on him, also mercy and blessings of Allah. O Allah send blessings on Fatimah, the daughter of Thy Prophet, the wife of Thy friend, the mother of the two sons, Hasan and Husayn, the prime leaders of the people of Paradise, she is pure, purified, pious content, wise leader of all the women of the Paradise, blessings which no one is able to measure other than Thee. O Allah send blessings on Hasan and Husayn, the two sons of Thy Prophet, the prime leaders of the people of Paradise, Thy established authority among the people, Thy two evident proofs for those who pay careful attention to Thy Message, who managed the affairs of the religion according to Thy system of justice, and made application of Thy commands to settle the issues which cropped up among the people. O Allah send blessings on Ali bin Husayn, Thy servant, Thy established authority among the people, Thy evident proof for those who pay careful attention to Thy Message, who managed the affairs of the religion according to Thy system of justice, and made application of Thy commands to settle the issues which cropped up among the people, the lord among Thy adorers. O Allah send blessings on Muhammad bin Ali, Thy servant, Thy representative in the earth, the deeply versed in the knowledge of Prophets. O Allah send blessings on Jaa'-far bin Muhammad, the truthful, Thy servant, the defender of Thy religion, Thy decisive argument over the mankind, the truthful, the just. O Allah send blessings on Moosa bin Jaa'-far, Thy upright servant, Thy approved spokesman among Thy people, Thy decisive argument over the mankind. O Allah send blessings on Ali bin Moosa who please Thee most, the chosen, Thy servant, the defender of Thy religion, rightly and justly established by Thee as an authority who made earnest presentation of arguments to promote Thy religion which is the religion of his truthful ancestors, blessings which no one is able to measure other than Thee. O Allah send blessings on Muhammad bin Ali, Thy servant, Thy chosen representative, appointed by Thy command, who invited people Thy path. O Allah send blessings on Ali bin Muhammad, Thy servant, the defender of Thy religion. O Allah send blessings on Hasan bin Ali who put Thy system into practice, the established authority among the people, Thy demonstrator who carried out the mission of Thy Prophet, Thy witness over the mankind, distinguished with Thy excellence, who reminded people to obey Thee and Thy Messenger. Thy blessings be on all of them. O Allah send blessings on Thy demonstrator, Thy established representative among the people, perfect, growing and everlasting blessings expedite his arrival and help him, let us be with him in this world and in the Hereafter. O Allah I seek Thy nearness through my love for them.I make friends with their friends, I oppose their enemies, so, on account of them, give me good of this world and the Hereafter, keep away from me the evil of this world and the Hereafter, the dreadful fright on the Day of Judgement.

Then you sit at the level of the head and say :

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَلِيَّ اللَّهِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ waliyya-llâhi.

Peace be on you, O the representative of Allah!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا حُجَّةَ اللَّهِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ hujjata-llâhi.

Peace be on you, O the evident proof of Allah!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا نُورَ اللَّهِ فِي ظُلُمَاتِ الأَرْضِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ nûra-llâhi fî dhulumâti-l-ardhi.

Peace be on you, O the light of Allah in the darkness of this (ignorant) world!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا عَمُودَ الدِّينِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ ‘amûda-d-dîni

Peace be on you, O the mainstay of the religion!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ ادَمَ صِفْوَةِ اللَّهِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha Adama, sifwati-llâhi.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Adam, the sincerely attached friend of Allah!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ نُوحٍ نَبِيِّ اللَّهِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha Nûhinn, nabiyyi-llâhi.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Nooh, the Prophet of Allah!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ إِبرَاهِيمَ خَلِيلِ اللَّهِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha Ibrâhîma, khalîli-llâhi

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Ibrahim, the intimate friend of Allah!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ إِسْمَاعِيلَ ذَبِيحِ اللَّهِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha Ismâ‘îla, dhabîhi-llâhi.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Ismaeel, the sacrifice offered to Allah!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ مُوسَى كَلِيمِ اللَّهِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha Mûsâ, kalîmi-llâhi.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Moosa, who spoke to Allah!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ عِيسَى رُوحِ اللَّهِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha ‘Isâ, rûhi-llâhi

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Eesaa, who received mercy, joy and ease from Allah!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ مُحَمَّدٍ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha Muhammadinn, rasûli-llâhi.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Muhammad, the Messenger of Allah!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ أَمِيرِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ عَلِيٍّ وَلِيِّ اللَّهِ وَوَصِيِّ رَسُولِ رَبِّ الْعالَمِينَ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha amîri-l-mu’minîna ‘Aliyyinn waliyyi-llâhi wa wasiyyi rasûli rabbi-l-‘âlamîna.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of the Ameer ul Moomineen, the representative of Allah, the executor of the will of the Messenger of the Lord of the worlds!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ فَاطِمَةَ الزَّهْرَاءِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha-Fâtimata az-zahrâ’i.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Faatimah Zahra!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ سَيِّدَيْ شَبَابِ أَهْلِ الْجَنَّةِ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha-l-Hasani wa-l-Husayni, sayyiday shabâbi ahli-l-jannati.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Hasan and Husayn, the prime leaders of the people of Paradise!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ زَيْنِ الْعَابِدِينَ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha ‘Aliyyi bni-l-Husayni, zayni-l-‘âbidîna.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Ali bin Husayn, the pride of the worshippers!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ بَاقِرِ عِلْمِ الأَوَّلِينَ وَالآخِرِينَ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha Muhammadi bni ‘Aliyyinn, bâqir ‘ilmi-l-awwalîna wa-l-âkhirîna.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Muhammad bin Ali, the deeply versed in the wisdom of the ancients and moderns!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ جَعْفَرِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ الصَّادِقِ الْبَارّ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha Ja‘fari bni Muhammadinn, as-sâdiqi, al-bârri.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Jaa'-far bin Muhammad, the truthful, the virtuous!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَارِثَ مُوسَى بْنِ جَعْفَرٍ

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ wâritha Mûsa bni Ja‘farinn.

Peace be on you, O the Inheritor of Moosa bin Jaa'-far!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا الصِّدِّيقُ الشَّهِيدُ

As-salâmu ‘alayka ayyuhâ as-siddîqu, ash-shahîdu.

Peace be on you, O the virtuous and pious guardian!

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا الْوَصِيُّ الْبَارُّ التَّقِيُّ

As-salâmu ‘alayka ayyuhâ al-wasiyyu, al-bârru, at-taqiyyu.

Peace be upon you, O Legatee, the Good, the Pious!

أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ قَدْ أَقَمْتَ الصَّلاةَ وَآتَيْتَ الزَّكَاةَ وَأَمَرْتَ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَنَهَيْتَ عَن الْمُنْكَرِ وَعَبَدْتَ اللَّهَ مُخْلِصاً حَتَّى أَتَاكَ الْيَقِينُ

Ashhadu annaka qad aqamta as-salâta wa âtayta az-zakâta wa amarta bi-l-ma’rûfi wa nahayta ‘ani-l-munkari wa ‘abadta-llâha mukhlisann hattâ atâka-l-yaqînu.

I bear witness that, verily, you established the prayers, gave the prescribed share to the needy, commanded to do that which is right and lawful, not to do that which is wrong and unlawful, sincerely served Allah, till the inevitable came unto you.

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا أَبَا الْحَسَنِ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ .

As-salâmu ‘alayka yâ abâ-l-Hasani wa rahmatu-llâhi wa barakâtuhu !

Peace be on you, O Abul Hasan, and mercy and blessings of Allah be on you.

Then you fall back on the grave and say :

اللَّهُمَّ إِلَيْكَ صَمَدْتُ مِنْ أَرْضِي وَقَطَعْتُ الْبِلادَ رَجَاءَ رَحْمَتِكَ فَلا تُخَيِّبْنِي وَلا تَرُدَّنِي بِغَيْرِ قَضَاءِ حَاجَتِي، وَارْحَمْ تَقَلُّبِي عَلَى قَبْرِ ابْنِ أَخِي رَسُولِكَ صَلَواتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ، بِأَبِي أَنْتَ وَأُمِّي يَا مَوْلايَ أَتَيْتُكَ زَائِراً وَافِداً عَائِذَاً مِمَّا جَنَيْتُ عَلَى نَفْسِي وَاحْتَطَبْتُ عَلَى ظَهْرِي، فَكُنْ لِي شَافِعاً إِلَى اللَّهِ يَوْمَ فَقْرِي وَفَاقَتِي فَلَكَ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ مَقَامٌ مَحْمُودٌ وَأَنْتَ عِنْدَهُ وَجِيهٌ

Allâhumma, ilayka samadtu min ardhî wa qata‘tu-l-bilâda rajâ’a rahmatika fa-lâ tukhayyibnî wa lâ taruddanî bi-ghayri qadâ’i hâjatî,
wa-rham taqallubî ‘alâ qabri bni akhî rasûlika, salawâtuka ‘alayhi wa âlihi.
Bi-abî anta wa ummî, yâ mawlâya, ataytuka zâ’irann, wâfidann, ‘â’idhann mimmâ janaytu ‘alâ nafsî wa ahtatabtu ‘alâ zhahrî.
Fa-kun lî shâfi‘ann ilâ-llâhi yawma faqrî wa fâqatî, fa-laka ‘inda-llâhi, maqâmunn mahmûdunn wa anta ‘indahu wajîhunn.

O Allah I had left my place of domicile to go towards Thee, and crossed many a town in the hope of getting Thy mercy, therefore, do not disappoint me, do not send me away without awarding that which I need, have mercy on my restless agitation near the son of Thy Messenger's brother, Thy blessings be on him and on his children. My father and mother are at your disposal O my Mawlaa! I have come to visit you, adore you and take refuge with you from the excesses I indulged into, from the burden of sins I carry on my back, so, in the day of distress, be my advocate before Allah, because you enjoy special privileges in the presence of Allah, and He shows respect for you and brings honour to you.

Then you raise your right hand and you extend your left hand on the grave and you say :

اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَتَقَرَّبُ إِلَيْكَ بِحُبِّهِمْ وَبِوِلايَتِهِمْ أَتَوَلَّى آخِرَهُمْ بِمَا تَوَلَّيْتُ بِهِ أَوَّلَهُمْ وَأَبْرَأُ مِنْ كُلِّ وَلِيجَةٍ دُونَهُمْ، اللَّهُمَّ الْعَنْ الَّذِينَ بَدَّلُوا نِعْمَتَك وَاتَّهَمُوا نَبِيِّكَ وَجَحَدُوا بِايآتِكَ وَسَخِرُوا بِإِمَامِكَ وَحَمَلُوا النَّاسَ عَلَى أَكْتَافِ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَتَقَرَّبُ إِلَيْكَ بِاللَّعْنَةِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَالْبَرَاءَةِ مِنْهُمْ فِي الدُّنْيا وَالآخِرَةِ يا رَحْمانُ .

Allâhumma, innî ataqarrabu ilayka, bi-hubbihim wa bi-wilâyatihim, atawallâ âkhirahum bi-mâ tawallaytu bihi awwalahum wa abra’u min kulli walîjatinn dûnahum.
Allâhumma, al‘an al-ladhîna baddalû ni‘mataka wa attahamû nabiyyika wa jahadû bi-âyâtika wa sakhirû bi-imâmika wa hamalû-n-nâsa ‘alâ aktâfi âli Muhammadinn.
Allâhumma, innî ataqarrabu ilayka bi-l-la‘nati ‘alayhim wa-l-barâ’ati minhum fî-d-dunyâ wa-l-âkhirati, yâ rahmânu.

O Allah I seek Thy nearness through my love and friendship for them (the Ahlul Bayt). I love each and every one of them, from the first to the last, and avoid intimate association with anyone other than the Ahlul Bayt. Curse of Allah be on those who subverted Thy 'Favour' suspected Thy Prophet to be guilty of falsehood, denied Thy revelation, laugh at Thy representatives, and gave preference to nonentities over the 'Aali Muhammad. O Allah I seek Thy nearness by calling down curses on them, I keep myself aloof from them in this world and in the Hereafter, O Beneficent!'

Then you go to the level of his feet and say :

صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْكَ يا أَبَا الْحَسَنِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَى رُوحِكَ وَبَدَنِكَ صَبَرْتَ وَأَنْتَ الصَّادِقُ الْمُصَدَّقُ قَتَلَ اللَّهُ مَنْ قَتَلَكَ بِالأَيْدِي وَالأَلْسُنِ .

Sallâ-llâhu ‘alayka, yâ abâ-l-Hasani ! Sallâ-llâhu ‘alâ rûhika wa badanika ! Sabarta wa anta as-sâdiqu al-musaddaqu ! Qatala-llâhu man qatalaka bi-l-aydî wa-l-alsuni !

Blessings of Allah be on you, O Abul Hasan! Blessings of Allah be on your soul and your body! You suffered patiently and exercised self-control, (although) you were truthful and your truthfulness had been confirmed ; Allah destroyed him who gave the orders to kill you, and him who carried it out.

Then, curse the one who killed the Prince of Believers (A), those who killed al-Hassan and al-Hussein, all those who killed the people of the house of the Messenger of God (S)).

O Allah, to You am I turning my face and with You do I keep my family members, my property, and everything with which You have allowed me to behave. I have trusted in You ; so, do not disappoint me. O He Who saves those who trust in Him from disappointment and He Who does not give up those whom He safeguards. O Allah, (please do) send blessings upon Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad and guard me under Your custody, since nothing that You guard may be ruined.

I say : This ziyârat is the best of his ziyârats.

The words « They mocked Your Imam » mentioned at the end of the ziyarat, were written in the book al-Faqih, al-'Uyun, the books of the scholar al-Majlasi and others, with two « m » (Imamika) and we have taken them here.

The meaning is « They made fun of Your Imam whom You have designated for them » However the words that are found in the book Misbah az-Za'ir are : « They made fun of Your Days »(Iyamika). And the meaning is also right and even, priority in certain aspects. For the days (al-iyyam) are the Imams, as is known from the recorded note of Saqar son of Abu Dulaf al-Madi.

The curses against the killers of Imams (A) are good in any language. And without doubt, the most suitable is to curse them according to these expressions taken from certain invocations :

اللَّهُمَّ الْعَنْ قَتَلَةَ أَمِيرِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَقَتَلَةَ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ وَقَتَلَةَ أَهْلِ بَيْتِ نَبِيِّكَ، اللَّهُمَّ الْعَنْ أَعْداءَ الِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَقَتَلَتَهُمْ وَزِدْهُمْ عَذاباً فَوْقَ الْعَذابِ وَهَوانَاً فَوْقَ هَوانٍ وَذُلاًّ فَوْقَ ذُلٍّ وَخِزْياً فَوْقَ خِزْيٍ، اللَّهُمَّ دُعَّهُمْ إِلَى النَّارِ دَعَّاً وَأَرْكِسْهُمْ فِي أَلِيْمِ عَذابِكَ رَكْساً وَاحْشُرْهُمْ وَأَتْباعَهُمْ إِلَى جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرَاً .

Allâhumma, al‘an qatalata amîri al-mu’minîna, wa qatalata-l-Hasani wa-l-Husayni ‘alayhimu as-salâmu, wa qatalata ahli bayti nabiyyika. Allâhumma, al‘an a‘dâ’a âli Muhammadinn wa qatalatahum wa zid’hum ‘adhâbann fawqa-l-‘adhâbi wa hawânann fawqa hawâninn wa dhullann fawqa dhullinn wa khizyann fawqa khizyinn. Allâhumma, du‘‘ahum ilâ-n-nâri da‘‘ann wa arkishum fî alîmi ‘adhâbika raksann wa ahshurhum wa atbâ‘ahum ilâ jahannama zumarann

O Allah, pour curses on the slayers of the Commander of the Faithful, the slayers of al-Hasan and al-Husayn, peace be upon them, and the slayers of the members of Your Prophet’s Household. O Allah, curse the enemies and slayers of Muhammad’s family members, add up chastisement to the chastisement that You decide for them, add up humility to the humility that You decide for them, add up disgrace to the disgrace that You decide for them, and add up ignominy to the ignominy that You decide for them. O Allah, thrust them into Hellfire with disdainful thrusting, cast them down in the painful torment of You with violent casting, and drive them and their followers to Hell in groups.

c) The invocation after this ziyârat and his prayer

-Al-Mufid says, in Tuhfah az-Za'ir, that it is advisable to invoke God from this invocation after the prayer of the ziyarat to [Imam] ar-Redha (A).

اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ يا اللَّهُ الدَّائِمُ فِي مُلْكِهِ الْقَائِمُ فِي عِزِّهِ الْمُطَاعُ فِي سُلْطَانِهِ الْمُتَفَرِّدُ فِي كِبْرِيَائِهِ الْمُتَوَحِّدُ فِي دَيْمُومَةِ بَقَائِهِ الْعَادِلُ فِي بَرِيَّتِهِ الْعَالِمُ فِي قَضِيَّتِهِ الْكَرِيمُ فِي تَأْخِيرِ عُقُوْبَتِهِ، إِلهِي حَاجَاتِي مَصْرُوفَةٌ إِلَيْكَ وَآمَالِي مَوْقُوفَةٌ لَدَيْكَ وَكُلَّمَا وَفَّقْتَنِي مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَأَنْتَ دَلِيلِي عَلَيْهِ وَطَرِيْقِي إِلَيْهِ، يا قَدِيراً لاَ تَؤُودُهُ الْمَطالِبُ يا مَلِيّاً يَلْجَأُ إِلَيْهِ كُلُّ رَاغِبٍ ما زِلْتُ مَصْحُوباً مِنْكَ بِالنِّعَمِ جَارِياً عَلَى عَادَاتِ الإْحْسَانِ وَالْكَرَمِ، أَسْأَلُكَ بِالْقُدْرَةِ النَّافِذَةِ فِي جَمِيعِ الأَشْيَاءِ وَقَضَائِكَ الْمُبْرَمِ الَّذِي تَحْجُبُهُ بِأَيْسَرِ الدُّعَاءِ، وَبِالنَّظْرَةِ الَّتِيْ نَظَرْتَ بِهَا إِلَى الْجِبَالِ فَتَشَامَخَتْ وَإِلَى الأَرَضِيْنَ فَتَسَطَّحَتْ وَإِلَى السَّمَاوَاتِ فَارْتَفَعَتْ وَإِلَى الْبِحَارِ فَتَفَجَّرَتْ، يا مَنْ جَلَّ عَنْ أَدَوَاتِ لَحَظَاتِ الْبَشَرِ وَلَطُفَ عَنْ دَقَائِقِ خَطَرَاتِ الْفِكَرِ، لا تُحْمَدُ يا سَيِّدِي إِلاَّ بِتَوْفِيقٍ مِنْكَ يَقْتَضِي حَمْداً وَلا تُشْكَرُ عَلَى أَصْغَرِ مِنَّةٍ إِلاَّ اسْتَوْجَبْتَ بِهَا شُكْراً
فَمَتَى تُحْصَى نَعْمَاؤُكَ يَا إِلهِي وَتُجَازَى الآؤُكَ يا مَوْلايَ وَتُكَافَأُ صَنائِعُكَ يا سَيِّدِي، وَمِنْ نِعَمِكَ يَحْمَدُ الْحَامِدُونَ وَمِنْ شُكْرِكَ يَشْكُرُ الشَّاكِرُونَ، وَأَنْتَ الْمُعْتَمَدُ لِلذُّنُوبِ فِيْ عَفْوِكَ وَالنَّاشِرُ عَلَى الْخَاطِئِينَ جَنَاحَ سِتْرِكَ وَأَنْتَ الْكَاشِفُ لِلضُّرِّ بِيَدِكَ، فَكَمْ مِنْ سَيِّئَةٍ أَخْفَاهَا حِلْمُكَ حَتَّى دَخِلَتْ وَحَسَنَةٍ ضَاعَفَهَا فَضْلُكَ حَتَّى عَظُمَتْ عَلَيْهَا مُجَازَاتُكَ،
جَلَلْتَ أَنْ يُخَافَ مِنْكَ إِلاَّ الْعَدْلُ وَأَنْ يُرْجَى مِنْكَ إِلاَّ الإْحْسَانُ وَالْفَضْلُ ، فَامْنُنْ عَلَيَّ بِمَا أَوْجَبَهُ فَضَلُكَ ، وَلاَ تَخْذُلْنِي بِمَا يَحْكُمُ بِهِ عَدْلُكَ، سَيِّدِي لَوْ عَلِمَتِ الأَرْضُ بِذُنُوبِي لَسَاخَتْ بِي أَوْ الْجِبَالُ لَهَدَّتْنِي أَوْ السَّمَاوَاتُ لأَخْتَطَفَتْنِي أَوْ الْبِحَارُ لأَغْرَقَتْنِي، سَيِّدِي سَيِّدِي سَيِّدِي مَوْلايَ مَوْلايَ مَوْلايَ، قَدْ تَكَرَّرَ وُقُوفِي لِضِيَافَتِكَ فَلا تَحْرِمْنِي مَا وَعَدْتَ الْمُتَعَرِّضِينَ لِمَسْأَلَتِكَ، يا مَعْرُوفَ الْعارِفِينَ يا مَعْبُودَ الْعابِدِينَ يا مَشْكُورَ الشَّاكِرِينَ يا جَلِيسَ الذَّاكِرِينَ يا مَحْمُودَ مَنْ حَمِدَهُ يا مَوْجُودَ مَنْ طَلَبَهُ، يا مَوْصُوفَ مَنْ وَحَّدَهُ يا مَحْبُوبَ مَنْ أَحَبَّهُ يا غَوْثَ مَنْ أَرَادَهُ يا مَقْصُودَ مَنْ أَنَابَ إِلَيْهِ، يا مَنْ لا يَعْلَمُ الْغَيْبَ إِلاَّ هُوَ يا مَنْ لا يَصْرِفُ السُّوءَ إِلاَّ هُوَ يا مَنْ لا يُدَبِّرُ الأَمْرَ إِلاَّ هُوَ، يا مَنْ لا يَغْفِرُ الذَّنْبَ إِلاَّ هُوَ يا مَنْ لا يَخْلُقُ الْخَلْقَ إِلاَّ هُوَ يا مَنْ لا يُنَزِّلُ الْغَيْثَ إِلاَّ هُوَ، صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاغْفِرْ لِي يا خَيْرَ الْغَافِرِينَ، رَبِّ إِنِّي أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ حَيَاءٍ وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ رَجَاءٍ وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ إِنَابَةٍ وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ رَغْبَةٍ، وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ رَهْبَةٍ ، وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ طَاعَةٍ ، وَأَسْتِغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ إِيْمَانٍ ، وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ إِقْرَارٍ ،
وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ إِخْلاصٍ وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ تَقْوَى وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ تَوَكُّلٍ وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ ذِلَّةٍ، وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ اسْتِغْفَارَ عَامِلٍ لَكَ هَارِبٍ مِنْكَ إِلَيْكَ
فَصَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَى وَالِدَيَّ بِمَا تُبْتَ وَتَتُوبُ عَلَى جَمِيعِ خَلْقِكَ يَا أَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِينَ، يا مَنْ يُسَمَّى بِالْغَفُورِ الرَّحِيمِ يا مَنْ يُسَمَّى بِالْغَفُورِ الرَّحِيمِ يا مَنْ يُسَمَّى بِالْغَفُورِ الرَّحِيمِ، صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاقْبَلْ تَوْبَتِي وَزَكِّ عَمَلِي وَاشْكُرْ سَعْيِي، وَارْحَمْ ضَرَاعَتِي وَلا تَحْجُبْ صَوْتِي وَلا تُخَيِّبْ مَسْأَلَتِي يا غَوْثَ الْمُسْتَغِيثِينَ، وَأَبْلِغْ أَئِمَّتِي سَلامِي وَدُعَائِي وَشَفِّعْهُمْ فِي جَمِيعِ مَا سَأَلْتُكَ وَأَوْصِلْ هَدِيَّتِي إِلَيْهِمْ كَمَا يَنْبَغِي لَهُمْ وَزِدْهُمْ مِنْ ذلِكَ مَا يَنْبَغِي لَكَ بِأَضْعَافٍ لا يُحْصِيْهَا غَيْرُكَ، وَلا حَوْلَ وَلا قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللَّهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيمِ وَصَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَى أَطْيَبِ الْمُرْسَلِينَ مُحَمَّدٍ وَالِهِ الطَّاهِرِينَ

Allâhumma, innî as’aluka yâ-llâhu ad-dâ’imu fî mulkihi al-qâ’imu fî ‘izzihi al-mutâ‘u fî sultânihi, al-mutafarridu fî kibriyâ’ihi, al-mutawahhidu fî daymûmati baqâ’ihi, al-‘âdilu fî bariyyatihi, al-‘âlimu fî qadiyyatihi, al-karîmu fî ta’khîri ‘uqûbatihi. Ilâhî, hâjâtî masrûfatunn ilayka, wa âmâlî mawqûfatunn ladayka, wa kullamâ waffaqtanî min khayrinn, fa-anta dalîlî ‘alayhi wa tarîqî ilayhi. yâ qadîrann lâ ta’ûduhu al-matâlibu, yâ maliyyann yalja’u ilayhi kullu râghibinn mâ ziltu, mas’hûbann minka bi-n-ni‘ami, jâriyann ‘alâ ‘âdâti-l-ihsâni wa-l-karami. As’aluka, bi-l-qudrati an-nâfidhati fî jamî‘i-l-ashyâ’i, wa qadhâ’ika al-mubrami al-ladhî tahjubuhu bi-aysari-d-du‘â’i, wa bi-n-nadhrati al-latî nadharta bihâ ilâ-l-jibâli fa-tashâmakhat, wa ilâ-l-aradhîna fa-tasattahat, wa ilâ-s-samâwâti fa-artafa‘at, wa ilâ-l-bihâri fa-tafajjarat. Yâ man jalla ‘an adawâti lahadhâti-l-bashari wa latufa ‘an daqâ’iqi khatarâti-l-fikari, lâ tuhmadu, yâ sayyidî, illâ bi-tawfîqinn minka yaqtadî hamdann, wa lâ tushkaru ‘alâ asghari minnatinn illâ astawjabta bihâ shukrann. Fa-matâ tuhsâ na‘mâ’uka, yâ ilâhî, wa tujâzâ al-alâ’uka, yâ Mawlâya, wa tukâfa’u sanâ‘uka, yâ sayyidî, wa min ni‘amika yahmadu-l-hâmidûna wa min shukrika yashkuru ash-shâkirûna, wa anta al-mu‘tamadu li-dh-dhunûbi fî ‘afwika wa-n-nâshiru ‘alâ-l-khâti’îna janâha sitrika, wa anta al-kâshifu li-d-durri bi-yadika. Fa-kam min sayyi’atinn akhfâhâ hilmuka hattâ dakhilat, wa hasanatinn dâ‘afahâ fadhluka hattâ ‘adhumat ‘alayhâ mujâzâtuka. Jalalta an yukhâfa minka illâ al-‘adlu wa an yurjâ minka illâ il-ihsânu wa-l-fadlu fa-amnun ‘alayya bimâ awjabahu fadhluka, wa lâ takhdhulnî bimâ yahkumu bihi ‘adluka, Sayyidî law ‘alimati-l-ardu bi-dhunûbî la-sâkhat bî, aw al-jibâlu la-haddatnî, aw as-samâwâtu la-akhtatafatnî, aw al-bihâru la-aghraqatnî, Sayyidî, Sayyidî, Sayyidî, mawlâya, mawlâya, mawlâya, Qad takarrara uqûfî li-diyâfatika fa-lâ tahrimnî mâ wa‘adta-l-muta‘arridîna li-mas’alatika. Yâ ma‘rûfa-l-‘ârifîna, yâ ma‘bûda-l-‘âbidîna, yâ mashkûra-sh-shâkirîna, yâ jalîsa-dh-dhâkirîna, yâ mahmûda man hamidahu, yâ mawjûda man talabahu, yâ mawsûfa man wahhadahu, yâ mahbûba man ahabbahu, yâ ghawtha man arâdahu, yâ maqsûda man anâba ilayhi, yâ man lâ ya‘lamu al-ghayba illâ huwa, yâ man lâ yasrifu-s-sû’a illâ huwa, yâ man lâ yudabbiru-l-amra illâ huwa, yâ man lâ yaghfiru adh-dhanba illâ huwa, yâ man lâ yakhluqu al-khalqa illâ huwa, yâ man lâ yunazzilu al-ghaytha illâ huwa, salli ‘alâ Muhammadinn wa âli Muhammadinn wa-ghfir lî yâ khayra-l-ghâfirîna. Rabbî, innî astaghfiruka istighfâra hayâ’inn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra rajâ’inn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra inâbatinn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra raghbatinn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra rahbatinn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra tâ‘atinn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra îmâninn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra iqrârinn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra ikhlâsinn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra taqwâ, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra tawakkulinn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra dhillatinn, wa astaghfiruka istighfâra ‘âmilinn laka, hâribinn minka ilayka, fa-salli ‘alâ Muhammadinn wa âli Muhammadinn wa tub ‘alayya wa ‘alâ wâlidayya bimâ tubta wa tatûbu ‘alâ jamî‘i khalqika, yâ arhama ar-râhimîna.Yâ man yusammâ bi-l-ghafûri ar-rahîmi, yâ man yusammâ bi-l-ghafûri ar-rahîmi, yâ man yusammâ bi-l-ghafûri ar-rahîmi, salli ‘alâ Muhammadinn wa âli Muhammadinn wa-qbal tawbatî, wa zakki ‘amalî, wa-sh-shkur sa‘yî, wa-r-ham darâ‘atî, wa lâ tahjub sawtî, wa lâ tukhayyib mas’alatî, yâ ghawtha-l-mustaghîthîna, wa abligh a’immatî salâmî wa du‘â’î, wa shaffi‘hum fî jamî‘i mâ sa’altuka wa awsil hadiyyatî ilayhim kamâ yanbaghî lahum wa zid’hum min dhâlika mâ yanbaghî laka bi-adh‘âfinn lâ yuhsîhâ ghayruka,wa lâ hawla wa lâ quwwata illâ bi-llâhi al-‘aliyyi-l-‘adhîmi wa sallâ-llâhu ‘alâ at’yabi-l-mursalîna Muhammadinn wa âlihi at-tâhirîna.

O Allah, I beseech You, O Allah. Who is permanent in His kingdom, self-subsisting in His almightiness, obeyed in His authority, unique in His pride, one and only in the perpetuity of His intransience, fair with His creatures,knowing of His issue, and noble in delaying His punishment. O my God, my requests are aimed at You and my hopes are addressed to You exclusively. As to all items of goodness that You have granted me the success to attain, it is You Who is my guide to them and my path towards them. O Omnipotent Who cannot be thwarted by requests! O All-encompassing to Whom desirous ones resort! I have been always endued with bounties from You and accustomed to receive conferrals and generosity from You. I beseech You in the name of the omnipotence to which all things are applicable, in the name of Your unstoppable decree that You may stop by the simplest entreaty, and in the name of the look with which You looked at the mountains and they thus towered, at the layers of the earth and they thus flattened, at the heavens and they thus rose,and at the seas and they thus gushed ; O He Who is too Majestic to have the human beings’ organs of sight and Who is too Subtle to be comprehended by the finest line of thinking. Whenever You, O my master, are praised, this is due to a bestowal of success that You grant and that requires (us) to praise You for it. Whenever You are thanked for the least of Your favors, this requires (us) to thank You for this thanking of ours for You. Then, at what time can Your bounties be calculated, O my God, or can Your errands be recompensed, O my Lord, or can Your favors be paid off, O my Master? It is one of Your bounties that praisers praise You and it is one of Your thankworthy acts that thanksgivers thank You. You are also the trusted for pardoning sins, the One Who stretches the wing of Your covering on the wrongdoers, and the One Who relieves from harm with Your Hand.Too many have been the sins that Your forbearance concealed until they became hidden and too many are the good deeds that Your favoring multiplied until Your reward for them became massive. You are too Majestic for us to anticipate anything from You save justice and to desire for anything from You save good turn and favoring. So, (please) endue me with the favors that are incumbent upon You on the basis of Your graciousness and do not disappoint me of that which is required by Your justice. My Master, if the earth knew about my sins, it would swallow me ; if mountains knew about them, they would collapse on me ; if heavens knew about them, they would snatch me ; and if oceans knew about them, they would down me! My Master! My Master! My Master! My Lord! My Lord! My Lord! Frequent has been my standing up in Your hospitability ; so, (please) do not deprive me of that which You have promised those who present themselves for praying You. O Well-known by the cognitive ones! O Served by the worshippers! O Thanked by the thanksgivers! O Present in the sessions of the mindful ones! O Praised by the praisers of Him! O Nearby to those who seek for Him! O Described by those who profess His Oneness! O Dearest of those who love Him!O Aide of those who require Him! O Purpose of those who turn to Him frequently! O He save Whom none knows the hidden! O He save Whom none fends off evil! O He save Whom none manages the affairs! O He save Whom none forgives sins! O He save Whom none creates the created beings! O He save Whom none brings down rain! Pour down blessings upon Muhammad and Muhammad’s Household and forgive me, O best of all forgivers. O my Lord, I do implore for Your forgiveness timidly. I implore for Your forgiveness hopefully. I implore for Your forgiveness turning to You frequently. I implore for Your forgiveness desiring for You. I implore for Your forgiveness, fearing You. I implore for Your forgiveness obediently. I implore for Your forgiveness having faith in You. I implore for Your forgiveness professing of You. I implore for Your forgiveness sincerely. I implore for Your forgiveness piously. I implore for Your forgiveness, having full trust in You. I implore for Your forgiveness, showing submission to You. I implore for Your forgiveness, dedicating all my acts to You and fleeing from You towards You. So, (please) pour down blessings upon Muhammad and Muhammad’s Household and accept my and my parents’ repentance through the means by which You did and will accept the repentance of all Your creatures. O most merciful of all those who show mercy! O He Who is called the All-forgiving, the All-merciful. O He Who is called the All-forgiving, the All-merciful. O He Who is called the All-forgiving, the All-merciful. Pour down blessings upon Muhammad and Muhammad’s Household, accept my repentance, purify my deed, appreciate my efforts, have mercy upon my imploration, do not interdict my voice, and do not frustrate my prayers. O Aide of those who seek aid! And (please) convey my salutations and my prayers to my Leaders, accept their intercession for me with You in all of that which I have asked You for, deliver my present to them in a way befitting their status, and multiply that for them in a way befitting You with such folds that cannot be counted by anyone other than You. There is neither might nor power except with Allah the All-High and All-great. May Allah bless the purest of the Messengers Muhammad and his Immaculate Household.

If you want to say goodbye to him, do it with what you called when you said goodbye to the Prophet (S) :

لاَ جَعَلَهُ اللَّهُ آخِرَ تَسْلِيمِي عَلَيْكَ ، السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا وَلِيَّ اللَّهِ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ
اللَّهُمَّ لا تَجْعَلْهُ اخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنْ زِيارَتِي ابْنَ نَبِيِّكَ وَحُجَّتِكَ عَلَى خَلْقِكَ وَاجْمَعْنِي وَإِيَّاهُ فِي جَنَّتِكَ ، وَاحْشُرْنِي مَعَهُ وَفِي حِزْبِهِ مَعَ الشُّهَداءِ وَالصَّالِحِينَ وَحَسُنَ أُولَئِكَ رَفِيقاً وَأَسْتَوْدِعُكَ اللَّهَ وَأَسْتَرْعِيكَ وَأَقْرَأُ عَلَيْكَ السَّلامُ ، امَنَّا بِاللَّهِ وَبِالرَّسُولِ ، وَبِما جِئْتَ وَدَلَلْتَ عَلَيْهِ فَاكْتُبْنا مَعَ الشَّاهِدِينَ

La ja’alahullah akhira taslimi alayka, alssalamu `alayka ya waliyya allahi wa rahmatu allahi wa barakatu, allahumma la taj`alhu akhira al`ahdi min ziyarati ibna nabiyyika wa hujjatika `ala khalqika wajma`ni wa iyyahu fi jannatika wahshurni ma`ahu wa fi hizbihi ma`a alshshuhad¡'i wa sahilin wa hasuna ula'ika rafiqan wa astawdi`uka allaha wa astar`ika wa aqra'a `alayka salam, a manna billahi wa bilrrassouli wa bima ji'ta wa dalalta `alayhi faktubna ma`a alshshahidina

Allah may not decide this compliment of me to be the last. Peace and Allah’s mercy and blessings be upon you, O Allah’s authority. O Allah, (please) do not decide this visit to be the last of my visit to the son of Your Prophet and Your argument against Your creatures. Include me with him in Your Paradise and involve me with him and with his group with the martyrs and the righteous ones ; and excellent the companionship of these is. I entrust you with Allah, ask Him to keep you under His custody, and invoke His blessings upon you. We believe in Allah, in the Messenger, and in whatever you have come with and instructed. So, (please) write us down with those who bear witness.

children.name: 1- Tombs of great scholars buried at the mausoleum of Imam ar-Redha (A)

text.html:
a) Sheikh Hassan Ali Mikdadi Noukhoudgei

Sheikh Hassan Ali Mikdadi Noukhoudgei is buried in a placé in the mausoleum called 'Sahne Inqelab'. To visit his Tomb, ask the people who work at the mausoleum, quoting the name of the place. In the following pages you will see the exact place where he is buried. Note that there is no distinctive sign to identify the grave.

His name comes from the countryside where he lived, that is, Noukhoud. He was born on 15 Dhul Qa’dah 1279 AH.

His son told his father that he was in the service of people for much of his time.

One day, his son suggested that he set a time limit for each interview. He replied, « My son, who works for God and helps His creatures, should not allocate a limited time»

Sheikh woke up early to pray the 'shab' prayer and then answered people's questions all morning and afternoon, he taught at school.

He died on 15 Sha'ban of the year 1361 AH and was buried in the mausoleum of Imam ar-Redha. He knew where he would be buried. Indeed, he was buried where he taught most of his life.

b) Allama Al-fadl ibn al Hassan Tabarsi

His grave is located at the exit named « Sheik Tabresi ». He was born in the year 469 AH in Mashhad. He was a great scholar and interpreter of the Qur’an. He has also written one of the most renowned books in this field whose name is Majma 'al-Bayan.

He mastered Arabic perfectly. His exegesis (explanation) of the Quran is recognized as the most complete.61

He died in 548 AH.62

c) Cheikh al Hour al-Ameli

He was born on 8 Rajab 1033 AH in southern Lebanon. He is known to have written Wasail al-Shia. This is a compilation book of Hadith.

He spent the first forty years of his life in Syria before leaving for Iraq and then for Mashhad where he passed away.

He died on 21 Ramadan 1104 AH at the age of 71.63

d) Cheikh Bahai

Sheikh Bahai al-Din al-Ameli said Sheikh Bahai was born in 953 AH in Lebanon. He emigrated at the age of 13 with his father to Iran. 88 books were written by Sheikh Bahai. He died around 1030 AH in Isfahan but was buried at the Imam ar-Redha (A) mausoleum.64

61: Ganjineh Danishmandan, volume 7, page 111
62: Moustadrak al Wassail, volume 3, page 110
63: Amal al-amil
64: Bour-hane Azad, page 143

children.name: 2- Imamzadeh (children of Imams) buried in Mashhad

text.html:
It should be noted that many descendants of imams are buried in Mashhad. Unfortunately, since their graves are a bit far from our path, they are not all mentioned in the book.

a) Imamzadeh Mohammad

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امامزاده سید محمد (گنبد خشتی) . در ابتدای خیابان طبرسی . در کوچه ای به همین نام در مجاورت کوچه سیاه آب قرار دارد.

The Tomb is at the exit of the corridor « Sheikh Tabarssi » Imamzadeh Mohammad is buried in à place called Gonbade Kheshti, near the Imam ar-Redha (A) mausoleum. He is of the descendants of Imam al-Kadhim (A). He died in the year 832 AH.65

b) Imamzadeh Sayed Nassir et Yassir

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امامزاده ناصر و یاسر . در روستای گلستان واقع در 5 کیلومتری غرب مشهد (مسیر مشهد به طرقبه ) قرار گرفته است .

They are the sons of Imam Musa al-Kadhim (A). When Imam ar-Redha (A) immigrated to Mashhad, they accompanied him.66

text.html:
a) Khaje Abasalt-e-Heravi

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه خواجه اباصلت هروی . کنار جاده مشهد تهران به فاصله 12 کیلومتری شهر مشهد قرار دارد . در 3 کیلومتری آرامگاه خواجه مراد (اعین بن هرثمه) قرار دارد .

He was born in the year 160 AH in Medina. He was a servant and a trusted man of Imam ar-Redha (A). He was one of the greatest narrators of Hadith. He died on 17 Sawwal of the year 236 AH. He is buried 14 kilometers from Mashhad.

There is a hadith by the name of Silsilat dhahab, which was conveyed to us by this servant. This hadith will be described in depth in the Nishapour part.67

b) Khaje Mourad

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه خواجه مراد (اعین بن هرثمه) . در 15 کیلومتری جنوب شرق مشهد در طرف جنوب جاده فریمان و در دامنه ارتفاعات امداد از رشته کوه بینالود قرار دارد . در 3 کیلومتری آرامگاه خواجه اباصلت هروی قرار دارد.

His name is Harsame ibn Ayoune but he is called Khaje Mourad because he fulfilled the wishes of the believers who came to him. He was among the followers of Imam ar-Redha (A). He was with the Imam when he immigrated to Mashhad. He died in the year 210 AH. He is buried three kilometers from Abasalt-e-Heravi and twelve kilometers from Mashhad.68

67: Oyone akhbare Riza , volume 2 , page 182
Tazhib Tahzib, volume 2, page 457
68: www.citypedia.ir
www.makanbin.com

children.name: Izne Dukhul common to all Ziyarats

text.html:
(Stand in front of the forecourt and recite the Izne Dukhul) :

اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي وَقَفْتُ عَلَى بَابٍ مِنْ أَبْوَابِ بُيُوتِ نَبِيِّكَ صَلَوَاتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ وَ قَدْ مَنَعْتَ النَّاسَ أَنْ يَدْخُلُوا إِلا بِإِذْنِهِ فَقُلْتَ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لا تَدْخُلُوا بُيُوتَ النَّبِيِّ إِلا أَنْ يُؤْذَنَ لَكُمْ اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْتَقِدُ حُرْمَةَ صَاحِبِ هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ الشَّرِيفِ فِي غَيْبَتِهِ كَمَا أَعْتَقِدُهَا فِي حَضْرَتِهِ وَ أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ رَسُولَكَ وَ خُلَفَاءَكَ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ أَحْيَاءٌ عِنْدَكَ يُرْزَقُونَ يَرَوْنَ مَقَامِي وَ يَسْمَعُونَ كَلامِي وَ يَرُدُّونَ سَلامِي وَ أَنَّكَ حَجَبْتَ عَنْ سَمْعِي كَلامَهُمْ وَ فَتَحْتَ بَابَ فَهْمِي بِلَذِيذِ مُنَاجَاتِهِمْ وَ إِنِّي أَسْتَأْذِنُكَ يَا رَبِّ أَوَّلا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ رَسُولَكَ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ ثَانِيا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ خَلِيفَتَكَ الْإِمَامَ الْمَفْرُوضَ عَلَيَّ طَاعَتُهُ

(say the name of the imam you are visiting)

وَ الْمَلائِكَةَ الْمُوَكَّلِينَ بِهَذِهِ الْبُقْعَةِ الْمُبَارَكَةِ ثَالِثا أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا حُجَّةَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا مَلائِكَةَ اللَّهِ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ الْمُقِيمِينَ فِي هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ فَأْذَنْ لِي يَا مَوْلايَ فِي الدُّخُولِ أَفْضَلَ مَا أَذِنْتَ لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ أَوْلِيَائِكَ فَإِنْ لَمْ أَكُنْ أَهْلا لِذَلِكَ فَأَنْتَ أَهْلٌ لِذَلِكَ

O Allah, I am standing at the door of one of the houses of Your Prophet; Your peace be upon him and his family. You have prohibited the people from entering his house except by the permission of Your Prophet and You said: {O You who believe do not enter the house of the Prophet unless permitted to do so} O Allah, I believe in this in his absence just as I believe it in his presence and I know that Your Prophet and Your vicegerents upon whom be peace, are Alive in Your presence, they are being nourished, they see my position and hear my speech and they return my greetings and (I believe) that You have covered my ears from hearing their speech and have opened the door of perception of their secret conversations (with You); I seek Your permission first, O’ my Lord; then I seek the permission of Your Prophet_ peace be upon him and his family_ secondly, and I seek the permission of Your vicegerent, Imam Hussain Bin Ali (a) whose obedience is incumbent upon me and (the permission of) Your angels entrusted over this blessed site thirdly. May I enter, O Prophet of Allah, may I enter O the proof of Allah, may I enter, O angels of Allah who are stationed close to this shrine, so permit me O my master to enter the best of way that You have permitted any of Your friends, if I am not deserving of that then You surely are deserving of that.

Allahhumma innee wa qafto alla babinn min abwabe boyute nabiyyeka salawaatoka a’layhe wa alehi, wa qad mana’ta ann-nasa ann yad kholu illa be idhnehi faqulta yaa ayyohal ladhina aamanu laa tad kholu boyutan-nabiyeenn illa ann yu dha na lakum, allahhumma inni aa’ataqedo hurmata sahebe hadha al mash-hade ash-shareefe, fee ghaybatehi kamaa aa’ataqedoha fee hazratehi,wa aa’alamo anna rasoolaka wa kholafaoka alayhome assalaamo ahhyao indaka yurzaqoona,yarawna maqaamee wa yasmaoona kalamee wa yarudduna salamee,wa annaka hajabta ann sam’ee kalamahum wa fatahhta baba fahmi be ladide munajatehim,wa inni astadhenoka yaa rabbe awwalan,wa astadenu rasoolaka sallallaaho a’layhe wa aalehi thaneyan, wa asstadheno khalayafataka al-imamal mafruza alaiyya ta aatohu al-hussaynabna Aliyan alayhissalamo,wal malaaa-ekata al-mowakkalina behadhehi al-buq’aatil mobarakate thalethan, aa adkhulu yaa rasoolallahe, aa adkhulu yaa hujjatallaahe, aa adkhulu yaa malaaa-ekatallahe al-moqarrabina al-muqimeena fee hadha al mash-hade,fa dann lee yaa maulaee feedd-dokhule,afdhala maa adinta laa hadinn min awleyaaa-eka, fa inn lam akun ahlann ledaleka fa anta ahlun le dhaleka.

children.name: Ziyarat to the children of Imams (A)

text.html:
Sayyed 'Alî Ibn Ta'us (may God be pleased with him) reported in Misbah az-Za'ir two ziyarat with whom one visits the children of the Imam (A).

The first ziyarat to the children of Imams

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها السَّيّدُ الزَّكِيُّ الطَّاهِرُ الْوَلِيُّ وَالدَّاعِي الْحَفِيُّ ، أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ قُلْتَ حَقَّاً وَنَطَقْتَ حَقّاً وَصِدْقاً وَدَعَوْتَ إِلَى مَوْلايَ وَمَوْلاكَ عَلانِيَةً وَسِرّاً ، فازَ مُتَّبِعُكَ وَنَجا مُصَدّقُكَ وَخابَ وَخَسِرَ مُكَذّبُكَ وَالْمُتَخَلِّفُ عَنْكَ ، إشْهَدْ لِي بِهذِهِ الشَّهَادَةِ لأِكُونَ مِنَ الْفائِزِينَ بِمَعْرِفَتِكَ وَطاعَتِكَ وَتَصْدِيقِكَ وَاتّباعِكَ ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا سَيّدِي وَابْنَ سَيّدِي
أَنْتَ بابُ اللَّهِ الْمُؤْتَى وَالْمَأْخُوذُ عَنْهُ
أَتَيْتُكَ زائِراً وَحاجاتِي لَكَ مُسْتَوْدِعاً وَها أَنَا ذا أَسْتَوْدِعُكَ دِينِي وَأَمانَتِي وَخَواتِيمَ عَمَلِي وَجَوامِعَ أَمَلِي إِلَى مُنْتَهَى أَجَلِي
وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ

Assalamo alayka ayyohas sayyeduz zakiyut taheerul waliyyo wad da’eeyil hafeeyo, ash'hado annak qul'taa haqqan wa nataq'taa haqqan wa sidqan wa da’aw'taa ela mawlaya wa mawlak aala niyatan wa sirra, faaz muttabeok wa naja mosaddeqok wa khab wa khaser mokadhebok wal motakhallefo ankaa, ish'had lee be hadeheesh shahadate le akun menal faizeen be marefatek wa taa'tek wa tas'deeqek wat'tabayek was salamo alayka ya sayyidi wab'na sayyidi antaa babul'llahil mowta wal makhuzoo an'hu. Atay'tok zaeran wa hajatee lak mus'taw dean waha aana zaa astawdi‘ook deeni wa amanatee wa khawateema aamalee wa jawameaa aamali elaa munta'haa aajali, was salamo alyek wa rahmtullahe waba rakatooh.

Peace be upon you, O the noble, pure, purified, beloved and a prudent preacher. I bear witness that verily you told aright and spoke truth and invited to my and your lord publicly and secretly. Successful is one who obeyed you, survived who testified you while disappointed and lost who disapproved and opposed you. Be the witness of my acknowledgment of you, my compliance, ratification and obedience of you. Peace be upon you, O my lord and son of my lord. You are the door from where (benefit) is provided and taken. I have come to you for pilgrimage and ask you for my needs. Fulfil my needs of religion, duty, (better) costs of my deeds and (fulfil) all my hopes before my death. Peace, mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you.

The second ziyârat to the children of Imams

السَّلامُ عَلَى جَدّكَ الْمُصْطَفَى
السَّلامُ عَلَى أَبِيكَ الْمُرْتَضَى الرّضا
السَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ
السَّلامُ عَلَى خَدِيجَةَ أُمّ سَيّدَةِ نِساءِ الْعالَمِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَى فاطِمَةَ أُمّ الأَئِمَّةِ الطَّاهِرِينَ
السَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ بُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزَّاخِرَةِ شُفَعائِي فِي الآخِرَةِ وَأَوْلِيائِي عِنْدَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ إِلَى الْعِظامِ النَّاخِرَةِ أَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقّ
السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها الشَّخْصُ الشَّرِيفُ الطَّاهِرُ الْكَرِيمُ
أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ
وَأَنَّ عَلِيّاً وَلِيُّهُ وَمُجْتَبَاهُ وَأَنَّ الإْمامَةَ فِي وُلْدِهِ إِلَى يَوْمِ الدّينِ
نَعْلَمُ ذلِكَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ وَنَحْنُ لِذلِكَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفِي نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ .

Assalamo aala jaddekal mus'tafa, assalamo aala abeekal murtadhaa ridha, assalamo aala sayyedani'l hasane wal Hussain, assalamo aala khadijat umma sayyedatin nisaiil aa’lamin, assalamo aala fatemata ummil ayimmati't twahereen, assalamo aala nufuseel fakherate bihureel uluum zakherate shofaa'ii feel aakherate wa awlayi inda aawdee ruhe elal edhami nakherate aimmatil khalqee wa wolateel haqqe, assalamo alayka ayyoh'sh shakhso shareefu taherul kareemo, ash'hado an la elaha illallahoo wa an mohammadan abdohu wa mus'tafahu wa anna aliyen wa waliyyohu wa mujtabahoo wa annal imamata fee wul'dehi ela yawmid deen, na’alamo dhaleka ilmal yaqeen wa nahno le dhaleka mu’taqeduna wa fee nas'rehim mujtahedun.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, peace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace be upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of creatures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

Ziyarat to the daughters of Imams (A)

السَّلامُ اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ جَدِّكِ الْمُصْطَفى‏، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى اَبيكِ الْمُرْتَضَى الرِّضا، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيِّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ خَديجَةَ اُمِّ سَيِّدَةِ نِساءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ فاطِمَةَ اُمِّ الْائِمَّةِ الطاهِرينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ، وَبُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزَّاخِرَةِ، وَشُفَعائى فِى الْآخِرَةِ، وَاَوْلِيائى عِندَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ الَى الْعِظامِ الناخِرَةِ، اَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقِّ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكِ اَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الشَّريفَةُ الطاهِرَةُ الْكَريمَةُ، اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا الهَ الَّا اللَّهُ، وَاَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ، وَاَنَّ عَليّاً وَليُّهُ وَمُجْتَباهُ، وَاَنَّ الْاِمامَةَ فى وُلْدِهِ الى‏ يَوْمِ الدينِ، نَعْلَمُ ذلِكَ عِلْمَ اْليَقينِ، وَنَحْنُ لِذلِكَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفى نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ.

Assalaamo alaa jaddekil mustafaa, assalaamo alaa abeekil murtadhee ar redhaa, assalaamo alaa as-sayyedaynil hasane wal husayne, assalaamo alaa khadijata umme sayyedate nesaail aalamina, assalaamo alaa faatemata ummil a-immatit taaherina, assalaamo alaa an-nofusil faakherate, wa johuril olumiz zaakherate, wa shofa’aaee feel aakherate, wa awliyaaee inda awdir roohe alal edhaame an-naakherate, a-immatil khalqe wa wulaatil haqqin, assalaamo a’layke ayyatohan nafso ash-shareefato at-taaheratul kareemato, ash-hado an laa elaaha illallaaho, wa anna muhammadan abdohu wa mustafaao, wa anna alayyan waliyyohu wa mujtabaao, wa annal imaamata fee wuldehi alaa yawmiddine, na’a-lamo dhaaleka ilmal yaqeene, wa nahno le dhaaleka mu’ataqeduna wafee nasrehim mujtaheduna.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, peace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace be upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of creatures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat (Leadership of Ummah) is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

children.name: 1- History of the city of Nishapour

text.html:
Nishapour is about 100 kilometers from Mashhad. It is a very visited place largely because there is the footprint of Imam ar-Redha (A). During his visit to Nishapour, the imam was warmly welcomed. Everyone had gathered, Sunni scholars too. The imam stayed a few days in Nishapour and Sunni scholars took the opportunity to ask him for a hadith. It was then that the Imam uttered the following hadith. This hadith is known as the hadith of the golden chain because each transmitter of the hadith is a maasum (infallible) :

My father, Musa bin Al-kadhim (A), narrated to me from his father, Ja‘far as-Sàdiq (A), who narrated from his father, Muhammad Al-Baqir (A), who narrated from his father, ‘Ali Zayn Al-Abidin (A), who narrated from his father, al-Husayn (A), who narrated from his father, ‘Ali bin Abi Tālib, who said, I heard the Prophet (S) saying, "I heard Jibrail saying", ‘The Almighty Allāh said,

"I surely am the God besides whom there is no god, so worship Me. Whoever comes with the testimony of tawhid sincerely, he has surely entered My castle ; and whoever enters My castle, he shall be protected from My chastisement."

Then the Imam added that this salvation is guaranteed "with its conditions; and I am one of its conditions." That is, together with tawhid, one must also believe in other fundamentals of Islam like nubuwwa and imamat in order to gain salvation in the hereafter.69

69: https://www.al-islam.org/islam-faith-practice-history-sayyid-muhammad-rizvi/lesson-45-eighth-im%C4%81m-al%C4%AB-ibn-musa Al Kàfi, volume 1, page 442 ; Wasail al-Shia, volume 6, page 224

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس قدمگاه رضوی . در 24 کیلومتری شرق نیشابور و در مسیر جاده نیشابور به مشهد قرار گرفته است .

This is the footprint of Imam ar-Redha (A). On his journey to Mashhad, the Imam passed through Nishapour and left this imprint. Imam ar-Redha (A), when he stopped at Nishapour in the year 200 AH, made Tayammum on the earth because there was no water. That's when water came out of the earth.70

70: Bargahe khanghah darkavire haft kasse, page 255 ; Tarikhe idjtemaei-e- jahrom dar ghoroune gozashte, page 173

children.name: 3- Imamzadeh (children of Imams) buried in Nishapour

text.html:
It should be noted that many descendants of imams are buried in Nishapour. Unfortunately, since their graves are a bit far from our course, they are not all mentioned in the book.

Imamzadeh Mohammad Mahrouk and Ibrahim

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه امامزاده محمد محروق . جوار باغ خیام در کنار آرامگاه عمر خیام است .

Imamzadeh Mohammad Mahrouk was one of the descendants of Imam Sajjad (A). He was an opponent of the caliph of his time and he was murdered. He is called Mahrouk (burned) because his body was burned and his ashes were distributed.
Imamzadeh Ibhrahim is one of the sons of Imam al-Kadhim (A). He is buried next to Imamzadeh Mohammad Mahrouk.71

71: Emamzadegan Iran wa boggae motebarrake, page 282

a) Fazl ibn Shazane

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه فضل بن شاذان . شرق میدان بهشت فضل واقع شده است .

He is a great scholar and student of four imams who are the 8th, 9th, 10th and 11th imam. He wrote nearly 180 books. He died in the year 260 AH.72

b) Bibi Shatita

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه بی بی شطیطه . خیابان امام خمینی (ره) میدان بی بی شطیطه . خیابان بانو پسنده ( آرامگاه پسنده در فاصله حدود 100 متری آرامگاه بانو پسنده واقع شده است ) .

The people of Nishapour had chosen Mohammad Nishapouri to hand over their Khums money to Imam al-Kadhim (A). When Mohammad Nishapouri was going to see the imam in Medina to give him the money, Bibi Shatita gave him a dirham and a cloth. Mohammad Nishapouri, amazed by the low value of the sum and the fabric, told him that he was ashamed to give such a small sum to the Imam. Bibi Shatita replied that even if the sum was small, it was her duty to pay. « What is my responsibility is only this sum, she told him. I want that when I meet God, the right of my Imam is considered acquitted. »

Mohammad Nishapouri took the sum and went to Medina to see Imam al-Kadhim (A).

During his meeting with the Imam, he asked him for the fabric and Bibi Shatita's piece. He gave the rest of the money back to Mohammad Nishapouri. Then the Imam looked at him and told him to pass his greetings to Bibi Shatita. He gave 40 dirhams and the piece of cloth to Mohammad Nishapouri and asked him to hand them over to Bibi Shatita and tell her to make this cloth her shroud. He also asked her to tell him that as soon as she received the sum and the cloth, she would have only 19 days left to live. Among the 40 dirhams, he told her to use 16 dirhams for her and 24 dirhams for the Sadaka and for the preparations for her burial. He also told her that he would perform his own funeral prayer.

It should be noted that all those whose money had been returned by the Imam deviated from the right path. Near the Tomb of Bibi Shatita is the Tomb of Banou Passande. (See following part).73

c) Banu Passande ou Passandide

Address in Persian to facilitate your movements :

آدرس آرامگاه بانو پسنده یا پسندیده . خیابان بانو پسنده . میدان بی بی شطیطه .

When Imam went through Nishapour in the year 200 AH, people all hoped that the Imam would go home. But Imam chose a lady who was pious ; she was known as Banu Passande or Passandide.

Note that near the Tomb of Banou Passande is the Tomb of Bibi Shatita. (see previous part)74

73: Mikyalul Makarim, volume 1, page 118
Managheb, volume 4, page 292

children.name: Izne Dukhul common to all Ziyarats

text.html:
(Stand in front of the forecourt and recite the Izne Dukhul) :

اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي وَقَفْتُ عَلَى بَابٍ مِنْ أَبْوَابِ بُيُوتِ نَبِيِّكَ صَلَوَاتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ وَ قَدْ مَنَعْتَ النَّاسَ أَنْ يَدْخُلُوا إِلا بِإِذْنِهِ فَقُلْتَ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لا تَدْخُلُوا بُيُوتَ النَّبِيِّ إِلا أَنْ يُؤْذَنَ لَكُمْ اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْتَقِدُ حُرْمَةَ صَاحِبِ هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ الشَّرِيفِ فِي غَيْبَتِهِ كَمَا أَعْتَقِدُهَا فِي حَضْرَتِهِ وَ أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ رَسُولَكَ وَ خُلَفَاءَكَ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ أَحْيَاءٌ عِنْدَكَ يُرْزَقُونَ يَرَوْنَ مَقَامِي وَ يَسْمَعُونَ كَلامِي وَ يَرُدُّونَ سَلامِي وَ أَنَّكَ حَجَبْتَ عَنْ سَمْعِي كَلامَهُمْ وَ فَتَحْتَ بَابَ فَهْمِي بِلَذِيذِ مُنَاجَاتِهِمْ وَ إِنِّي أَسْتَأْذِنُكَ يَا رَبِّ أَوَّلا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ رَسُولَكَ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ ثَانِيا وَ أَسْتَأْذِنُ خَلِيفَتَكَ الْإِمَامَ الْمَفْرُوضَ عَلَيَّ طَاعَتُهُ

(say the name of the imam you are visiting)

وَ الْمَلائِكَةَ الْمُوَكَّلِينَ بِهَذِهِ الْبُقْعَةِ الْمُبَارَكَةِ ثَالِثا أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا حُجَّةَ اللَّهِ أَ أَدْخُلُ يَا مَلائِكَةَ اللَّهِ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ الْمُقِيمِينَ فِي هَذَا الْمَشْهَدِ فَأْذَنْ لِي يَا مَوْلايَ فِي الدُّخُولِ أَفْضَلَ مَا أَذِنْتَ لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ أَوْلِيَائِكَ فَإِنْ لَمْ أَكُنْ أَهْلا لِذَلِكَ فَأَنْتَ أَهْلٌ لِذَلِكَ

O Allah, I am standing at the door of one of the houses of Your Prophet; Your peace be upon him and his family. You have prohibited the people from entering his house except by the permission of Your Prophet and You said: {O You who believe do not enter the house of the Prophet unless permitted to do so}. O Allah, I believe in this in his absence just as I believe it in his presence and I know that Your Prophet and Your vicegerents upon whom be peace, are Alive in Your presence, they are being nourished, they see my position and hear my speech and they return my greetings and (I believe) that You have covered my ears from hearing their speech and have opened the door of perception of their secret conversations (with You); I seek Your permission first, O’ my Lord; then I seek the permission of Your Prophet_ peace be upon him and his family_ secondly, and I seek the permission of Your vicegerent, Imam Hussain Bin Ali (a) whose obedience is incumbent upon me and (the permission of) Your angels entrusted over this blessed site thirdly. May I enter, O Prophet of Allah, may I enter O the proof of Allah, may I enter, O angels of Allah who are stationed close to this shrine, so permit me O my master to enter the best of way that You have permitted any of Your friends, if I am not deserving of that then You surely are deserving of that.

Allahhumma innee wa qafto alla babinn min abwabe boyute nabiyyeka salawaatoka a’layhe wa alehi, wa qad mana’ta ann-nasa ann yad kholu illa be idhnehi faqulta yaa ayyohal ladhina aamanu laa tad kholu boyutan-nabiyeenn illa ann yu dha na lakum, allahhumma inni aa’ataqedo hurmata sahebe hadha al mash-hade ash-shareefe, fee ghaybatehi kamaa aa’ataqedoha fee hazratehi,wa aa’alamo anna rasoolaka wa kholafaoka alayhome assalaamo ahhyao indaka yurzaqoona,yarawna maqaamee wa yasmaoona kalamee wa yarudduna salamee,wa annaka hajabta ann sam’ee kalamahum wa fatahhta baba fahmi be ladide munajatehim,wa inni astadhenoka yaa rabbe awwalan,wa astadenu rasoolaka sallallaaho a’layhe wa aalehi thaneyan, wa asstadheno khalayafataka al-imamal mafruza alaiyya ta aatohu al-hussaynabna Aliyan alayhissalamo,wal malaaa-ekata al-mowakkalina behadhehi al-buq’aatil mobarakate thalethan, aa adkhulu yaa rasoolallahe, aa adkhulu yaa hujjatallaahe, aa adkhulu yaa malaaa-ekatallahe al-moqarrabina al-muqimeena fee hadha al mash-hade,fa dann lee yaa maulaee feedd-dokhule,afdhala maa adinta laa hadinn min awleyaaa-eka, fa inn lam akun ahlann ledaleka fa anta ahlun le dhaleka.

children.name: Ziyarat to the children of Imams (A)

text.html:
Sayyed 'Alî Ibn Ta'us (may God be pleased with him) reported in Misbah az-Za'ir two ziyarat with whom one visits the children of the Imam (A).

The first ziyârat to the children of Imams

السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها السَّيّدُ الزَّكِيُّ الطَّاهِرُ الْوَلِيُّ وَالدَّاعِي الْحَفِيُّ ، أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ قُلْتَ حَقَّاً وَنَطَقْتَ حَقّاً وَصِدْقاً وَدَعَوْتَ إِلَى مَوْلايَ وَمَوْلاكَ عَلانِيَةً وَسِرّاً ، فازَ مُتَّبِعُكَ وَنَجا مُصَدّقُكَ وَخابَ وَخَسِرَ مُكَذّبُكَ وَالْمُتَخَلِّفُ عَنْكَ ، إشْهَدْ لِي بِهذِهِ الشَّهَادَةِ لأِكُونَ مِنَ الْفائِزِينَ بِمَعْرِفَتِكَ وَطاعَتِكَ وَتَصْدِيقِكَ وَاتّباعِكَ ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا سَيّدِي وَابْنَ سَيّدِي
أَنْتَ بابُ اللَّهِ الْمُؤْتَى وَالْمَأْخُوذُ عَنْهُ
أَتَيْتُكَ زائِراً وَحاجاتِي لَكَ مُسْتَوْدِعاً وَها أَنَا ذا أَسْتَوْدِعُكَ دِينِي وَأَمانَتِي وَخَواتِيمَ عَمَلِي وَجَوامِعَ أَمَلِي إِلَى مُنْتَهَى أَجَلِي
وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ

Assalamo alayka ayyohas sayyeduz zakiyut taheerul waliyyo wad da’eeyil hafeeyo, ash'hado annak qul'taa haqqan wa nataq'taa haqqan wa sidqan wa da’aw'taa ela mawlaya wa mawlak aala niyatan wa sirra, faaz muttabeok wa naja mosaddeqok wa khab wa khaser mokadhebok wal motakhallefo ankaa, ish'had lee be hadeheesh shahadate le akun menal faizeen be marefatek wa taa'tek wa tas'deeqek wat'tabayek was salamo alayka ya sayyidi wab'na sayyidi antaa babul'llahil mowta wal makhuzoo an'hu. Atay'tok zaeran wa hajatee lak mus'taw dean waha aana zaa astawdi‘ook deeni wa amanatee wa khawateema aamalee wa jawameaa aamali elaa munta'haa aajali, was salamo alyek wa rahmtullahe waba rakatooh.

Peace be upon you, O the noble, pure, purified, beloved and a prudent preacher. I bear witness that verily you told aright and spoke truth and invited to my and your lord publicly and secretly. Successful is one who obeyed you, survived who testified you while disappointed and lost who disapproved and opposed you. Be the witness of my acknowledgment of you, my compliance, ratification and obedience of you. Peace be upon you, O my lord and son of my lord. You are the door from where (benefit) is provided and taken. I have come to you for pilgrimage and ask you for my needs. Fulfil my needs of religion, duty, (better) costs of my deeds and (fulfil) all my hopes before my death. Peace, mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you.

Ziyarat to the daughters of Imams (A)

اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ جَدِّكِ الْمُصْطَفى‏، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى اَبيكِ الْمُرْتَضَى الرِّضا، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيِّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ خَديجَةَ اُمِّ سَيِّدَةِ نِساءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ فاطِمَةَ اُمِّ الْائِمَّةِ الطاهِرينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ، وَبُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزَّاخِرَةِ، وَشُفَعائى فِى الْآخِرَةِ، وَاَوْلِيائى عِندَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ الَى الْعِظامِ الناخِرَةِ، اَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقِّ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكِ اَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الشَّريفَةُ الطاهِرَةُ الْكَريمَةُ، اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا الهَ الَّا اللَّهُ، وَاَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ، وَاَنَّ عَليّاً وَليُّهُ وَمُجْتَباهُ، وَاَنَّ الْاِمامَةَ فى وُلْدِهِ الى‏ يَوْمِ الدينِ، نَعْلَمُ ذلِكَ عِلْمَ اْليَقينِ، وَنَحْنُ لِذلِكَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفى نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ.

Assalaamo alaa jaddekil mustafaa, assalaamo alaa abeekil murtadhee ar redhaa, assalaamo alaa as-sayyedaynil hasane wal husayne, assalaamo alaa khadijata umme sayyedate nesaail aalamina, assalaamo alaa faatemata ummil a-immatit taaherina, assalaamo alaa an-nofusil faakherate, wa johuril olumiz zaakherate, wa shofa’aaee feel aakherate, wa awliyaaee inda awdir roohe alal edhaame an-naakherate, a-immatil khalqe wa wulaatil haqqin, assalaamo a’layke ayyatohan nafso ash-shareefato at-taaheratul kareemato, ash-hado an laa elaaha illallaaho, wa anna muhammadan abdohu wa mustafaao, wa anna alayyan waliyyohu wa mujtabaao, wa annal imaamata fee wuldehi alaa yawmiddine, na’a-lamo dhaaleka ilmal yaqeene, wa nahno le dhaaleka mu’ataqeduna wafee nasrehim mujtaheduna.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, peace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace be upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of creatures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat (Leadership of Ummah) is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

The land of Najaf is sacred and was a land of refuge for the Prophets.
According to some interpretations of the Holy Qur’an, when God said to Prophet Moses (A) « Take off your sandals as you are in the Holy valley of Tuwa »1 , he was referring to the sacred holy land of Najaf.2

. Some hadiths state the land of Najaf is a source of blessings for this world and for Barzakh and the Day of Resurrection. Therefore, whoever dies on the land oNajaf and/or is buried there will not fear the grave or its pressure (fishare kabr).3

One day, Imam Ali (A) came across the land of Najaf while he was the leader of Kufa. He admired the holy land and said « O land of Najaf, how beautiful you are! How nice and pure you are! Oh my God, make this earth my tomb! »4

And he asked his children in his will to bury him on this hill of Najaf.5

Dua to recite at the entrance of the city of Najaf :

الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِی هَدَانَا لِهَذَا وَ مَا کُنَّا لِنَهْتَدِیَ لَوْ لا أَنْ هَدَانَا اللَّهُ، الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِی سَیَّرَنِی فِی بِلادِهِ، وَ حَمَلَنِی عَلَى دَوَابِّهِ، وَ طَوَى لِیَ الْبَعِیدَ، وَ صَرَفَ عَنِّی الْمَحْذُورَ، وَ دَفَعَ عَنِّی الْمَکْرُوهَ، حَتَّى أَقْدَمَنِی حَرَمَ أَخِی رَسُولِهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَیْهِ وَ آلِهِ.

All praise be to Allah Who has guided us to this; and we would not have found the way had it not been that Allah had guided us. All praise be to Allah Who has made me travel in His realms, Who has caused me to ride His animals, Who has made the distant space seem near for me, Who has kept away from me what is perilous, and Who has held off against me what is unwanted until He made me come up to the precinct of the brother of His Messenger, peace be upon him and his progeny.

Alhamdu lillaahil ladhee hadaanaa lehaadhaa wa maa kunnaa, le nahtadeya lawlaa an hadaanallaah, alhamdu lillaahil ladhee sayyaranee fee belaadehi, wa hamalanee a’laa dawaaabbehi, wa twawaa leyal bae’eda, wa swarafa a’nnil mahdhoor, wa dafa-a’ a’nnil makrooh, hattaa aqdamanee harama akhee rasoolehi swallallaaho a’layhe wa aalehi.

Enter the city and say :

الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِی أَدْخَلَنِی هَذِهِ الْبُقْعَةَ الْمُبَارَکَةَ الَّتِی بَارَکَ اللَّهُ فِیهَا،وَ اخْتَارَهَا لِوَصِیِّ نَبِیِّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ فَاجْعَلْهَا شَاهِدَةً لِی. اللَّهُمَّ لِبَابِکَ وَقَفْتُ،وَ بِفِنَائِکَ نَزَلْتُ، وَ بِحَبْلِکَ اعْتَصَمْتُ، وَ لِرَحْمَتِکَ تَعَرَّضْتُ، وَ بِوَلِیِّکَ صَلَوَاتُکَ عَلَیْهِ تَوَسَّلْتُ، فَاجْعَلْهَا زِیَارَةً مَقْبُولَةً، وَ دُعَاءً مُسْتَجَاباً.

All praise be to Allah Who has allowed me to enter this blessed precinct, which Allah has blessed and has chosen for His Prophet’s successor. O Allah, (please do) make this zone witness for me. O Allah, I have stopped at Your door, I have come to Your court, to Your cord do I cling, Your mercy do I seek, and by Your intimate servant—may Your blessings be upon him—do I beg You. So, (please do) make it an admissible visit and a responded supplication.

Alhamdu lillaahil ladhee adkhalanee haadhehil buq-a’tal mubaarakatal latee baarakallaaho feeha, wakh-taarahaa lewaswiyye nabiyyehi, Allaahumma faj-a’lhaa shaahedatan lee.
