Safi Safa Yamani was a notable from Yemen. He was buried in Najaf by Imam Ali (A). His tomb is located to the west of Imam Ali's haram (A), near Maqam Imam Zaynul Abideen (A).

It was reported that one day, near Najaf, Imam Ali (A) saw an individual walking with the body of a man on a camel. The traveler told him that it was the body of his late father and that he wanted to bury him in this place : in fact, the latter had, during his lifetime, issued a vow to be buried on this earth because a noble person would also rest there one day ; and through it, many more people would be forgiven. The Imam asked him if he knew this person. No, he replied. Ali (A) then said three times: « By God, this man is me » He then undertook to bury him.

Ayatullah Sayyad Ali Husseini As -Sistani was born on 9 Rabbi-ul-Awwal 1349 after Hijra in Mashad in Iran. His lineage goes back to Imam Hussein (A). He began his Islamic studies in 1360 A.H. Among his teachers, were distinguished and great scholars such as Ayatullah Burujardi, Ayatullah Khoei or Sheikh Hussein Hilli. In 1380 AH, Ayatullah Khoei and Sheikh Hilli granted him the supreme rank of Ijtehad, conferring on him the title of Mujtahid.

His house is at a distance of only 30 to 40 meters from the haram of Imam Ali (A).
Imam Khomeini lived in this house about 12 years after being exiled by the Shah of Iran. It is located to the south of Imam Ali's haram (A).

Masjide Hannana is on the road of Kufa. The word « Hannana » means moans and lamentations. It took this name for two reasons :

1) The night of the 21st of the blessed month of Ramadhan in the year 40 AH, while the body of Imam Ali (A) was passing through this place, complaints arose from a building. A masjid was built at this place, and was given the name of Masjidia Hannana.25

2) After the martyrdom of Imam Hussein (A), the prisoners of Karbala stopped there. Moans and tears were heard again. The head of Imam Hussein (A) was placed inside this masjid, and today we still find in this sacred building a place called « Maqame Ra'sse Hussein (A) » or « the place of the head of Imam Hussein (A) ». According to some historians, the noble head of Imam Hussein (A) was buried there.26 Therefore pilgrims are recommended to recite the Ziyarat of the holy head of Imam Hussein (A), mentioned above :

السَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا بْنَ رَسُولِ اللهِ ، السَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا بْنَ أَمِیْرِ الْمؤمِنِینَ، السَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا بْنَ الصِّدِّیْقَةُ الطَّاهِرَةِ سَيِّدَةِ نِسآءِ العالَمِيْـنَ، السَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ يَا مَولايَ يَا أَبا عَبْدِ اللهِ وَرَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَ بَرَكاتُـهُ ، أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ قَدْ أَقَمْتَ الصَّلوةَ، وَ آتَيْتَ الزَّكوةَ، وَ أَمَرْتَ بِالْمعْرُوفِ، وَ نَهَيْتَ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ ، وَ تَلَوْتَ الْكِتابَ حَقِّ تِلاوَتِهِ، وَ جاهَدْتَ فِي اللهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهِ، وَ صَبَـرْتَ عَلی الْاذی فِي جَنْبِهِ، مُحْتَسِبًا حَتّی آتيكَ الْيَقِيـْنُ ، وَ أَشْهُدُ أَنَّ الَّذِينَ خَالَفُوكَ وَ حارَبُوكَ وَ أَنَّ الَّذِينَ خَذَلُوكَ وَالَّذِينَ قَـتَلُوكَ مَلْعُونُونَ عَلی لِسانِ النَّبِيِّ الأُمِّي، َو قَدْ خابَ مَنِ افْتَـری ، لَعَنَ اللهُ الظَّالِمِيْـنَ لَكُم مِنَ الأَوَّلِيـنَ وَ الأَخَرِينَ، وَ ضاعَفَ عَلَيْهِمُ العَذابَ الأَلِيم، أَتَيْتُكَ يا مَولايَ يَا بْنَ رَسُولِ اللهِ زائِرًا عَارِفًا بِحَقِّكَ، مُوالِياً لِأَوْلِيائِكَ، مُعادِياً لِأَعْدَائِكَ، مُستَبصِراً بِالهُدَی الَّذِي أَنْتَ عَلَيْهِ ، عارِفاً بِضَلالَةِ مَنْ خالَفَكَ، فَاشْفَعْ لِي ِعنْدَ رَبِّكَ

Peace be upon you, O son of Allah’s Messenger. Peace be upon you, O son of the Commander of the Faithful. Peace be upon you, O son of the veracious, immaculate lady Fatimah the Leader of the women of the world. Peace be upon you, O my master Abu-Abdullah. So be upon you Allah’s mercy and blessings. I bear witness that you performed the prayers, defrayed the poor-rate, enjoined the right, forbade the wrong, recited the Book (the Holy Quran) as exactly as it should be recited, strove for the sake of Allah as exactly as striving must be, and faced all troubles steadfastly for His sake, seeking his reward, until death came upon you. I also bear witness that those who dissented you, those who fought against you, those who let you down, and those who slew you (all those) were accursed directly by the Meccan Prophet. And he who forges lies indeed fails to attain his desire. May Allah curse those who wronged you from amongst the past and the present generations! May Allah also double for them the painful torment! O my master and son of Allah’s Messenger, I have come to you visiting you, acknowledging the standing that you enjoy, declaring my loyalty to those who are loyal to you, renouncing your enemies, seeking to follow the true guidance that you are following, and recognizing the deviation of those who oppose you; so, (please) intercede for me before your Lord.

Oh God, you see my place, and hear my words. It does not hide anything from You ; how a thing can be hidden from You while you are its creator and planner. I have come to while seeking the intercede of Your Prophet’s mercy and the assistance of Your Messenger’s successor. I beg You in the name of these two (bestow me) the stability of the foot, guidance and forgiveness in the world and the Hereafter.

His tomb is located north of the city of Najaf on the road to Kufa, in a place called Thawiya next to the Masjid Hannan.

Kumail ibn Zyad was a close companion of Imam Ali (A), then, after him, Imam Hassan (A). At the pacification event (Soulh), he was fully dedicated to Imam Hassan (A). He was 90 when he was killed by Hajjaj ibn Yusuf.

Imam Ali (A) had predicted that he would be killed by Hajjaj. Indeed, one day he went looking for him. He began tormenting Kumail’s friends and relatives and cut off their food, but they never denounced him. Kumail surrendered himself.27

Imam Ali (A) had taught him the dua Khizr. This dua is now known as Dua Kumail and is usually recited on Thursday evenings.

Ziyarat :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلی مُحَمّدٍ خَاتِمِ النَّبِیّیِن، اَلسَّلامُ عَلی عَلِیٍّ اَمیرِالْمومنینَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلی فاطِمَة الزّهرا، سَیّدِةِ نِساءَ الْعالَمین، اَلسّلامُ عَلی خَدیجَةَ الکُبْری أُمَّ الْمؤمِنینَ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَی الْحَسَنِ وَ الْحُسَینِ سَیّدی شَبابِ أهَلِ الْجَنَّةِ مِنَ الْخَلْقِ اَجْمِعین، اَلسَّلامُ عَلی سَائرِ أئِمَةِ الْمُسْلِمین عَلِیٍّ وَ‌مُحَمّدٍ وَ جَعْفَرٍ وَ مُوسی وَ عَلِیٍّ وَ‌مُحَمّدٍ وَ‌عَلِیٍّ وَ الحَسَنِ وَ الخلَفِ الْهادِیِ الْمَهْدِی مُنْجزِ وَعْدِ الْمُؤمِنینَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلی ملائِکتِهِ الْمُقَربِینَ وِ عِبَادِهِ الصَالِحینَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلی العَبْدِ الصَالِحِ، الْوَلِیّ النّاصِحِ الْعالِمِ التَّقِیّ، الْمَدفُونِ بِأرْضِ الْغَری. کُمیلِ بْنِ زیادٍ اَلسَّلامُ عَلی مَن أکْمَلَهُ الکامِل فی الصِّفَاتِ وَ الامیرِ فی الْغَزَواتِ، وَ وَدَّعَهُ السِّرِّ، وَ‌ عَلَّمَهُ دُعَاءَ الْخِضْرِ، وَ اَخْبَرَهُ عَنِ النَّفْسِ وَ الحَقیقَة فَصَارَ فیها ذابَصیرَة، اَشَهَدُ اَنَّکَ قَد اَدَّیتَ اِلَی الحَقِ، وَ‌وَجَّهْتَ مِنهَاجَ الصّدق وَ الرَّشَاد وَ اَعْرَضْتَ عَنِ الباطِلِ وَ الْعِناد، اَلسَّلامُ عَلی اَحَدِ حَوَارِیً حَبْلِ الله الْمَتینِ، الْفائِزِ بِصُحْبَةِ سَیِّدِ الوَصِیینَ وَ صُحْبَةِ سِبْطِهِ الاکْبَر، السّلامُ عَلی مَن اَخبَرَهُ بالْقَوْلِ سَیّدِ الصّادقین. لَعَنَ الله قاتِلکَ الظّالِم الشَّقِیِّ اللَّعینِ الْحَجاج بْن یُوسُفِ الثَّقَفِیّ، وَ السَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یا کُمیلَ بْنَ زیادِ النَّخَعیِّ الْیَمانِیٍّ وَ رَحمة الله وَ بَرَکاته.

Peace be upon Muhammad, the seal of prophets, peace be upon Ali, peace be upon Fatima al-Zahra, the leader of the world's women, peace be upon Khadija al-Kubri, mother of the believers, peace be upon Hasan, and Hussain, peace be upon the people of Paradise. Peace be upon the entire Imams of the Muslims: Ali, Muhammad, Jafar, Mousa, Ali, Muhammad, Ali, Al Hassan, and the guided successor Al-Mahdi, who will fulfil the believer’s promises. Peace be upon His close angels and righteous worshipers, peace be upon the advice-giver servant, the pious scholar, who has been buried in a deprived land. O Kumayl Bin Zayad, Peace be upon (you) who has been accomplished by a perfect figure in attributes and the prince in invasions, who gave him away the secrets, taught him the prayer of Hazrat Khizar and told him about the soul and the truth so he became wise. I bear witness you paid for the righteousness and went on the true and guided path, and evaded the falsehood and hostility. Peace be upon one of the companion of the Strong Rope of Allah, appointed at the position of the friendship of leader of successors and his elder son. Peace be upon him who was told by leader of truthful that that Allah’s curse be upon Hujjaj bin Yusuf who would be his ruthless murderer. Peace be upon you, as well as the blessings of Allah and His mercy, O’ Kumayl son of Zayad Al-Nakhi Al-Yamani.

Assalamoo aala mohammadin khatamin nabiyyin, assalamo aala Aliyeen amireel momenin, assalamo aala Fatemat' dhahra, sayyedatin nesayel aalamin, assalamo aala Khadijatal kubra ummul momenin, assalamo alal Hasane wal Husaine sayyedi shababe ahlil jannatee menal khalqee aajmayeen, assalamo aala sayeril aayim'matil muslemeen Aliyin wa mohammadin wa Jafareen wa mussa wa Aliyin wa Mohammadin wa Aliyin wal Hasane wa khalafeel hadil' mehdee munjezee waadil momeneen, assalamo aala malayekatil moqarrabeen wa ebadihees salehin, assalmo aala abde salehee, wAliyin naseheel aalameet' taqee, madfunee be ardheel gharry , Kumail bin Ziyadin, assalamo aala man akmalahoo kamele fis sifateewal ameere fil a’zzawat, wa raddaho sirre , wa aallamahoo duaa'al khizre, wa akhbarhoo anin nafse wa haqeeqate faa sar fiha za basiraa, ash'hado annak qad addayet elal haqqe, wa wajjahta minhajas sadaq war rashad wa aaradhtaa anil batelee wal enad, assalamo aala ahade hawariyyen hablillaheel' mateen, al fayeze be sohbate sayyedil wasieen wa sohbatee sibteel akbare, assalamo aala man akhbarhoo bil qawle sayyedis sadeqeen, lanallahoo qatelaka dhalemish shaqeel layyinil hajjaj ibne Yusuf thaqafy, was salamo alayek ya Kumail bin Ziyad nakhyi yamany wa rahamtullahe waba rakatooh.

children.name: Ziyarat for all Imam zadas (descendants of the Imams).

text.html:
اَلسَّلامُ عَلى جَدِّکَ الْمُصْطَفى، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى اَبيکَ الْمُرْتَضَى الرِّضا، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيِّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى خَديجَةَ اُمِّ سَيِّدَةِ نِسآءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى فاطِمَةَ اُمِّ الْاَئِمَّةِ الطّاهِرينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ، بُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزّاخِرَةِ، شُفَعآئى فِى الاْخِرَةِ وَاَوْلِيآئى عِنْدَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ اِلَى الْعِظـامِ النّاخِرَةِ، اَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقِّ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ اَيُّهَا الشَّخْصُ الشَّريفُ الطّاهِرُ الْكَريمُ، اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا اِلـهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ، وَاَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ، وَاَنَّ عَلِيّاً وَلِيُّهُ وَمُجْتَباهُ، وَاَنَّ الْاِمامَةَ فى وُلْدِهِ اِلى يَوْمِ الدّينِ، نَعْلَمُ ذلِکَ عِلْمَ الْيَقينِ، وَنَحْنُ لِذلِکَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفى نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, prace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace br upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of ctratures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

Assalaamo alla jaddeka al-mustafi, assalaamo alla abeeka al-murtadhee ar-redhaa, assalaamo alla as-sayyedayne al-Hasane wal Husayne, assalaamo alla khadijata umme sayyedate nesaail aalameen, assalaamo alla faatemata ummil a-immatit taahereen, assalaamo alla an-nofuse al-faakherate, bohuril olume az-zaakherate, shofa aaee fee al kherate wa awliyaaee inda awde ar-roohe elal ezaame an-naakherate, a-immate al-khalqe wa woolaate al-haqqe, assalaamo alayka ayyohash shakhsho ash-sharifo at-taahero al-kareemo, ash-hado an laa elaha illallaaho, wa anna Muhammadan abdohu wa mustafaao, wa anna Aliyyan waliyyohu wa mujtabaaho,wa annal imaamata fee wuldehi ela yawmiddeene, na’alamu dhaleka ilmal yaqeene, wa nahno le dhaleka moa’taqedoona wa fee nasrehim moojtahedun.

The city of Kufa is located 10 km north of Najaf. In 36 AH, at the time of Amir al-Mo'minin (A), it had been the capital of the Islamic world. Today, it is integrated into the city of Najaf.

In the Arabic language, the word Kufa designates a circular form, that resembles the contours of the city.

The Holy Prophet (S), referring to the first 3 verses of Surat at-Tin, said: « God chose four cities out of all the cities of the world, and took an oath by name. « At-tin » represents Madina, « Az-Zaytoun » is Baytul Muqadass » (Jerusalem), « Toure Sinin » is Kufa, « Baladil amine » is Mecca. »28

According to some Riwayat, the history of the city of Kufa and its Masjid go back to Prophet Adam (A).29

Imam as-Sadiq (A) - (6th Imam), preferred to live in Kufa rather than Mecca or Medina. Once when a man sold all his assets in order to buy a house in Mecca, the Imam warned him: « The inhabitants of Mecca will openly trample/ignore Allah’s guidance. » He then asked him : « Shall I live in Medina ? » The Imam replied : « These people are worse than the people of Mecca. » He insisted : « Where should I live ? » The Imam then made this revelation: « In the city of Kufa! For near Kufa there is a noble tomb (that of Imam Ali (A)), and God smooths the difficulties of any tormented or afflicted person who goes there.»30

According to Imam as-Sadiq (A), spending a charity dirham in Kufa is equivalent to spending 100 dirhams in another city; and two rakaat of prayer in this city is equivalent to 100 rakaat in another city.31

Dua to recite at the entrance to Kufa :

بِسْمِ اللهِ وَ بِاللهِ وَ فِي سَبِيْلِ اللهِ وَ عَلیٰ مِـلَّةِ رَسُولِ اللهِ صَلَّي اللهُ عَلَيهِ وَ آلِهِ، اللَّهُمَّ أَنْـزِلْنِي مُـنْزِلاً مُبـٰارَکـاً وَ أَنْتَ خَيْـرُ الْـمُنْـزِلِيـنَ.
اللهُ أَکْبـَرُ وَ لاٰ إلٰهَ إلّا اللهُ وَالـْحَمْدُ لِلهِ سُبحٰانَ اللهِ.

In the Name of Allah (I begin), in Allah (I trust), on the way of Allah (I proceed), and the course of Allah’s Messenger, peace be upon him and his Progeny, (I follow). O Allah, (please do) enable me to reside blessedly and You are the best of those who enable to reside. Allah is the Most Great. There is no god but Allah. All praise be to Allah. All glory be to Allah.

Bismillahe wabillahe wafee sabilillahe wa aala millatee rasoolillahe swallallahu alyhee wa aalehee, allahumma an'zilni munzelan mobarakan wa ant khairul munzelin.

Allàhou Allaho akbar wa la elaha illallao wal hamdolillahe subhanallahee.

31: Kamil al-ziyarat, page 27

The Masjid-e-Kufa was built in the year 17 AH. At the time of the caliphate of Imam Ali (A), it became the seat of government, from which all decisions were taken, be they political, cultural, economic, military or of any other nature.

In the southern part of the Masjid is Ali's Mihrab and Mimbar, which remind us of his speeches (khutba) and his prayers, as well as the place of his martyrdom.

a) The virtues of Masjid-e-Kufa

According to Imam as-Sadiq (A) : « All angels and prophets - including our Holy Prophet (S) - as well as pure believers, prayed in this Masjid. » Following this same hadeeth, it is said that the Holy Prophet (S), during the Mi'rāj, passed over the Masjid-e-Kufa and asked Angel Jibrail to stop there in order to accomplish 2 rakaat.32

According to a hadith of Imam al-Baqir (A) - (5th Imam), the Masjid-e-Kufa is one of the Gardens of Paradise.33

b) A place of fulfillment of vows

Imam as-Sadiq (A) said that if a person has a request from God, then he should go to Masjid-e-Kufa, and after doing his ablutions, he should perform a prayer of 2 rakaat, in which he will recite after Surah Al-Hamd the following 7 surahs one after the other: Nass, Falaq, Ikhlass, Kafirun, Nasr, A'la, Qadr. When he then presents his request to God, he will be answered insha'Allah.34

Imam ar-Redha (A) - (8th Imam) said that at the site of Masjid-e-Kufa was once the home of Prophet Nuh (A). Whoever enters it 100 times, God will give him 100 pardons and mercies, because the Prophet Nouh (A) had asked in this same Masjid for forgiveness for his parents and for whoever would enter there: « My Lord! Forgive me and my parents; and whoever enters my house as a believer. »35 36

c) The actions (amaals) in Masjid-e-Kufa

The visit of the Masjid-e-Kufa has many virtues; consequently, its amaals are numerous. It has been prescribed to recite prayers and Ziyarat in about twenty places in the Masjid, which we will mention according to Mafatih al Jinan.

1- Entry into the Masjid

It is recommended to enter this Masjid through the gate of Tho'bena or Fil, having recited this dua :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلى سَيِّدِنا رَسُولِ اللّهِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِاللّهِ صَلَّى‌اللّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ الطّاهِرينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ عَلِىِّ بْنِ اَبيطالِبٍ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ، وَ عَلى مَجالِسِهِ وَ مَشاهِدِهِ وَ مَقامِ حِكْمَتِهِ، وَ آثارِ آبآئِهِ آدَمَ وَ نُوحٍ وَ اِبْراهيمَ وَ اِسْمعيلَ وَ تِبْيانِ بَيِّناتِهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى الاِمامِ الْحَكيمِ الْعَدْلِ الصِّدّيقِ الاَكْبَرِ، الْفارُوقِ بِالْقِسْطِ الَّذى فَرَّقَ اللّهُ بِهِ بَيْنَ الْحَقِّ وَ الْباطِلِ، وَ الْكُفْرِ وَ الاْيمانِ وَ الشِّرْکِ وَ التَّوْحيدِ، لِيَهْلِکَ مَنْ هَلَکَ عَنْ بَيِّنَةٍ وَ يَحْيى مَنْ حَىَّ عَنْ بَيِّنَةٍ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ اَميرُالْمُؤْمِنينَ وَ خآصَّةُ نَفسِ الْمُنْتَجَبينَ وَ زَيْنُ الصِّدّيقينَ وَصابِرُ الْمُمْتَحَنينَ، وَ اَنَّکَ حَكَمُ اللّهِ فى اَرْضِهِ وَقاضى اَمْرِهِ، وَ بابُ حِكْمَتِهِ وَ عاقِدُ عَهْدِهِ وَ النّاطِقُ بِوَعْدِهِ، وَ الْحَبْلُ الْمَوْصُولُ بَيْنَهُ وَ بَيْنَ عِبادِهِ، وَ كَهْفُ النَّجاةِ وَ مِنْهاجُ التُّقى وَ الدَّرَجَةُ الْعُلْيا، وَ مُهَيْمِنُ الْقاضِى الاْعْلى، يا اَميرَالْمُؤْمِنينَ بِکَ اَتَقَرَّبُ اِلَى اللّهِ زُلْفى، اَنْتَ وَلِيّى وَ سَيِّدى وَ وَسيلَتى فِى الدُّنْيا وَ الاْخِرَةِ.

Peace be upon our master the Messenger of Allah, Muhammad son of Abdullah, and upon his immaculate progeny. Peace be upon the Commander of the Faithful, Ali the son of Abu-TAlib. Allah’s mercy and blessings be upon him, upon his sessions, upon his meeting-places, upon the places that witnessed his wisdom, upon the traces of his forefathers: Adam, Noah, Abraham, and Ismael, and upon the places that witnessed the presentations of his evidences.

Peace be upon the Imam: the wise, the just, the grandest veracious, and the fair distinguisher by whom Allah distinguished the right from the wrong, atheism from (true) belief, and polytheism from monotheism, so that he who would perish might perish by clear proof and he who would live might live by clear proof.

I bear witness that you are verily the commander of the faithful, the elite of the selves of the select ones, the adornment of the veracious ones, and the most steadfast among the tried ones; and that you are verily the judge of Allah on His lands, the decider according to His orders, the door to His wisdom, , pledge His of maker t the spokesman of His promise, the rope that is connected between His servants and Him the haven of redemption, the course of piety, rank elevated most t and the executor of the laws of the Most Exalted Judge.

O Commander of the Faithful, through you do I seek close nearness to Allah for you are my chief, master, and means (to Allah) in this world as well as the Hereafter.

Assalaamo alla sayyedena rasoolillaahe Mohammad I’bne Abdillaahe sallallaaho alayhe wa aaleheet twaherina, assalaamo alla ameeril momineena Ali I’bne abi taalibin wa rahmatullaahe wabarakaatohu, wa alla majaalee sehi wa mashaahedehi wa maqqame hikmateehi, wa aathaare aAbaaehi aadama wa noohin wa Ibraahim wa ismaaila wa tibyaane bayyenaatehi, assalaamo allal imaamil hakeeme al-adle as-siddiqe al-akbare, al-faaruqe bil qistil ladhee farraqallaaho behi baynal haqqe wal baatelee, wal kufre wal aymaane wash shirke wat-tawheede, le yahleka man halaka ann bayyenatin wa yahyee man hayyi ann bayyenatin,ash-hado annaka Ameerul momineena wa khaas' sato nafsil muntaja beena wa zaynoo as-siddiqeena wa saabero al-mumtahanayna, wa annaka hakamullahe fee ardehi wa qaadhee amrehi, wa baabo hikmatehi wa aaqedo ah-dehi wan naateqo be wa’a-dehi, wal hablo al-mawsulo baynahu wa bayna ebaadehi, wa kahfo an-najaate wa minhaaju at-tuqee wad darajato al-ulyaa, wa mohaymeno al-qaadhee al-a’alee, yaa amiral momineena beka ataqarrabo elallaahe zulfee, anta waliyyan wa sayyedee wa wasilati feed dunyaa wal aakherate

2- In front of Bab-ul-Fil's door

Once inside, recite this dua :

اَللّهُ اَكْبَرُ اَللّهُ اَكْبَرُ اَللّهُ اَكْبَرُ، هذا مَقامُ الْعآئِذِ بِاللّهِ وَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ حَبيبِ اللّهِ صَلَّى‌اللّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ، وَ بِوِلايَةِ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ وَ الاْئِمَّةِ الْمَهْدِيّينَ الصّادِقينَ النّاطِقينَ الرّاشِدينَ، الَّذينَ اَذْهَبَ اللّهُ عَنْهُمُ الرِّجْسَ وَ طَهَّرَهُمْ تَطْهيراً، رَضيتُ بِهِمْ اَئِمَّةً وَهُداةً وَ مَوالِىَّ، سَلَّمْتُ لاِمْرِاللّهِ لا اُشْرِکُ بِهِ شَيْئاً وَ لا اَتَّخِذُ مَعَ اللّهِ وَلِيّاً، كَذَبَ الْعادِلُونَ بِاللّهِ وَ ضَلُّوا ضَلالاً بَعيداً، حَسْبِىَ اللّهُ وَ اَوْلِيآءُ اللّهِ، اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا اِلهَ اِلاَّ اللّهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَريکَ لَهُ، وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَ رَسُولُهُ صَلَّى‌اللّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ، وَ اَنَّ عَلِيّاً وَ الاْئِمَّةَ الْمَهْدِيّينَ مِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِهِ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ اَوْلِيآئى وَ حُجَّةُ اللّهِ عَلى خَلْقِهِ.

Allah is the Greatest. Allah is the Greatest. Allah is the Supreme. This is the situation of him who seeks refuge with Allah, with Muhammad the most beloved by Allah, may Allah’s peace be upon him and his Progeny, with the (Divinely commissioned) leadership of the Commander of the Faithful, and with the Imams; the well-guided, the veracious, the spokesmen (of Allah), the orthodox, from whom Allah removed filth and purified them with thorough purification. I accept them as leaders, guides and masters. I succumb to the acts of Allah. I associate none with Him and I do not betake any master other than Allah. Truly liars are those who set up equals with Allah as they have certainly strayed off in remote error. Sufficient for me are Allah and the saints of Allah. I bear witness that there is no god but Allah, alone without having any partner. And I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and Messenger, may Allah’s blessings be upon him and his Progeny, and that Ali and the well-guided Imams from his progeny, peace be upon them all, are my masters and the arguments of Allah against His created beings.

Allaaho akbaro allaaho akbaro allaaho akbaro, haazaa maqaamo al-aaeje billaahe wa be Muhammadin habibillaahe sallallaaho alayhe wa aalehi, wa be wilaayate ameeril momineena wal a-immatil mahdiyyin as-saadeqin an-naateqin ar-raashedin, al-ladheena adh-haballaaho anhomur rijso wa tahharahoom tat-heeran, radheeto behim a-immatan wa hodatan wa mawaaliyan, sallamto la imarilaahe laa ushreko behi shay’ann wa laa at-takhedho ma’allaahe wAliyyan, kadhaba al-aadeloona billaahe wa zalluwaa zalaalan ba’eedan, hasbiyallaaho wa awliyaa ullaahe, ash-hado an laa elaha illallaaho wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, wa ash-hado anna Muhammadan abdohu wa rasoolohu sallallaaho alayhe wa aalehi, wa anna Aliyyan wal a-immata al-mahdiyyin min dhurriyatehi alayhemo as-salaamo awliyaaee wa hujjatallaahe alla khalqehi.

3- Maqame Ibrahim (A)

To recite a prayer of 4 rakaat, including 2 pairs of 2 rakaat : in the first 2 rakaat, recite the surah Hamd and Ikhlass, and in the 2 rakaat following, surah Hamd and Qadr. After the prayer, recite the tasbih of Fatema az-Zahra (A) and say :

اَلسَّلام عَلى عِبادِاللّهِ الصّالِحينَ الرّاشِدينَ، الَّذينَ اَذْهَبَ اللّهُ عَنْهُمُ الرِجْسَ وَ طَهَّرَهُمْ تَطْهيرآ، وَ جَعَلَهُمْ اَنْبِياءَ مُرْسَلينَ وَ حُجَّةً عَلَى‌الْخَلْقِ اَجْمَعينَ، وَ سَلامٌ عَلَى الْمُرْسَلينَ وَالْحَمْدُلِلّهِ رَبِّ الْعالَمينَ، ذلِکَ تَقْديرُ الْعَزيزِ الْعَليمِ. سَلامٌ عَلى نُوحٍ فِى الْعالَمينَ. نَحْنُ عَلى وَصِيَّتِکَ يا وَلِىَّ الْمُؤْمِنينَ، الَّتى اَوْصَيْتَ بِها ذُرَّيَتَکَ مِنَ الْمُرْسَلينَ وَالصَّديقينَ، وَ نَحْنُ مِنْ شيعَتِکَ وَ شيعَةِ نَبِيِّنا مُحمَّدٍ صَلَّى‌اللّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ الِهِ، وَ عَلَيْکَ وَ عَلى جَميعِ الْمُرْسَلينَ وَالاَنْبِياءِ وِ الصّادِقينَ، وَ نَحْنُ عَلى مِلَّةِ اِبْراهيمَ، وَ دينِ مُحَمَّدٍ النَّبِىِّ الأُمِىِّ والاَئَمَّةِ الْمَهْدِييّنَ، وَ وِلايَةِ مَوْلانا عَلِىٍّ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى الْبَشيرِ النَّذيرِ صَلَواتُ اللّهِ عَلَيْهِ وَ رَحْمَتُهُ وَ رِضْوانُهُ وَ بَرَكاتُهُ، وَ عَلى وَصِيّهِ وَ خَليفَتِهِ الشّاهِدِ لِلّهِ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ عَلى خَلْقِهِ عَلِىٍّ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ، الصِّدّيقِ الاَكْبَرِ وَالْفاروُقِ الْمُبينِ، الَّذى اَخَذْتَ بَيْعَتَهُ عَلَى الْعالَمينَ، رَضيتُ بِهِمْ اَوْلِياءَ وَ مَوالِىَ وَ حُكّامآ فى نَفْسى وَ وُلْدى وَ اَهْلى وَ مالى وَ قِسْمى وَ حِلّى وَ اِحْرامى، وَ اِسْلامى وَ دينى وَ دُنْياىَ وَ اخِرَتى وَ مَحْياىَ وَ مَماتى، اَنْتُمُ الاَئِمَّةُ فِى الْكِتابِ وَ فَصْلُ الْمَقامِ وَ فَصْلُ الْخِطابِ، وَ اَعْيُنُ الْحَّىِ الَّذى لا يَنامُ، وَ اَنْتُمْ حُكَماءُ اللّهِ وَ بِكُمْ حَكَمَ اللّهُ وَ بِكُمْ عُرِفَ حَقُّ اللّهِ، لا اِلهَ اِلاَّ اللّهُ مُحَمَّدٌ رَسُولُ اللّهِ، اَنْتُمْ نُورُ اللّهِ مِنْ بَيْنِ اَيْدينا وَ مِنْ خَلْقِنا، اَنْتُمْ سُنَّةُ اللّهِ الَّتى بِها سَبَقَ الْقَضاءُ، يا اَميرَالْمُؤمِنينَ اَنـَا لَكُمْ مُسَلِّمٌ تَسْليمآ، لا اُشْرِکُ بِاللّهِ شَيْئآ وَ لا اَتَّخِذُ مِنْ دوُنِهِ وَلِيَّا، اَلْحَمْدُلِلّهِ الَّذى هَدانى بِكُمْ وَ ما كُنْتُ لاَهْتَدِىَ لَوْ لا اَنْ هَدانِى اللّهُ، اللّهُ اَكْبَرُ اَللّهُ اَكْبَرُ اَلْحَمْدُلِلّهِ عَلى ما ھَدٰنا.

Peace be upon the righteous, orthodox servants of Allah from whom Allah has removed filth and purified them a thorough purification. He also made them prophets and messengers and set them as arguments against all the created beings. Peace be upon the Messengers and all praise be to Allah the Lord of the worlds. This is the prearrangement of the Mighty, Knowing Lord.

Peace and salutation to Noah among the nations. O master of the believers, we are abiding by your teaching that you provided to your offspring: the messengers and the truthful ones. And we are among your supporters and among the supporters of our Prophet Muhammad, peace of Allah be upon him and his progeny and upon you as well as all the messengers, prophets, and veracious ones. And we are also following the doctrine of Abraham, the religion of Muhammad the Meccan Prophet, and the religion of the well guided Imams, and we are loyal to the leadership of Ali, the Commander of the Faithful.

Peace be upon the bearer of glad tidings (for the believers) and the warner May Allah’s peace, mercy, pleasure, and blessings be upon him, and upon his successor and vicegerent: the witness on Allah’s creatures after him (the Prophet), Ali, the Commander of the Faithful, the grandest truthful and the clear distinguisher (between the right and the wrong), whom You have ordered the people to swear allegiance to.

I thus accept them as masters, leaders, and rulers, over myself my progeny, my family members,my property, whatever sustenance You decide for me, whatever is legal or illegal for me to do, my being Muslim, my religion, my worldly life, my Next Life, my being kept Alive, and my death.

You (the Infallible Imams) are indeed the Imams whom are mentioned in the Holy Book and you are the clear leaders in all situations, the clear judges, the eyes of the Ever-living Lord Who never sleeps, and the judging representatives of Allah. Through you has Allah judged and through you was the right of Allah recognized. There is no god but Allah. Muhammad is the messenger of Allah. You are the Light of Allah that lies before and behind us. You are the instructions of Allah that He has decided before all things. O Commander of the Faithful, I submit to you with thorough submission, I never associate with Allah anything, and I never betake a master other than Him. All praise be to Allah Who has guided me to this, and I should never have been guided if Allah had not guided me. Allah is the Greatest.

Allah is the Greatest. Allah is the Greatest. All praise be to Allah for that to which He has guided us.

Assalaamo alla ebaadillaa'his saalehina ar-raashedin, al-ladheena adh-haballaaho anhomo al-rijsa wa tah-harhoom tat’heeraa, wa ja’alahoom an-biyaa’a moorsAlina wa hujjatan alla al-khalqe ajmaeen, wa salaamo alal moorsalina wa al-hamdolillaahe rabbil aalameen, dhaleka taqdeero al-azeeze al-aleeme, salaamo alla noohin feel aalamin, nahno alla wasiyyateka yaa waliyyal momineena, al-latee awsayta behaa dhoorraytaka menal moorsalina was-sadiqayna, wa nahno min shay’ateka wa shay’ate nabiyyena Muhammadin sallallaaho alayhe wa aalehi, wa alayka wa alla jamee’e al-mursalina wal anbiyaae wa as-saadeqina, wa nahno alla millate Ibraahima, wa deene Muhammadin an-nabiyyin al-omiyyin wal a-ammate al-mahdiyyina wa wilaayate mawlaana Aliyyin ameeril momineena, assalaamo alal basheere an-nadheere salawaatullaahe alayhe wa rahmatohu wa rizwaanohu wa barakaatohu, wa alla sayyehe wa khalifatehi ash-shaahedillaahe min ba’adehi alla khalkehi Aliyyin ameeril momineena, as-siddiqe al-akbare wal faaruqe al-mobeene, al-ladhee akhadhta bay’atahu alla al-aalamina, radheeto behim awliyaa’a wa mawaAli wa hukkamaa fee nafsi wa wuldee wa ahlee wa maalee wa qismee wa hillee wa eharaamee, wa islaamee wa deeni wa dunyaay wa aakherati wa mahyaa ya mamaati, antumo al-aimmato feel kitaabe wa faslul khetaabe, wa a’ayono al hayyi al-ladhee laa yanaamo, wa antum hokamaa oollaahe wa bekum hakamallaaho wa bekum orefa haqqullaahe, laa elaha illallaaho muhammadun rasoolullaahe, antum nurullaahe min bayne aydaynaa wa min khalaqenaa, antum sunnatullaahe al-latee behaa sabaqa al-qadhaao, yaa ameeral momineena anaa lakum moswallemo tasleemaa, laa ushreqo billaahe shayaaa wa laa at-takheju min doonehi waliyyan, al-hamdolillaahil ladhee hadaani bekum wa maa kunto la ahtadeya law laa ann hadaanillaaho, allaaho akbaro allaaho akbaro al-hamdolillaahe alla ma hadnaa.

4- Maqame Khizr (A)

Imam Ali (A) said that Maqàme Khizr is one of the virtues of Masjid-e-Koufa and that this station is the place of prayer of Prophet Khizr (A). This is why it is recommended to recite 2 rakaat or 4 rakaat as well as supplications (duas).

5- Dakkat-al-Qaza.

It is a small place where Imam Ali (A) sat to distribute his orders and judge the affairs of the people.

It is recommended to recite a prayer of 2 rakaat, then the tasbih of Zahra (A) and this dua :

يا مالِكى وَ مُمَّلِكى وَ مُتَغَمِّدى بِاالنِّعَمِ الْجِسامِ مِنْ غَيْرِ اسْتِحْقاقٍ، وَجْهى خاضِعٌ لِما تَعْلُوهُ الاَقْدامُ لِجَلالِ وَجْهِکَ الْكَريمِ، لا تَجْعَلْ هذِهِ الشِدَّةَ وَ لا هذِهِ الْمِحْنَةَ مُتَّصِلَةً بِاسْتيصالِ الشَافَةِ، وَامْنَحْنى مِنْ فضْلِکَ ما لَمْ تَمْنَحْ بِهِ اَحَدآ مِنْ غَيْرِ مَسْئَلَةٍ، اَنْتَ الْقَديمُ الاَوَّلُ الَّذى لَمْ تَزَلْ وَ لا تَزالُ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ الِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاغْفِرْلى وَارْحَمْنى وَ زَکِّ عَمَلى، وَ بارِکْ لى فى اَجَلى وَاجْعَلْنى مِنْ عُتَقائِکَ وَطُلَقائِکَ مِنَ النّارِ، بِرَحْمَتِکَ يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ.

O He Who possesses me, He Who endows me with possessions, and He Who includes me with enormous bounties although that I do not deserve them. My face is humble to what is over topped by feet due to the majesty of Your Noble Face. (Please) do not make this hardship and this ordeal to be continual until they lead to the extirpation of the root. And (please) grant me from Your favor more than that which You have granted to any body who has not asked You to grant him. You are verily the Eternal and the First Lord Who has neither beginning nor end. (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, pardon me, have mercy on me, admit my deeds, bless my lifetime and include me with those whom You release and pardon from Hellfire, in the name of Your mercy, O most merciful of all those who show mercy.

Yaa maaleki wa mummaleki wa motaghammedi bin ne’ame al-jisaame min ghayris tehqaaqin, wajhee khaazeo lemaa ta’alohu al-aqdaamo le jalaale wajheka al-kareeme, laa taj’al hadhehi al-shiddata wa laa hadhehi al-mehnata muttaselatan bistis-saale as-shaafate, wa amnahni min fadhleka maa lam tamnah behi ahadaa min ghayre mas-alatin, anta al-qadeemo al-awwalo al-ladhee lam tazal wa laa tazaalo swalle alla muhammdin wa aale Muhammadin waghfir lee war hamnee wa zakki amalee, wa baarik lee fee ajalee waj-alnee min otaqaaeka wa tolaqaaeka menannaare, be rahmateka yaa arhamar raahemin.

6- Bayt-at-tasht.

This is the place where Imam Ali (A) had settled the case of a virgin girl, wrongly accused by her brothers of being pregnant. He made her sit behind a curtain, on a basin filled with mud, and the leech that was nestled in her body came out, proving that she was not pregnant.

Here it is recommended to recite a prayer of 2 rakaat, then the tasbih of Zahra (A) and this dua :

اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى ذَخَرْتُ تَوْحيدى اِيّاکَ وَ مَعْرِفَتى بِکَ، وَاِخْلاصى لَکَ وَ اِقْرارى بِرُبُوبِيَّتِکَ، وَ ذَخَرْتُ وِلايَةَ مَنْ اَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ بِمَعْرِفَتِهِمْ مِنْ بَرِيَّتِکَ، مُحَمَّدٍ وَ عِتْرَتِهِ صَلِّى اللّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ لِيَوْمِ فَزَعى اِلَيْکَ عاجِلا وَ اجِلا، وَ قَدْ فَزِعْتُ اِلَيْکَ وَ اِلَيْهِمْ يا مَوْلاىَ فى هذَا الْيَوْمِ، وَ فى مَوْقِفى هذا، وَ سَئَلْتُکَ مادَّتى مِنْ نِعْمَتِکَ وَ اِزاحَةَ ما اَخْشاهُ مِنْ نِقْمَتِکَ وَالْبَرَكَةَ في ما رَزَقْتَنيهِ، وَ تَحْصينَ صَدْرى مِنْ كُلِّ هَمٍّ وَ جائِحَةٍ وَ مَعْصِيَةٍ، فى دينى وَ دُنْياىَ وَ اخِرَتى يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ

O Allah, I save (the reward of) my submission to Your Oneness, my recognition of you, my sincerity to You, and my bearing witness of Your Godhead, and I also save (the reward of) my loyalty to those with the recognition of whom You have bestowed upon me: namely, Muhammad and his progeny, peace of Allah be upon them, (I save all that) to the day of my taking refuge with You, whether in this world or the Hereafter. Thus, I am now taking refuge with You, O my Master, and with them, on this day and on this very situation, and I thus beg You for Your increasing bounties, for removing from me Your punishment that I fear, for blessing all the sustenance which You grant me, and for immunizing my heart from receiving any grievous matter, any calamity, or any act of disobedience to You, regarding my religion, worldly life, and the Next Life. O most merciful of all those who show mercy.

Allahhumma inni dhakharto tawheedi iyyaaka wa ma’arefatee beka, wa ikhlaasee laka wa iqraa ree be robubiyyateka, wa zakharta wilaayata man an amta alayya be ma’arefatehim min bariyyateka, Muhammadin wa itratehi sallillaaho alayhim le yawme fazaee elayka aajelaa wa ajilaa, wa qad faze’ato elayka wa elayhim yaa mawlaaya fee hadhaa al-yawme, wa fee mawqefee hadhaa, wa sa’altoka maad-datee min nea’mateka wa ezaahata maa akh-shaaho min niqmateka wal barakata fee maa razaqtanihe, wa tahsayna sadree min kulle hammin wa jaaehatin wa ma’asiyatin,fee deeni wa dunyaay wa aakheratee yaa arhamar raahemin

7- The place of the ark of the Prophet Nuh (A) (Maqamé safinatin-Nuh)

This is where Nuh (A) built his ark. The history of this place and the construction of the ark is described in verses 35 to 48 of Surah Hud. The rain had begun to flood this place before spreading on the ground.

8- Dakkat-al-Mi'raj, or the place of the Holy Prophet Mohammad (S)

At the time of Mi'raj, the Holy Prophet (S) was informed of this location by the Angel Jibraa’il. He asked him to stop there, to recite a prayer of 2 rakaat. Also, we must recite 2 rakaat : in the 1st, after the Surah Hamd recite the Surah Ikhlass (Tawhid), in the 2nd after Hamd, Surah al-Kafiroon. After the tasbih of Zahra, recite this dua :

اَللّهُمَّ اَنْتَ السَّلامُ وَ مِنْکَ السَّلامُ، وَاِلَيْکَ يَعُودُ السَّلامُ وَدارُکَ دارُ السَّلامِ، حَيِّنا رَبَّنا مِنْکَ بِالسَّلامِ، اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى صَلَّيْتُ هذِهِ الصَّلوةَ ابْتِغآءَ رَحْمَتِکَ وَرِضْوانِکَ وَمَغْفِرَتِکَ، وَتَعْظيماً لِمَسْجِدِکَ، اَللّهُمَّ فَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ،وَارْفَعْها فى عِلِّيّينَ وَتَقَبَّلْها مِنّى يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ.

O Allah, You are the Peace. You are the source of peace. To You does peace belong. Your abode is the abode of peace. So, our Lord, greet us with peace from You. O Allah, I have offered this prayer, seeking Your mercy, pleasure, forgiveness, and as sign of my esteeming Your mosque. O Allah, (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, raise my prayer to the most elevated place, and accept it from me. O most merciful of all those who show mercy.

Allaahumma antas-salaamo wa minkas-salaamo, wa daaraka daarus-salaame, hayyenaa rabbana minka bis-salaame, allaahumma inni sallayto hadhehi as-salwata abteghaa a rahmateka wa ridh-waaneka wa maghferateka, wa ta’adheeman le masjideka, allaahumma fa swalle alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammadin, war fa’ahaa fee Aliyyin wa ta qabbalhaa minni yaa arhamar raahemin.

9- The place of Prophet Adam (A)

The story of this place is described in Surat al-Baqarah, verse 37, when God granted forgiveness and favors to Prophet Adam (A) : « Adam received words from his Lord. He forgave him ; [God] is the One who has approved repentance, [He is] Merciful [and bestows on the sincere repentant believers particular goods]. »

4 rakaat should be recited in the form of 2 pairs of 2 rakaat. In the 1st rakaat, after Al-Hamd, recite surah Qadr, and in the 2nd rakaat, after al Hamd, surah Tawhid. Then recite the tasbih of Zahra (A) and this dua :

اَللّهُمَّ اِنْ كُنْتُ قَدْ عَصَيْتُکَ، فَاِنّى قَدْ اَطَعْتُکَ فِى الايمانِ مِنّى بِکَ مَنّآ مِنْکَ عَلَىَّ لا مَنّآ مِنّى عَلَيْکَ، وَ اَطَعْتُکَ فى اَحَبِّ الاَشْياءِ لَکَ لَمْ اَتَّخِذْ لَکَ وَلَداً، وَلَمْ اَدْعُ لَکَ شَريكاً، وَ قَدْ عَصَيْتُکَ فى اَشْياءٍ كَثيرَةٍ عَلى غَيْرِ وَجْهِ الْمُكابَرَةِ لَکَ، وَ لاَ الْخُروجِ عَنْ عُبُودِيَّتِکَ وَ لاَ الْجُحُودِ لِرُبُوبِيَّتِکَ، وَ لكِنِ اتَّبَعْتُ هَواىَ وَ اَزَلَّنِى الشَّيْطانُ بَعْدَ الْحُجَّةِ عَلَىَّ وَ الْبَيانِ، فَاِنْ تُعَذِّبْنى فَبِذُنُوبى غَيْرَ ظالمٍ لى، وَ اِنْ تَعْفُ عَنّى وَ تَرْحَمْنى فَبِجُودِکَ وَ كَرَمِکَ يا كَريمُ، اَللّهُمَّ اِنَّ ذُنُوبى لَمْ يَبْقَ لَها اِلّا رَجاءُ عَفْوِکَ، وَ قَدْ قَدَّمْتُ آلَةَ الْحِرْمانِ، فَاَنَا اَسْئَلُکَ اللّهُمَّ ما لا اَسْتَوْجِبُهُ وَ اَطْلُبُ مِنْکَ ما لا اَسْتَحِقُّهُ، اَللّهُمَّ اِنْ تُعَذِّبْنى فَبِذُنُوبى وَ لَمْ تَظْلِمْنى شَيْئآ، وَ اِنْ تَغْفِرْلى فَخَيْرُ راحِمٍ اَنْتَ يا سَيِّدى، اَللّهُمَّ اَنْتَ اَنْتَ وَ اَنَا اَنَا اَنْتَ الْعَوّادُ بِالْمَغْفِرَةِ وَ اَنَا الْعَوّادُ بِالذُّنُوبِ، وَ اَنْتَ الْمُتَفَضِّلُ بِالْحِلْمِ، وَ اَنَا الْعَوّادُ بِالْجَهْلِ، اَللّهُمَّ فَاِنّى اَسْئَلُکَ يا كَنْزَ الضُّعَفاءِ، يا عَظيمَ الرَّجاءِ يا مُنْقِذَ الْغَرْقى يا مُنْجِىَ الْهلكى، يا مُميتَ الاَحْياءِ يا مُحْيِىَ الْمَوْتى، اَنْتَ اللّهُ لا اِلهَ اِلّا اَنْتَ، اَنْتَ الَّذى سَجَدَلَك شُعاعُ الشَّمْسِ وَ دَوِىَّ الْماءِ، وَ حَفيفُ الشَّجَرِ وَ نُورُ الْقَمَرِ وَ ظُلْمَةُ اللَّيْلِ وَ ضَوْءُ النَّهارِ، وَ خَفَقانُ الطَّيْرِ، فَاَسْئَلُکَ اللّهُمَّ يا عَظيمُ بِحَقِّکَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ الِهِ الصّادِقينَ، وَ بِحَقِّ مُحَمِّدٍ وَ الِهِ الصّادِقينَ عَلَيْکَ وَ بِحَقِّکَ عَلى عَلِىٍّ وَبِحَقِّ عَلِىٍّ عَلَيْکَ، وَبِحَقِّکَ عَلى فاطِمَةَ وَبِحَقِّ فاطِمَةَ عَلَيْکَ، وَبِحَقِّکَ عَلَى الْحَسَنِ وَ بِحَقِّ الْحَسَنِ عَلَيْکَ، وَ بِحَقِّکَ عَلَى الْحُسَيْنِ وَ بِحَقِّ الْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْکَ، فَاِنَّ حُقُوقَهُمْ عَلَيْکَ مِنْ اَفْضَلِ اِنْعامِکَ عَلَيْهِمْ، وَ بِالشَّأْنِ الَّذى لَکَ عِنْدَهُمْ وَ بِالشَّاْنِ الَّذى لَهُمْ عِنْدَکَ، صَلِّ عَلَيْهِمْ يا رَبِّ صَلوةً دائِمَةً مُنْتَهى رِضاکَ، وَاغْفِرْلى بِهِمُ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى بَيْنى وَ بَيْنَکَ، وَ اَرْضِ عَنّى خَلْقَکَ وَ اَتْمِمْ عَلَىَّ نِعْمَتَکَ، كَما اَتْمَمْتَها عَلى ابائى مِنْ قَبْلُ، وَ لا تَجْعَلْ لاَحَدٍ مِنَ الْمَخْلُوقينَ عَلَىَّ فيهَا امْتِنانآ، وَامْنُنْ عَلَىَّ كَما مَنَنْتَ عَلى ابائى مِنْ قَبْلُ، يا كهيعص، اَللّهُمَّ كَما صَّلَيْتَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ الِهِ فَاسْتَجِبْ لى دُعائى فيما سَئَلْتُ يا كَريمُ يا كَريمُ يا كَريمُ.

O Allah, if I have disobeyed you, I have also obeyed you in my belief in You. This is out of Your favoring upon me, not a favor that I do to You. I have also obeyed You in the things that You most like: I have not claimed that You have child and I have not associated any one with You. Yet, I have disobeyed You in many things, on account of neither defiance, nor rebellion against my servitude to You, nor denial of Your Godhead; rather, I only followed my lusts, and Satan caused me to slip although You have had clear argument against me. Thus, if You chastise me, then it is on account of my sins and You are never unjust to me. And if You pardon me and have mercy upon me, then this is out of Your magnanimity and generosity, O All-generous! O Allah, nothing can stand for my sins except my hope in Your pardon, although I have done things due to which I deserve deprivation of Your pardon. Therefore, I beseech You, O Allah, for that which I do not deserve and I seek from You which I do not merit. O Allah, if you chastise me, then this will be on account of my sins and You shall never be unjust to me. But if You forgive me, then You are already the best of all those who show mercy, O my Master. O Allah, You are what You are and I am what I am: You are always returning with forgiveness and I always return with sinning. You always confer with forbearance and I always return with impatience. O Allah, I do beseech You, O treasure of the weak, O He in Whom great hope is put, O rescuer of the drowned, O savior of those about to perish, O He Who causes the Alive to die, O He Who causes the dead to live again! You are Allah; there is no god but You. It is You before Whom has prostrated the rays of the sun, the sound of water, the rusting of trees and the moonlight, the murk of night, the light of daytime, and the flapping of birds. I thus beseech You, O All-great, in the name of the duty of Muhammad and his veracious progeny towards You, in the name of Your duty towards Muhammad and his veracious progeny, in the name of the duty of Ali towards You, in the name of Your duty towards Ali, in the name of the duty of Fatimah towards You, in the name of Your duty towards Fatimah, in the name of the duty of Hasan towards You, in the name of Your duty towards Hasan, in the name of the duty of Hussain towards You, and in the name of Your duty towards Hussain. Verily, Your duty towards them is one of the greatest blessings that You conferred upon them. And (I beseech You) in the name of the position that You enjoy with them and in the name of the position that they enjoy with You to (please) bless them, O Lord, with blessings that are as endless until they attain Your pleasure, to forgive me, in their names, the sins that I committed concerning my duties towards You,to make Your creatures to be satisfied with me, to complete Your favors upon me in the same way as You had completed them upon my forefathers, not to cause any of Your creatures to have any role in these favors, to confer upon me with graces in the same way as You had already done with my forefathers, O kaf-ha-ya-ayn-saad!

O Allah, in the same way as You have poured blessings upon Muhammad and his progeny, (Please) respond to my entreaty as regards that which I have asked from You, O All-generous! O All-generous! O All-generous!

Allaahumma in kuntoo qad asaytoka, fa inni qad ata’atoka fee al-imaane minni beka mannaa minka Aliyyan laa mannaa minni alayka, wa ata’atoka fee ahabbe la ashyaae laka lam at-takhiz laka waladan, wa lam ad’o laka shareekan, wa qad asaytoka fee ashyaa e kathiratin alla ghayre wajhe al mokaabarate laka, wa laa al-khorooje ann obudiyyateka wa laa al-johude le robubiyyateka, walakine at-taba’to hawaaya wa azzalnee ash-shaytaano ba’ada al-hujjate alayya wal bayaane, fa inn to adhebani fabe zonubi ghayra zaa lamin lee, wa in ta’afo anni wa tarhamnee fa be joodeka wa karameka yaa kareemo, allahhumma inna dhonubee lam yabqa lahaa illaa rajaao afweka, wa qad qaddamto aalata al-hirmaane, fa anaa as-aloka allahumma maa laa astaw jebohu wa atlobu minka maa laa astahiqqohu, allahhumma inn toadhibnee fa be dhonubi wa lam tazlimni shay’aa, wa inn taghfirlee fa khayro raahemin anta yaa sayyedi, allahhumma anta anta wa anaa anaa anta al-awwado bil maghferate, wa anaa al-awwaado bi-dhonube, wa anta al-motafadhalo bil hilme, wa anaa al-awwaado bil jahle, allahumma fa anni as-aloka yaa kanza az-zoafaae, yaa adheema ar-rajaae yaa moonqadha al-gharqee yaa moonjiya al-halkee, yaa momeeta al-ahyaae yaa muhyeya al-mawtee, antallaho laa elaaha illaa anta, antal ladhee sajadalaka shoaao ash-shamse wa dawiyya al-maae, wa hafeefo ash-shajare wa noorul qamare wa dhulmato al-layle wa zaw oonnahaare, wa khafaqaano at-tayre, fa as-aloka allahhumma yaa adheemo be haqqeka alla Muhammadin wa aalehi as-saadeqin, be haqqe Muhammadin wa aalehi as-saadeqeen alayka be haqqeka alla al-Hasane wa behaqqe al-Hasane alayka, wa be haqqeka alal Husayne wa be haqqe al Husayne alayka, fainna hoquqahum alayka min afdhale in aameka alayhim, wa bish-shaane al-ladhee laka indahum wa bish-shaane al-ladhee lahum indaka, swalle alayhim yaa rabbe salutan daaematan muntahee redhaaka, waghfir lee behemo adhonubal latee bayni wa baynaka, war dhe anni khalqaka wa atmim alayya nea’mateka, kamaa atmamtahaa alla Abaayi min qablo, wa laa taj’al laa hadin mena al-makhlooqayna alayya feehaa amtenaanaa, wamnoon alayya kamaa mananta alla Abaayi min qablo, yaa kaheeasa, allahhumma kamaa sallayta alla Muhammadin wa aalehi fastajeeb lee do’aa yi feema sa’alto yaa kareemo yaa kareemo kareemo

Then go to sadjdah and say :

يا مَنْ يَقْدِرُ عَلى حَوائِجِ السّائِلينَ، وَ يَعْلَمُ ما فى ضَميرِ الصّامِتينَ، يا مَنْ لا يَحْتاجُ اِلَى التَّفْسيرِ، يا مَنْ يَعْلَمُ خائِنَةَ الاَعْيُنِ وَ ما تُخفِى الصُّدُورُ، يا مَنْ اَنْزَلَ الْعَذابَ عَلى قَوْمِ يُونُسَ وَ هُوَ يُريدُ اَنْ يُعَذِّبَهُمُ، فَدَعَوْهُ وَ تَضَّرَعُوا اِلَيْهِ، فَكَشَفَ عَنْهُمُ الْعَذابَ وَ مَتَّعَهُمْ اِلى حينٍ، قَدْ تَرى مَكانى وَ تَسْمَعُ دُعائى وَ تَعْلَمُ سِرّى وَ عَلانِيَتى وَ حالى، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ الِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاكْفِنى ما اَهَمَّنى مِنْ اَمْرِ دينى وَ دُنْياىَ وَ اخِرَتى.

O He Who has full power over settling requests of beseechers Who knows what is hidden in the inner selves of the silent, O He Who does not require explanation. O He Who knows the stealthy looks and that which the chests conceal. O He Who decided chastisement to befall the people of (Prophet) Jonah (Yunus), and as He decided to chastise them, they prayed Him and besought Him; so, He removed from them the chastisement and He gave them provision until a time. You do see where I am, You do hear my prayer, You do know what I conceal, what I declare, and in what situation I am: (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and relieve me from all that which has aggrieved me from the affairs of my religion, my worldly life, and my Next Life.

Yaa man yaqdero alla hawaaeje as-saaeleen, wa ya’alamo maa fee dhameere as-saametina, yaa man laa yahtaajo elat-tafseere, yaa man ya’alamo khaaenata al-a’ayoone wa maa tukhfee as-soduro, yaa man anzala al-adhaaba alla qawme Yunus wa howa yoreedo ann yoadhe bohomaa, fada’awho wa tazza'ra owa elayhe, fakashafa anhomo al-ajaaba wa mattahum ela hinin, qad taree makaani wa tas mao do aa ee wa ta’alamo sirri wa alaa niyati wa haali, swalle alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammadin wakfini maa aham-manee min amre deeni wa dunyaay wa akhirati

Then say 70 times :

ياسَيِّدى

O my Master

Yaa sayyedee

Then get up from the sadjdah and say :

يا رَبِّ اَسْئَلُکَ بَرَكَةَ هذَا الْمُوْضِعِ وَ بَرَكَةَ اَهْلِهِ، وَ اَسْئَلُکَ اَنْ تَرْزُقَنى مِنْ رِزْقِکَ رِزْقآ حَلالا طَيِّبآ، تَسُوقُهُ اِلَىَّ بِحَوْلِکَ وَ قُوَّتِکَ وَ اَنَا خائِضٌ فى عافِيَةٍ يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ

O my Lord! I pray You to grant me the blessing of this place and the blessing of its people. I pray You to grant me sustenance from Your sustenance that is legal and pleasant, and that You bring it to me by Your might and power, while I experience good health; O most merciful of all those who show mercy.

Yaa rabbe as-aloka barakata hajaa al-mozie wa barakata ahlehi, wa as-aloka ann tarzuqnee min rizqeqa rizqa halaal tayyebaa, tasuqohoo elayya be hawleka wa quwwateka wa anaa khaaezo fee aafeyatin yaa arhamr raahemin

10- The place of Jibraa’il (A)

This is a sacred place where the Prophets, Imam Ali (A), Imam Hassan (A) and other Imams prayed.

Pray here a prayer of 2 rakaat and recite the tasbih of Zahra then this dua :

اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى اَسْئَلُکَ بِجَميعِ اَسْمائِکَ كُلِّها، ما عَلِمْنا مِنْها وَ ما لا نَعْلَمُ، وَ اَسْئَلُکَ بِاسْمِکَ الْعَظيمِ الاَعْظَمِ الْكَبيرِ الاَكْبَرِ، الَّذى مَنْ دَعاکَ بِهِ اَجَبْتَهُ وَ مَنْ سَئَلَکَ بِهِ اَعْطَيْتَهُ، وَ مَنِ اسْتَنْصَرَکَ بِهِ نَصَرْتَهُ وَ مَنِ اسْتَغْفَرَکَ بِهِ غَفَرْتَ لَهُ، وَ مَنِ اسْتَعانَکَ بِهِ اَعَنْتَهُ وَ مَنِ اسْتَرْزَقَکَ بِهِ رَزَقْتَهُ، وَ مَنِ اسْتَغاثَکَ بِهِ اَغَثْتَهُ وَ مَنِ اسْتَرْحَمَکَ بِهِ رَحِمْتَهُ، وَ مَنِ اسْتَجارَکَ بِهِ اَجَرْتَهُ وَ مَنْ تَوَكَّلَ عَلَيْکَ بِهِ كَفَيْتَهُ، وَ مَنِ اسْتَعْصَمَکَ بِهِ عَصَمْتَهُ وَ مَنِ اسْتَنْقَذَکَ بِهِ مِنَ النّارِ اَنْقَذْتَهُ، وَ مَنِ اسْتَعْطَفَکَ بِهِ تَعَطَّفْتَ لَهُ وَ مَنْ اَمَّلَکَ بِهِ اَعْطَيْتَهُ، الَّذِى اتَّخَذْتَ بِهِ ادَمَ صَفِيَآ وَ نُوحآ نَجِيّآ، وَ اِبْراهيمَ خَليلا وَ مُوسى كَليمآ وَ عيسى رُوحآ وَ مُحَمَّدآ حَبيبآ وَ عَلِيّآ وَصِيَآ صَلَّى اللّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ اَجْمَعينَ، اَنْ تَقْضِىَ لى حَوائِجى وَ تَعْفُوَ عَمّا سَلَفَ مِنْ ذُنُوبى، وَ تَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَىَّ بِما اَنْتَ اَهْلُهُ، وَ لِجَميعِ الْمُؤمنينَ وَالْمُؤْمِناتِ لِلدُّنْيا وَالاخِرَةِ، يا مُفَرِّجَ هَمِّ الْمَهْمُومينَ وَ يا غِياثَ الْمَلْهُوفينَ، لا اِلهَ اِلّا اَنْتَ سُبْحانَکَ يا رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ.

O Allah, I beseech You in the name of all Your names; those which we know and those which we do not. And I beseech You in the name of Your great, all-great, grand, and sll-grand name, which if one beseeches You by it, You will respond to him, if one begs you by it, You will give him, if one asks You for victory by it, You will give him victory, if one asks for Your forgiveness by it, You will forgive him, if one seeks Your aid by it, You will aid him, if one asks You by it for sustenance, You will grant him sustenance, if one seeks Your help by it, You will help him, if one begs Your mercy by it, You will have mercy upon him, if one seeks refuge with You by it, You will protect him, if one asks for Your support by it, You will support him, if one seeks Your shield by it, You will guard him, if one seeks You by it to save him from Hellfire, You will save him, if one seeks Your kindness by it, You will be kind to him, and if one puts hope in You by it, You will give him: the Name by which You have betaken Adam as Your choice, Noah as Your confidant, Abraham as Your intimate friend, Moses as the one spoken by You, Jesus as Your spirit, Muhammad as Your most beloved one, and Ali as Your Prophet’s successor, may Your blessings be upon all of them, (I beseech You) to grant me my requests, overlook my past sins, and confer upon me with that which befits You as well as upon all the believing men and women in this world and the world to come. O He Who relieves the grievances of the aggrieved ones! O He Who aids the confused ones! There is no god but You. All glory be to You, O Lord of the worlds.

Allahhumma inni as-aloka be jamee’e as-maaka kullehaa, maa Alimna minhaa wa maa laa na’almo, wa as-aloka be ismeka al-adheeme la a’adhame al-akbare, al-ladhee man da’aaka behi ajabtahu wa man sa-alaka behi a’ataytahu, wa manis tansaraqa behi nasartahu wa manis taghfaraka behi ghafar’ta lahu, wa manis ta aanaka behi a-antahu wa manis tarjaqaka behi razaqtahu, wa manis taghaathaka behi aghathtahu wa manis tarhamaka behi rahimtahu, wa manis tajaaraka behi ajartahu wa man tawakkala a’layka behi kafaytahu, wa manis ta’asamaka behi asamtahu wa manis tanaqadhaka behi menannaare an-qadhtahu, wa manis ta’atafaka behi ta’attafta lahu wa man ammalaka behi a’ataytahu al-ladhee at-takhazta behi Aadama safiyaaa sallallaaho alayhim ajmaeen,an taqdheya lee hawaaejee wa ta’afova ammaa salafa min dhonubi, wa tatafadhala alayyaa bemaa anta ah-lohu, wale jamee e al-momineena wal mominaate lid-dunyaa wa laa kherate, yaa mofarreja hammil mahmoomina wa yaa gheyaatha al malhufeena, laa elaaha illaa anta subhaanaka yaa rabbal aalameen.

11- The place of Imam Zaynul Abideen (A)

This is the place of prayer of Imam Zaynul Abideen (A) - (4th Imam). Pray here 2 rakaat, then recite the tasbih of Zahra and this dua :

اَللّهُمَّ اِنَّ ذُنُوبى قَدْ كَثُرَتْ وَلَمْ يَبْقَ لَها اِلّا رَجآءُ عَفْوِکَ، وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ آلَةَ الْحِرْمانِ اِلَيْکَ فَاَنَا اَسْئَلُکَ اللّهُمَّ ما لا اَسْتَوْجِبُهُ، وَاَطْلُبُ مِنْکَ ما لا اَسْتَحِقُّهُ، اَللّهُمَّ اِنْ تُعَذِّبْنى فَبِذُنُوبى وَلَمْ تَظْلِمْنى شَيْئاً، وَاِنْ تَغْفِرْ لى فَخَيْرُ راحِمٍ اَنْتَ يا سَيِّدى، اَللّهُمَّ اَنْتَ اَنْتَ وَاَنَا اَنَا، اَنْتَ الْعَوّادُ بِالْمِغْفِرَةِ وَاَنَا الْعَوّادُ بِالذُّنُوبِ، وَاَنْتَ الْمُتَفَضِّلُ بِالْحِلْمِ وَاَنَا الْعَوّادُ بِالْجَهْلِ، اَللّهُمَّ فَاِنّى اَسْئَلُکَ يا كَنْزَ الضُّعَفآءِ يا عَظيمَ الرَّجآءِ، يا مُنْقِذَ الْغَرْقى يا مُنْجِىَ الْهَلْكى، يا مُميتَ الاَحْيآءِ يا مُحْيِىَ الْمَوْتى اَنْتَ اللهُ الَّذى لا اِلـهَ اِلّا اَنْتَ، اَنْتَ الَّذى سَجَدَ لَکَ شُعاعُ الشَّمْسِ وَنُورُ الْقَمَرِ، وَظُلْمَةُ اللَّيْلِ وَضَوْءُ النَّهارِ، وَخَفَقانُ الطَّيْرِ، فَاَسْئَلُکَ اللّهُمَّ يا عَظيمُ بِحَقِّکَ يا كَريمُ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الصّادِقينَ، وَبِحَقِّ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الصّادِقينَ عَلَيْکَ، وَبِحَقِّکَ عَلى عَلِىٍّ وَبِحَقِّ عَلِىٍّ عَلَيْکَ، وَبِحَقِّکَ عَلى فاطِمَةَ وَبِحَقِّ فاطِمَةَ عَلَيْکَ، وَبِحَقِّکَ عَلَى الْحَسَنِ وَبِحَقِّ الْحَسَنِ عَلَيْکَ، وَبِحَقِّکَ عَلَى الْحُسَيْنِ وَبِحَقِّ الْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْکَ، فَاِنَّ حُقُوقَهُمْ مِنْ اَفْضَلِ اِنْعامِکَ عَلَيْهِمْ، وَبِالشَّاْنِ الَّذى لَکَ عِنْدَهُمْ، وَبِالشَّاْنِ الَّذى لَهُمْ عِنْدَکَ، صَلِّ يا رَبِّ عَلَيْهِمْ صَلوةً دآئِمَةً مُنْتَهى رِضاکَ، وَاغْفِرْ لى بِهِمُ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى بَيْنى وَبَيْنَکَ، وَاَتْمِمْ نِعْمَتَکَ عَلَىَّ كَما اَتْمَمْتَها عَلى آبائى مِنْ قَبْلُ، يا كهيعص اَللّهُمَّ كَما صَلَّيْتَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ فَاسْتَجِبْ لى دُعآئى فيـما سَئَلْتُکَ.

O Allah, my sins have been growing and nothing can stand for them except the hope in Your pardon, although I have done things due to which I deserve deprivation of Your pardon. Therefore, I beseech You, O Allah, for that which I do not deserve and I seek from You that which I do not merit. O Allah, If you chastise me, then this will be on account of my sins and You shall never be unjust to me. But if You forgive me, then You are already the best of all those who show mercy, O my Master. O Allah, You are what You are and I am what I am: You always return with forgiveness and I always return with sinning. You always confer with forbearance and I always return with impatience.

O Allah, I do beseech You, O treasure of the weak! O He in Whom great hope is put! O rescuer of the drowned! O savior of those about to perish! O He Who causes the Alive to die! O He Who causes the dead to live again. You are Allah; there is no god but You. It is You before Whom have prostrated the rays of the sun, the moonlight, the murk of night, the light of daytime, and the flapping of birds.

I thus beseech You, O All-great, in the name of the duty of Muhammad and his veracious progeny towards You, O Allgenerous, in the name of Your duty towards Muhammad and his veracious progeny, in the name of the duty of Ali towards You, in the name of Your duty towards Ali, in the name of the duty of Fatimah towards You, in the name of Your duty towards Fatimah, in the name of the duty of Hasan towards You, in the name of Your duty towards Hasan, in the name of the duty of Hussain towards You, and in the name of Your duty towards Hussain. Verily, Your duty towards them is one of the greatest blessings that You conferred upon them. And (I beseech You) in the name of the position that You enjoy with them and in the name of the position that they enjoy with You to (please) bless them, O Lord, with blessings that are endless until they attain Your pleasure, to forgive me, in their names, the sins that I committed concerning my duties towards You, to complete Your favors upon me in the same way as You had completed them upon my forefathers. O kaf-ha-ya-ayn-saad! O Allah, just as You have poured blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, (please) respond to my entreaty as regards that which I have asked from You.

Allahumma inna dhonubee qad kathurat wa lam yabqa lahaa illaa rajaaao afweka, wa qad qaddamto aalata al-hirmaane elayka fa anaa as-aloka allahhumma maa laa astawjebohu, wa atlobo minka maa laa as tahiqqohu, allaahumma in to-a’dhibni fabedhonubi wa lam tadhlimnee shay-an, wa in taghfir lee fakhayro raaheme anta yaa sayyedi, allahhumma anta anta wa anaa anaa, antal awwaado bil maghferate wa anal awwaado bidhonubi, wa antal motafadhelo bil hilme wa anal awwaado bil jahle, allahhumma fa inni as-aloka yaa kanza adhoafaa e yaa adheema ar-radhaae, yaa munqedha al qharqee yaa moonjiya al-halkee, yaa momeeta la ahyaae yaa muhyeya al-mawtee antallaahul ladhee laa elaha illaa anta, antal lazdhee sajada laka shoaao ash-shamse wa nuro al-qamare, wa dhulmato al-layle wa dhaw’o annahaare, wa khafaqaano at-tayre, fa as-aloka allahhumma yaa azeemo be haqqeka yaa kareemo alla Muhammadin wa aalehi as-saadeqin, wa be haqqe Muhammadin wa aalehi as-saadeqina alayka, wa be haqqeka alla alayye wa be haqqe Aliyye alayka, wa be haqqe alla faatemata wabe haqqe faatemata alayka, wa be haqqeka alal Hasane wa be haqqil Hasane alayka, wa be haqqeka alal Husayne wa be haqqe al-Husayne alayka, fa inna hoquqahum min afdhale in’aameka alayhim, wa bish-shaane al-ladhee laka indahum, wa bish-shaane al-lazee lahum indeka, swalle yaa rabbe alayhim salawtan daaematan muntahee redhaaka, waghfir lee behemo adhonuba al-latee baynee wa baynaka, wa at-mim ne’amateka alayya kamaa at-mamtahaa alla aabaa ee min qablo, yaa kaheeas allahhumma kamaa sallayta alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammadin fastajeeb lee doaaaee feemaa sa’altoka.

Then go to sadjdah, put the right side of your face on the ground and say :

يا سَيِّدى يا سَيِّدى يا سَيِّدى صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاغْفِرْ لى وَاغْفِرْ لى.

O my Master! O my Master! O my Master! Bless Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and forgive me, please forgive me.

Yaa sayyedi yaa sayyedi yaa sayyedi swalle alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammadin waghfir lee waghfir lee.

12- The place of the Prophet Nuh (A)

Pray 2 prayers of 2 rakaat, then recite the tasbih of Zahra (A) and this dua :

اللّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحمّدٍ وَآلِ مُحمّدٍ، وَاقْضِ حاجَتى يا اَللّه يا مَنْ لايُخَيِّبُ سائِلَهُ وَلا يَنْفَدُ نائِلُهُ، يا قاضِىَ الحاجاتِ، يامُجيبَ الدَّعواتِ، يا رَبّ الاَرَضينَ وَالسَّمواتِ، يا كاشِفَ الْكُرُباتِ، يا واسِعَ الْعَطِيّاتِ، يا دافِعَ النَّقِماتِ، يامُبَدِّلَ السَّيئاتِ حَسَناتٍ، عِدْ عَلَىَّ بِطَوْلِکَ وَفَضْلِکَ وَاِحْسانِکَ، وَاسْتَجِبْ دُعائى فيما سَأَلْتُکَ وَطَلَبْتُ مِنْکَ بِحَقِّ نَبِيِّکَ وَوَصِيِّکَ وَاَوْلِيائِکَ الصّالِحينَ.

O Allah, (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and grant my request. O Allah! O He Whose beseecher is never disappointed and Whose gifts are unlimited! O Settler of needs! O Responding to the prayers! O Lord of the earths and the heavens! O Reliever of agonies! O expansive Donor of gifts! O Savior from hardships! O He Who changes the punishments of wrongdoings into rewards for good deeds! (Please do) confer upon me with Your bounty, favor, and kindness, and (please do) respond to my prayers regarding that which I have besought and asked from You, in the name of Your Prophet, Your Prophet’s successor, and Your righteous saints.

Allahumma swalle alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammadin, waqdhe haa jatee yaa allah man laa yokhayyebo saaelahu wa laa yanfadu naaelahu. Yaa qaadhiya al hajaate, yaa mojeeba ad-da’waate, yaa rabbal aradheena was-samaawate, yaa kaashefa al-korubaate, yaa waase’a al-atiyyaate, yaa daafe’a an-naqemaate, yaa mubaddela as-sayyeaate Hasanaa'teen, id alayya be tawleka wa fadhleka wa ehsaaneka, was tajeeb do aa ee feemaa sa altoka wa talabto minka be haqqin nabiyyeka wa wasiyyeka wa awliyaaeka as-saalehin.

13- The place of prayer (Mihràb) of the Prince of Believers, Imam Ali (A)

This is the place where he was struck by a mortal blow. Pray 2 rakaat, recite the tasbih of Zahra then this dua :

يا مَنْ اَظْهَرَ الْجَميلَ وَ سَتَرَ الْقَبيحَ، يا مَنْ لَمْ يُؤاخِذْ بِالْجَريرَةِ وَ لَمْ يَهْتِکَ السِّتْرَ وَالسَّريرَةَ، يا عَظيمَ الْعَفْوِ يا حَسَنَ التَّجاوُزِ، يا واسِعَ الْمَغْفِرَةِ يا باسِطَ الْيَدَيْنِ بِالرَّحْمَةِ، يا صاحِبَ كُلِّ نَجْوى يا مُنْتَهى كُلِّ شَكْوى، يا كَريمَ الصَّفْحِ يا عَظيمَ الرَّجاءِ، يا سَيِّدى صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ الِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَافْعَلْ بى ما اَنْتَ اَهْلُهُ يا كَريمُ.

O He Who makes known what is good and beautiful and covers up ugliness and defects! O He Who does not demand submission under duress and has not exposed the hidden and the unknown! O He Who is the greatest pardoner! O He Who is the subtle indulgent! O He Whose forgiveness is limitless! O He Whose hands are expansive with mercy! O He Who is partner in every confidential speech! O He to Whom all complaints reach! O He Who is generous in leniency! O He in Whom all hopes are put! O my Master, send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and do to me that which befits You, O All-generous!

Yaa man adh-hara al-jameela wa satara al-qabeeha, yaa man lam yuwaa khiz bil jareerate wa lam yahteka as-sitra was-sareerata, yaa adheema al-afwe yaa Hasana at-tajaawuze, yaa waaseal maghferate yaa baaseta al-yadayne bir-rahmate, yaa saaheba kulle najwee yaa muntahi kulle shakwee, yaa kareema as-safhe yaa adheema ar-radhaa’e, yaa sayyedi swalle alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammadin wa af’al bee maa anta ah-lahu yaa kareemo.

14- The place of the intimate munajat of the Prince of Believers.

اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى اَسْئَلُکَ الاَمانَ يَوْمَ لا يَنْفَعُ مالٌ وَ لا بَنُونَ، اِلّا مَنْ اَتَى اللّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَليمٍ، وَ اَسْئَلُکَ الاَمانَ يَوْمَ يَعَضُّ الظّالِمُ عَلى يَدَيْهِ، يَقُولُ يا لَيْتَنِى اتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ الرَّسُولِ سَبيلاً، وَاَسْئَلُکَ الاَمانَ يَوْمَ يُعْرَفُ الْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسيماهُمْ، فَيُؤْخَذُ بِالنَّواصى وَ الاَقْدامِ، وَ اَسْئَلُکَ الاَمانَ يَوْمَ لا يَجْزى والِدٌ عَنْ وَلَدِهِ، وَ لا مَوْلُودٌ هُوَ جازٍ عَنْ والِدِهِ شَيْئاً، اِنَّ وَعْدَ اللّهِ حَقٌّ وَ اَسْئَلُکَ الاَمانَ يَوْمَ لا يَنْفَعُ الظّالِمينَ مَعْذِرَتُهُمْ، وَ لَهُمُ الّلَعْنةُ وَ لَهُمْ سُوءُ الّدارِ، وَ اَسْئَلُکَ الاَمانَ يَوْمَ لا تَمْلِکُ نَفْسٌ لِنَفْسٍ شَيْئاً، وَ الاَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلّهِ، وَ اَسْئَلُکَ الاَمانَ يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ اَخيهِ، وَ اُمِّهِ وَ اَبيهِ وَ صاحِبَتِهِ وَ بَنيهِ، لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنيهِ، وَ اَسْئَلُکَ الاَمانَ يَوْمَ يَوَدُّ الْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدى مِنْ عَذابِ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِبَنيهِ، وَ صاحِبَتِهِ وَ اَخيهِ وَ فَصيلَتِهِ الَّتى تُؤْويهِ، وَ مَنْ فِى الاَرْضِ جَميعاً ثُمَّ يُنْجيهِ، كَلّا اِنَّها لَظى نَزّاعَةً لِلشَّوى، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْمَوْلى وَ اَنَا الْعَبْدُ، وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْعَبْدَ اِلاَّ الْمَوْلى، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْمالِکُ وَ اَنَا الْمَمْلُوکُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمَمْلُوکَ اِلاَّ الْمالِکُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْعَزيزُ وَاَنَا الذَّليلُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الذَّليلَ اِلاَّ الْعَزيزُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْخالِقُ وَ اَنَا الْمَخْلُوقُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمَخْلُوقَ اِلاَّ الْخالِقُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْعَظيمُ وَ اَنَا الْحَقيرُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْحَقيرَ اِلاَّ الْعَظيمُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْقَوِىُّ وَ اَنَا الضَّعيفُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الضَّعيفَ اِلاَّ الْقَوِىُّ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْغَنِىُّ وَ اَنَا الْفَقيرُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْفَقيرَ اِلاَّ الْغَنِىُّ، مَوْلاىَ يَا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْمُعْطى ؤَ اَنَا السّآئِلُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ السّآئِلَ اِلاَّ الْمُعْطى، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْحَىُّ وَ اَنَا الْمَيِّتُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمَيِّتَ اِلاَّ الْحَىُّ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْباقى وَ اَنَا الْفانى وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْفانِىَ اِلاَّ الْباقى، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ آلدّآئِمُ وَ اَنَا الزّآئِلُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الزّآئِلَ اِلاَّ الدّآئِمُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الرّازِقُ وَ اَنَا الْمَرْزُوقُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمَرزُوقَ اِلاَّ الرّازِقُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْجَوادُ وَ اَنَا الْبَخيلُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْبَخيلَ اِلاَّ الْجَوادُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْمُعافى وَ اَنَا الْمُبْتَلى وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمُبْتَلى اِلاَّ الْمُعافى، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْكَبيرُ وَ اَنَا الصَّغيرُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الصَّغيرَ اِلاَّ الْكَبيرُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْهادى وَ اَنَا الضّآلُّ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الضّآلَّ اِلاَّ الْهادى، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الرَّحْمنُ وَ اَنَا الْمَرْحُومُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمَرْحُومَ اِلاَّ الرَّحْمنُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ السُّلْطانُ وَ اَنَا الْمُمْتَحَنُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمُمْتَحَنَ اِلاَّ السُّلْطانُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الدَّليلُ وَ اَنَا الْمُتَحَيِّرُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمُتَحَيِّرَ اِلاَّ الدَّليلُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْغَفُورُ وَ اَنَا الْمُذْنِبُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمُذْنِبَ اِلاَّ الْغَفُورُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْغالِبُ وَ اَنَا الْمَغْلُوبُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمَغْلُوبَ اِلاَّ الْغالِبُ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الرَّبُّ وَ اَنَا الْمَرْبُوبُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْمَرْبُوبَ اِلاَّ الرَّبُّ، مَوْلاىَ يا مَوْلاىَ اَنْتَ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ وَ اَنَا الْخاشِعُ وَ هَلْ يَرْحَمُ الْخاشِعَ اِلاَّ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ، مَوْلاىَ يامَوْلاىَ اِرْحَمْنى بِرَحْمَتِکَ وَ ارْضَ عَنّى بِجُودِکَ وَ كَرَمِکَ وَ فَضْلِکَ، يا ذَالْجُودِ وَ الاِحْسانِ وَالطَّوْلِ وَ الاِمْتِنانِ بِرَحْمَتِکَ يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ.

O Allah, I ask You for protection on the day when property will not avail, nor sons except he who comes with a heart free (from evil). And I ask You for protection on the day when the unjust one will bite his hands saying: O would that I had taken a way with the messenger.
And I ask You for protection on the day when the guilty shall be recognised by their marks so they shall be seized by the forelocks and the feet.
And I ask You for protection on the day when a father shall not give any satisfaction for his son nor shall the child give any satisfaction for his father;
surely the promise of Allah is true. And I ask You for protection on the day when the unjust shall not benefit from their excuse and for them is curse and for them is the evil abode.
And I ask You for protection on the day when no soul shall control anything for (another) soul and the command on that day shall be entirely Allah's.
And I ask You for protection on the day when a man shall flee from his brother, and his mother, his father, his spouse, and his children, each one of them on that day will have a concern which will occupy him.
And I ask You for protection on the day when the guilty will wish to redeem himself from the punishment of that day by (sacrificing) his children, and the near of kin who gave him shelter and all those that are in the earth (wising) that this might deliver him.
By no means! Surely it is a flaming fire, dragging by the head. My Lord, O my Lord, You are the Master and I am the Slave, and who else can be merciful to the slave except the Master?

My Lord, O my Lord, You are the Provider and I am the blessed, and who else can be merciful to the blessed except the Provider?
My Lord, O my Lord, You are the Generous and I am the miser, and who else can be merciful to the miser except the Generous?

Mon My Lord, O my Lord, have mercy on me by Your mercy, and be pleased with me by Your Generosity and Your Magnanimity and Your Grace, O the Generous, and Beneficent, O the Almighty and the Benefactor, By your Mercy, O the most Merciful of the Merciful.

Allahhumma inni as-aloka al amaana yawma laa yanfao maalo wa laa banoona, illaa man ateellaaha be qalbin saleemin, wa as-aloka alaamaan yawma yu’arafo al-mujremoona be seemahum, fa yu’akhadhu binnawaa see wal aqdaame, wa as-aloka al amaana yawma laa yaj-zee waaledo ann waladehe, wa laa mawloodo howa jaazin ann waaledehi shay-ann, inna wa’adallaahe haqqo wa as-aloka al amaana yawma laa yanfa’o adhwaalemina ma’adhiratohum, wa lahomo al-la’anato walahum so ulladaare,wa as-aloka al ammana yawma laa tamleko nafso le nafsin shay’ann, wal amro yawmaedhin lillahe, wa as-aloka al-amaane yawma yafirro al-mar’o min akheehe, wa ummehi wa abeehe wa saahebatehi wa banihe, le kulle amreyin minhum yawmaedhin shaano yughnayhe, wa as-aloka al-amaana yawma yawaddo al-muzremo law yaftadee min adhaabe yawmaedhin be banihe, wa saahebatehi wa akheehe, wa faseelatehil latee tuweehe, wa man fee al-ardhe jamee’an thumma yunjeehe, kallaa innahaa ladhaa nazzaa’atan lish-shawee,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya anta al mawlee wa anaa al-abdo, wa hal yarhamo al-abda illal mawlee,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antal maaleko wa anaa al mamluko wa hal yarhamo al-mamluka illal maaleko,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antal azeezo wa anaa adh-dhaleelo wa hal yarhamo adh-dhaleelo illaa al-azeezo,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antal khaaleqo wa anaa al-makhlooqo wa hal yarhamo al-makhlooqa illal khaaleqo,

mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antal qawiyyo wa anaa adh-dhaeefo wa hal yarhamo adh-dhaeefo illal qawiyyo,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antal ghaniyyo wa anal faqeero wa hal yarhamo al-faqeera illal ghaniyyo,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya anta al-ma’atee wa anaa as-saaelo wa hal yarhamo as-saaela illal mu’a-tee,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antal hayyo wa anaa al-mayyeto wa hal yarhamo al-mayyeta illaa al-hayyo,

mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya anta ad-daaaemo wa anaa az-zaaaelo wa hal yarhamo az-zaaaela illaa ad-daaaemo,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antar raazeqo wa anaa al-marzooqo wa hal yarhamo al-marzooqo illa raazeqo
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya anta al jawaad wa anaa al-bakhila hal yarhamo al-bakhila illal jawaado,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya anta al-mo’aafee wa anaa al-mubtalaa wa hal yarhamo al-mubtalaa illal moaafee,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antal kabeero wa anaa as-sagheero wa hal yarhamo as-sagheera illal kabeero,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya anta al-haadi wa anaa adhwaallu wa hal yarhamo adhwaallu illal haadi,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antar rahmano wa anal marhoomo wa hal yarhamo al-marhoomo illal rahmano,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antas sultaano wa anaa al-mumtahano wa hal yarhamo al-mumtahana illas sultaano,
mawlaaya yaa mawlaaya antad daleelo wa anaa al-mutahayyero wa hal yarhamo al-mutahayyero illaa ad-daleelo,
