15- The place of Imam as-Sadiq (A) - (6th Imam)

This is the place where Imam as-Sadiq (A) prayed and invoked God. Pray 2 rakaat, recite tasbih Zahra and this dua :

يا صانِعَ كُلِّ مَصْنُوعٍ، وَ يا جابِرَ كُلِّ كَسيرٍ، وَ يا حاضِرَ كُلِّ مَلاَءٍ وَ يا شاهِدَ كُلِّ نَجْوى، وَ يا عالِمَ كُلِّ خَفِيَّةٍ، و يا شاهِدآ غَيْرَ غائِبٍ، وَ يا غالِبآ غَيْرَ مَغْلُوبٍ، وَ يا قَريبآ غَيْرَ بَعيدٍ، وَ يا مُونِسَ كُلِّ وَحيدٍ، وَ يا حَيّآ حينَ لا حَىَّ غَيْرُهُ، يا مُحْيِىَ الْمُوْتى، وَ مُميتَ الاَحْياءِ، الْقائِمَ عَلى كُلِّ نَفْسٍ بِما كَسَبَتْ، لا اِلهَ اِلّا اَنْتَ صَلَّ عَلى مُحَمّدٍ وَ الِ مُحَمَّدٍ.

O He Who Makes all things! O He Who sets all things broken! O He Who is present in all sessions held! O He Who witnesses all confidential meetings! O He Who knows about all things hidden! O He Who is always nearby and is never absent! O He Who always overcomes and is never defeated! O He Who is always nigh and is never far off! O He Who entertains each and every lonely one! O He Who existed when there was no other being exists! O He Who restores lives to the dead and causes the Alive to die! O He Who watches every soul as to what it earns! There is no god but You. (Please do) send blessings upon Muhammad and the offspring of Muhammad and and His family.

Yaa saane’a kulle masnooinn, wa yaa jaabera kulle kasirin, wa yaa haajera kulle malaain wa yaa shaaheda kulle najwee, wa yaa aalame kulle kahfiyyatin, wa yaa shaahedaa ghayra ghaaebin, wa yaa ghaalebaa ghayra maghloobin, wa yaa qareebaa ghayra ba idin, wa yaa moonesa kulle waheedin, wa yaa hayyaa heena laa hayya ghayrohu yaa muhyey al-mawtee, wa momeeta al-ahyaa’e, al-qaaema alla kulle nafsin bema kasabat, laa elaaha illaa anta swalle alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammad.

16- The pulpit (mimbar) of Masjid-e-Kufa

On the right side of the Mihràb is the Mimbar. This is the place of the speeches of the Prince of Believers.

17- The tomb of Muslim ibn Aqil

Hazrat Muslim was a cousin of Imam Hussein (A) ; they had a strong affection for each other. He also became his brother-in-law after marrying one of Imam Ali's daughters, named Roqaya. Particularly strong and courageous, he will remain forever a model of dedication and sacrifice.

Imam Hussein (A) was strongly urged by the people of Kufa, who remembered the righteousness and clemency of his father's government, Imam Ali (A). They had put pressure on his moral and religious responsibility towards them. However, they were known for their unreliability.

Shortly before the events in Karbala, Imam Hussein (A) sent Muslim ibn Aqil to inquire about the stability of his people's feelings towards him. When Muslim ibn Aqil arrived in the city, they gave him a triumphant welcome.

Muslim Ibne Aqil, confident of the people’s loyalty towards the Imam, then sent a reassuring message to his Imam, telling him of the good intentions of the Kufis. But as soon as Ubaydullah ibn Zyad, the cruel governor of Basra (hurriedly dispatched by Yazid) made his entry into the city, threatening his inhabitants with terrible reprisals, their courage vanished and they abandoned Muslim to his fate. The emissary of the Imam was left alone in an unknown and hostile city. It was at this crucial moment that Hani ibn Urwa, a notable and sincere partisan of the Ahl-al-Bayt, brought all his help by giving him asylum in his own house. Ubaydulah ibn Zyad was actively searching for him. He was particularly furious to learn that Hani, one of the most influential people in Kufa, had hidden him at home. He had him arrested and summoned him to surrender to him. Faced with his categorical refusal, he did not hesitate to beat this respectable person with his cane, wounding his nose, and put him in prison. Muslim ibn Aqil had meanwhile been able to escape and find refuge somewhere else. But he was exposed by a greedy Kufi, and surrounded very quickly by the agents of Ibn Zyad. He defended himself with courage, showing his bravery as a Hashimites (the original clan of the Prophet (S)). The leader of the troop had to call for reinforcements and a treacherous maneuver to capture this man alone, and he was yet more valiant than all his men together. On the orders of Governor Ibn Zyad, Muslim ibn Aqil and Hani ibn Urwa were both pushed down from the top of a palace tower, the Darul Imara, to Kufa.

This was in the year 60 after the Hijra and they are the first Martyrs in the history of Karbala.

Ziyarat :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ اَيُّهَا الْعَبْدُ الصّالِحُ الْمُطيعُ للهِ وَلِرَسُولِهِ، وَلاَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ وَالْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ، اَلْحَمْدُ للهِ وَسَلامٌ عَلى عِبادِهِ، الَّذينَ اصْطَفى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَةُاللهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ وَمَغْفِرَتُهُ وَعَلى رُوحِکَ وَبَدَنِکَ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ مَضَيْتَ عَلى مامَضى عَلَيْهِ الْبَدْرِيُّونَ الْمُجاهِدُونَ فى سَبيلِ اللهِ، الْمُبالِغُونَ فى جِهادِ اَعْدآئِهِ وَنُصْرَةِ اَوْلِيآئِهِ، فَجَزاکَ اللهُ اَفْضَلَ الْجَزآءِ وَاَكْثَرَ الْجَزآءِ وَاَوْفَرَ جَزآءِ اَحَدٍ مِمَّنْ وَفى بِبَيْعَتِهِ، وَاسْتَجابَ لَهُ دَعْوَتَهُ وَاَطاعَ وُلاةَ اَمْرِهِ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ قَدْ بالَغْتَ فِى النَّصيحَةِ وَاَعْطَيْتَ غايَةَ الْمَجْهُودِ، حَتّى بَعَثَکَ اللهُ فِى الشُّهَدآءِ وَجَعَلَ رُوحَکَ مَعَ اَرْواحِ آلسُّعَدآءِ، وَاَعْطـاکَ مِنْ جِنانِهِ اَفْسَحَها مَنْزِلاً وَاَفْضَلَها غُرَفاً، وَرَفَعَ ذِكْرَکَ فِى الْعِلِّيّينَ وَحَشَرَکَ مَعَ النَّبِيّينَ وَالصِّدّيقينَ وَالشُّهَدآءِ وَالصّالِحينَ، وَحَسُنَ اوُلئِکَ رَفيقاً، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ لَمْ تَهِنْ وَلَمْ تَنْكُلْ، وَاَنَّکَ قَدْ مَضَيْتَ عَلى بَصيرَةٍ مِنْ اَمْرِکَ مُقْتَدِياً بِالْصّالِحينَ، وَمُتَّبِعاً لِلنَّبِيّينَ، فَجَمَعَ اللهُ بَيْنَنا وَبَيْنَکَ وَبَيْنَ رَسُولِهِ وَاَوْلِيآئِهِ فى مَنازِلِ الْمُخْبِتينَ فَاِنَّهُ اَرْحَمُ الرّاحِمينَ.

Peace be upon you, O righteous servant (of Allah), who is obedient to Allah, to His Messenger, to the Commander of the Faithful, to Hasan, and to Hussain, peace be upon them. All praise be to Allah and all peace be upon His servants whom He has chosen: Muhammad and his progeny. Peace, Allah’s mercy, blessings and forgiveness be upon you and upon your soul and your body. I bear witness that you died for the same principles for which the martyrs of the Battle of Badr died; those who struggled in Allah’s way and did their best in struggling against Allah’s enemies and in supporting Allah’s friends. So, may Allah reward you with the best rewarding, with the most abundant rewarding and with the most affluent rewarding that He grants to one who fulfilled his allegiance to Him, responded to His invitation, and obeyed His representatives. I bear witness that you exerted all efforts in acting sincerely and you put forth all possible endeavors so that Allah has included you with the martyrs, put your soul with the souls of the delighted ones, has decided for you the most spacious abode in the gardens of His Paradise and the best rooms therein, raised your name to the Illiyeen (the loftiest place), and added you to the group of the prophets, the veracious ones, the martyrs, and the righteous ones. How excellent is the company of these! I bear witness that you never slackened or recoiled (from your duty) and that you died while you were certain of your doctrine as you followed the righteous ones and imitated the prophets. So, may Allah gather us with you and with His Messenger and intimate servants in the abodes of the modest ones! Surely, He is the most merciful of all those who show mercy.

Assalaamo a’layka ayyohal abdo as-saaleho al-mateeo lillaahe wa le rasoolehi, wal ameeril momineena wal Hasane wal Husayne alayhim as-salaamo, al-hamdulillahe was-salaamo alla ebaadehi, al-ladheena as-tafee Muhammadin wa aalehi, was salaamo alaykum wa rahmutalaahe wa barakatohu wa maghferatohu wa alla rooheka wa badaneka, ash-hado annaka madhayte alla maamadhwee alayhe al-badriyyuna al-mojaaheduna fee sabilillaahe, al mobaleghuna fee jehaade a-adaaehi wa nusrate awliyaaehi, wa jazaakallaaho afdhala al-jazaa’e wa akthara al-jazaa’e wa awfara jazaa’e ahadin mammin wa fee be bay’atehi, was tajaAba lahu da’awatahu wa ataa’a woolaata am-rehi, ash-hado annaka qad balaghta fee naseehate wa a’atayta ghaayatal majhude, hattee ba athakallaaho fee ash-shohdaa e wa ja’ala roohaka ma’a arwaahe as-so’adaae, wa a’ataaka min jenaanehi afsahahaa manzilan wa afdhwalahaa ghurafan, warafa’a dhikreka fee al-illiyyina wa hasharaka ma’an nabiyyina was siddiqeena wash-shohadaa e was-saalehina, wa hasuna wulaaeka rafeeqan, ashhado annaka lam tahin wa lam tankul, wa annaka qad madhayta alla baseeratin min amreka muqtadeyan bis-saalehina, wa muttabean linnabiyyina, fajama’allaaho baynanaa wa baynaka wa bayna rasoolehi wa awleyaaehi fee manaazelil mukhbitayna fa innahu arhamur raahemina.

18- The tomb of Mukhtar ibn Abi UbaydeThaqafi

It is located at the south of the shrine of Muslim ibn Aqil. When the latter arrived at Kufa, he was sheltered by Mukhtar. In retaliation, Mukhtar was subsequently imprisoned. In the terrible prison, he found Maytham at-Tammar, who predicted that one day he would be released and kill Ubaydullah ibn Zyad.

Mukhtar made a point of avenging the martyrs of Karbala by persecuting those who had massacred them with such cruelty and arrogance, with the most impunity. He sought to relieve the suffering of the hearts afflicted by this tragedy.

Ziyarat:

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ اَیُّهَا الْعَبْدُ الصّالِحُ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ اَیُّهَا الوَلِیُ النّاصِحُ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یا أبا إسحاقِ المُختار اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ اَیُّهَا الآخِذُ بِالثّارِ المُحارِبُ لِلکَفَرةِ الفُجّارِ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ اَیُّهَا الْمُخلِصُ لِلّهِ فی طاعَتِهِ وَ لِزّینِ العابِدینَ فی مَحَبَّتِهِ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا مَن رَضِیَ عَنهُ النَّبِیُّ المُختارُ وَ قَسیمُ الجَنَّةِ وَ النّارِ وَ کاشِفُ الکَربِ وَ الغُمَّةِ، قائِماً مَقاماً لَم یَصِلْ إلَیهِ أحَدُ مِنَ الاْمَّةِ. اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یا مَن بَذَلَ نَفسَهُ فی رِضاءِ الأئِمَّةِ فی نُصرَةِ العِترَةِ الطّاهِرینَ وَ الآخِذُ بِثارِهِم مِنَ العِصابَةِ المَلعُونَةِ الفاجِرَةِ فَجَزاکَ اللهُ عَنِ النَّبِیِّ وَ عَن أهلِ بِیْتِهِ عَلَیْهِمْ السَّلامُ.

Peace be upon you O’ devout servant of Allah, peace be upon you advice-giver fellow, peace be upon you O’ Aba Ishaq Mukhtar. Peace be upon (you) who took the revenge from pagan, cruel and wicked warriors. Peace be upon you, the pure obedient of God, and pure lover of Imam Zain ul Abideen. Peace be upon you, the gratification of the chosen Prophet and the distributor of paradise and fire and (gratification) of the Detector of Suffering and Grief. You are at a position not reached by anyone from the Muslim nation. Peace be upon you as you gave away yourself to seek the contentment of Imams by assisting the infallible family, by taking their revenge from cursed and wicked gang. Almighty reward you (the best reward) on behalf of His prophet and his progeny, peace be upon them.

Assalaamo a’layka ayyohal abdo as-saaleho as-salaamo a’layka ayyohal waleeyo an-naaseho assalaamo a’layka yaa Abaa ishaaqe al-mukhtaara assalaamo a’layka ayyohal aakhejo bith-thaare al-mohaarebo lil kafarate al-fujjaare assalaamo a’layka ayyohal mukhleso lillaahe fee taa atehi wa liz-zayne al-aabedina fee mahabbatehi assalaamo a’layka yaa man radheya anho an-nabiyyo al-mukhtaaro wa qaseemo al-jannate wannaare wa kaashefo al-karabe wal-ghummate, qaaeman maqaaman lam yasil elayhe ahdo menal ummate. Assalaamo a’layka yaa man badhala nafsahu fee redhaail a-immate fee nusrate al-itrate at-taaherina wal aakhejo be thaarehim menal isaAbate al-mal’oonate al-faajerate fa jazaakallaaho anin nabiyyin wa ann ahle baytehi alayhim assalaamo.

19- The tomb of Hani ibn Ourwah

It is located in front of the tomb of Muslim ibn Aqil, in the northern part. Hani ibn Urwa was one of the greatest figures of Kufa, of the Bani Mourad tribe, and a close companion of Imam Ali (A). His tragedy is linked to that of Muslim ibn Aqil and was mentioned a little earlier.

Ziyarat :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا رَسُولَ اللّهَ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللّهِ وَ بَرَكاتُهُ، سَلامُ اللّهِ الْعَظيمِ وَ صَلواتُهُ عَلَيْکَ يا هانِىَ بْنَ عُرْوَةَ، السَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ اَيُّهَا الْعَبْدُ الصّالِحُ النّاصِحُ لِلّهِ وَ لِرَسُولِهِ، وَلاَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ وَ الْحَسَنِ وَ الْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ قُتِلْتَ مَظْلُومآ فَلَعَنَ اللّهُ مَنْ قَتَلَکَ وَ اسْتَحَلَّ دَمَکَ وَحَشى قُبُورَ هُمْ نارآ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ لَقِيْتَ اللّهَ وَ هُوَ راضٍ عَنْکَ بِما فَعَلْتَ وَ نَصَحْتَ، وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ قَدْ بَلَغْتَ دَرَجَةَ الشُّهَدآءِ وَ جُعِلَ رُوحُکَ مَعَ اَرْواحِ السُّعَداءِ، بِما نَصَحْتَ لِلّهِ وَ لَرسُولِهِ مُجْتَهِدآ، وَ بَذَلْتَ نَفْسَکَ فى ذاتِ اللّهِ وَ مَرْضاتِهِ، فَرَحِمَکَ اللّهُ وَ رَضِىَ عَنْکَ وَ حَشَرَکَ مَعَ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِهِ الطّاهِرينَ، وَ جَمَعَنا وَ اِيّاكُمْ مَعَهُمْ فى دارِالنَّعيمِ، وَ سَلامٌ عَلَيْکَ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللّهِ وَ بَرَكاتُهُ.

Peace be upon you O Messenger of Allah, His mercy and blessings. Peace of Allah the All-great and His blessings be upon you, Hani the son of Urwah. Peace be upon you, O righteous servant (of Allah), who acted sincerely for the sake of Allah, His Messenger, the Commander of the Faithful, Hasan, and Hussain, peace be upon them. I bear witness that you were slain wrongly. I bear witness that you were slain wrongly and may He stuff their graves with fire. I bear witness that you met Allah while He was pleased with You for what you did and acted sincerely. And I bear witness that you have attained the rank of the martyrs, your soul has been included with the souls of the delighted ones for you thoroughly acted with sincerity for Allah and for His Messenger, and sacrificed yourself for the sake of Allah and for the sake of attaining His pleasure. So, may Allah have mercy upon you and be pleased with you, may He include you with the group of Muhammad and his immaculate progeny, and may He gather us with you and them in the abode of bliss. Peace and Allah’s mercy and blessings be upon you.

Assalaamo a’layka yaa rasoolallaha wa rahmatullaahe wa barakaatohu, salaamullaahil adheeme wa salawaatohu a’layka yaa haani I’bna oorwata, assalaamo a’layka ayyohal abdus saaleho an-naaseho lillaahe wa le rasoolehi, wala ameeril momineena wal Hasane wal Husayne alayhimus salaamo, ash-hado annaka qutilta madhloomaa fala’anallaaho man qatalat was tahalla damaka wa hashee qoburahum naaraa, ash-hado annaka laqeetallaaha wa howa raadhin anka bemaa fa’alta wa nasah’ta, wa ash-hado annaka qad balaghta darajata ash-shohadaaa e wa joela rohuka ma’a arwaahis soadaae, bema nasahta lillaahe wa la rasoolehi mujtahedaa, wa badhalta nafsaka fee dhaatillaahe wa mardhaatehi, farahemakallaaho wa radhiya anka wa hasharaka ma’a Muhammadin wa aalehi at-taaherina, wa jama’anaa wa iyyaakum ma’ahoom fee daarin naeeme, wa salaamo a’layka wa rahmtullaahe wa barakaatohu.

Masjid-e-Sahlah is located 2 km northwest of Masjid-e-Kufa. It is one of the most famous masjids, built in the year 1 of the Hijra by the tribe of Bani Zafrah. It did not bear this name originally. It was subsequently named by Imam Ali (A).

In this Masjid, there are several Maqàme and Mihrab, the best known of which are :

- Maqame Ambiya wa Salihine
- Maqame Ibrahim (A)
- Maqame Idris (A)
- Maqame Khizr (A)
- Maqame Imame Zaynul Abidine (A) - (4th Imam)
- Maqame Imam as- Sàdiq (A) - (6th Imam)
- Maqame Hazrate Hujjat (A) - (12th Imam)

a) The virtues of Masjid-e-Sahlah

Masjid-e-Sahlah is the masjid which lavishes the most favors after Masjid-e-Kufa. According to a Riwayat, all the Prophets have prayed here, and Imam as-Sadiq (A) - (6th Imam) had expressed a wish to be able to perform all his prayers there. A place is thus known under the name of Maqam Imam as-Sadiq (A).

The periphery of this masjid covers places where some Prophets lived. This is why sites have taken their name: Maqàmé Ibrahim, Idriss and Khizr (A).

According to a Riwayat, Imam al-Houjjat (A) - (12th Imam), is often present in this masjid; he will reside there with his family after his reappearance.37

According to Imam as-Sajjad (A) - (4th Imam), whoever recites a prayer of 2 rakaat in this masjid, God will prolong his life by 2 years.38

b) A place of fulfillment of vows

Imam as-Sadiq (A) said : « If you have the chance to visit the city of Kufa, head to the Masjid-e-Sahlah. Pray and express your vows concerning your faith and your material life, and know that whoever makes a wish, it will be granted. Know also that God preserves him from the afflictions of this world and the wickedness of the enemies. »39

A man named Bashara Makari came to see Imam as-Sadiq (A) and told him of an event full of bitterness : I saw a woman whom unscrupulous agents were beating and taking to the prison. He said : « Fatimah, let the curse of God be on your two oppressors! » When the Imam heard this, he had tears in his eyes and immediately went to the Masjid-e-Sahlah where he invoked God. The woman was quickly released.40

c) The Amals of Masjid-e-Sahlah

It is Mustahab (recommended) to perform the amaal of the Masjid-e-Sahlah on Tuesday evening, between the prayers of Maghrib and Isha.

1- Before entering the Masjid

recite this dua:

بِسْمِ اللّهِ وَبِاللّهِ وَ مِنَاللّهِ وَ إلَى‌اللّهِ وَ ماشآءَاللّهُ، وَ خَيْرُ الاَ سْمآءِ لِلّهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللّهِ وَ لا حَوْلَ وَ لا قُوَّةَ اِلّا بِاللّهِ الْعَلِىِّ الْعَظيمِ، اَللّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى مِنْ عُمّارِ مَساجِدِکَ وَ بُيُوتِکَ اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى اَتَوَجَّهُ اِلَيْکَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ وَالِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَ اُقْدِّمُهُمْ بَيْنَ يَدَىْ حَوآئِجى، فَاجْعَلْنِى اَللّهُمَّ بِهِمْ عِنْدَکَ وَجيهآ فِى الدُّنْيا وَ الاَخِرَةِ وَ مِنَ الْمُقَرَّبينَ، اَللّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ صَلاتى بِهِمْ مَقْبُولَةً وَ ذَنْبى بِهِمْ مَغْفُورآ، وَ رِزْقى بِهْمِ مَبْسُوطآ وَ دُعآئى بِهِمْ مُسْتَجابآ وَ حَوآئِجى بِهِمْ مَقْضِيَّةً، وَانْظُرْ اِلَىَّ بِوَجْهِکَ الْكَريمِ نَظْرَةً رَحيمَةً، اَسْتَوْجِبُ بِهَاالْكَرامَةَ عِنْدَکَ، ثُمَّ لا تَصْرِفْهُ عَنّى اَبَدآ بِرَحْمَتِکَ يا اَرْحَمَ الرّحِمينَ، يا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ وَ الاَ بْصارِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبى عَلى دينِکَ وَ دينِ نَبِيِّکَ وَ وَلِيِّکَ، وَ لا تُزِغْ قَلْبى بَعْدَاِذْ هَدَيْتَنى وَهَبْ لى مِنْ لَدُنْکَ رَحْمَةً، اِنَّکَ اَنْتَ الْوَهّابُ، اَللّهُمَّ اِلَيْکَ تَوَجَّهْتُ وَ مَرْضاتَکَ طَلَبْتُ، وَ ثَوابَکَ ابْتَغَيْتُ وَ بِکَ امَنْتُ وَ عَلَيْکَ تَوَكَّلْتُ، اَللّهُمَّ فَاَقْبِلْ بِوَجْهِکَ اِلَىَّ وَ اَقْبِلْ بِوَجْهى اِلَيْکَ

In the Name of Allah (I begin), in Allah (I trust), from Allah (I derive power), to Allah (I refer all my affairs), only that which Allah wills shall come to pass, and the most excellent Names are Allah’s. I rely upon Allah. There is neither might nor power except with Allah the All-high and All-great. O Allah, (please) make me of those who construct Your mosques and houses. O Allah, I turn my face toward You, asking You in the name of Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and I present them before my requests; so, O Allah, (please) make me worthy of Your regard in their names, in this world and the Hereafter and make me of those who are made near to You. O Allah, (please) accept my prayers in their names, forgive my sins in their names, expand sustenance for me in their names, respond to my supplications in their names, grant me all of my requests in their names and look at me with Your All-noble Face; such a kind look due to which I shall attain Your honor, and (please) never turn Your Face away from me in the name of Your mercy, O most merciful of all those who show mercy. O He Who changes hearts and sights (please do) make my heart permanently steady in following Your religion and the religion of Your Prophet and intimate servant. Do not cause my heart to deviate after You have guided me (to the right path), and grant me mercy from You, for You are the most Generous Giver. O Allah, I am turning my face towards You seeking Your pleasure, desiring for Your reward, having full faith in You, and putting all trust in You. So, O Allah, meet me with Your face and allow me to meet You with my face.

Bismillaahe wabillaahe wa manallaahe wa mashaa’allaho, wa khayro al-asmaa illaahe, tawakkalto alalaahe wa laa hawla wa laa quwwata illa billaahil Aliyyil adheeme, allahhummaj alnee min ummaare masaajedeka wa boyuteka allahhumma inni atawajjaho elayka be mohammadin wa aale Muhammadin, wa uqddemohum bayna yaday hawaaejee, faj’alni allahhumma behim indaka wa jeehaa fee ad-dunya wal aakherate wa menal muqarrabina, allahhummaj al salaati behim maqboolatan wa dhanbee behim maghfooraa, wa rizqee behim mabsoota wa do’aa ee behim mustajaAbaa wa hawaaejee behim maqdhiyyatan, wan dhoor elayya be wajheka al-kareeme najratn rahimatan, astawjebo behal karaamata indaka, thumma laa tasrifhu anni abadaa be rahmateka yaa arhamar raahemin, yaa moqallebal qolube wal absaare thabbit qalbee alla deeneka wa deene nabiyyeka wa waliyyeka, wa laa tozigh qalbi ba’ada idh hadaytani wa hab lee min ladunka rahmatan, innaka antal wahhaabo, allahhumma elayka tawajjahto wa marjaatak talabto, wa thawaabaka abtaghayto wa beka amanto wa alayka tawakkalto, allahhumma fa’aqbil be wajheka ilayya wa aqbil be wajhee elayka.

Then, recite AyatulKursi, Surah Nas and Falaq and 7 times :

سبحان الله والحمدلله ولا اله الّا الله والله اكبر

All glory be to Allah. All praise be to Allah. There is no god except Allah. Allah is the Greatest.

Subhanallahe wal H’amdolillah wala elaha illallaho Allah o Akbar

Then enter the masjid.

2- Maqam Imam as-Sadiq (A)

In the center of the Masjid-e-Sahlah, there is a Mihrab which is known as Maqam Imam as-Sadiq (A) - (6th Imam). It is recommended to recite 2 rakaa’at salaat in this masjid (namaze tahiyate masjid) in this place, then recite this dua :

اَنْتَ اللهُ لا اِلـهَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ، مُبْدِئُ الْخَلْقِ وَمُعيدُهُمْ، وَاَنْتَ اللهُ لا اِلـهَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ، خالِقُ الْخَلْقِ وَرازِقُهُمْ، وَاَنْتَ اللهُ لا اِلـهَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ، اَلْقابِضُ الْباسِطُ، وَاَنْتَ اللهُ لا اِلـهَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ، مُدَبِّرُ الأُمُورِ، وَباعِثُ مَنْ فِى الْقُبُورِ، اَنْتَ وارِثُ الاَرْضِ وَمَنْ عَلَيْها، اَسْئَلُکَ بِاسْمِکَ الْمَخْزُونِ الْمَكْنُونِ الْحَىِّ الْقَيُّومِ، وَاَنْتَ اللهُ لا اِلـهَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ، عالِمُ السِّرِّ وَاَخْفى، اَسْئَلُکَ بِاسْمِکَ الَّذى اِذا دُعيتَ بِهِ اَجَبْتَ، وَاِذا سُئِلْتَ بِهِ اَعْطَيْتَ، وَاَسْئَلُکَ بِحَقِّکَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاَهْلِ بَيْتِهِ، وَ بِحَقِّهِمُ الَّذى اَوْجَبْتَهُ عَلى نَفْسِکَ، اَنْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاَنْ تَقْضِىَ لى حاجَتى،اَلسّاعَةَ السّاعَةَ، يا سامِعَ الدُّعآءِ، يا سَيِّداهُ يا مَوْلاهُ يا غِياثاهُ، اَسْئَلُکَ بِكُلِّ اسْمٍ سَمَّيْتَ بِهِ نَفْسَکَ، اَوِاسْتَاْثَرْتَ بِهِ فى عِلْمِ الْغَيْبِ عِنْدَکَ، اَنْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاَنْ تُعَجِّلَ فَرَجَنَا السّاعَةَ، يا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ وَالأَبْصارِ، يا سَميعَ الدُّعآءِ.

You are Allah; there is no god but You. You are the Beginner of the process of creation and the Repeater of it. You are Allah; there is no god except You. You are the Creator of creatures and the Sustainer of them. You are Allah; there is no god save You. You are the Straightener and the Expander. You are Allah; there is no god but You. You are the Manager of all affairs and the Resurrector of those who are in graves. You are the Inheritor of the earth & whatever / whoever is on it.

I beseech You by Your name: the concealed, the obscured, the ever-living, and the selfsubsistent. You are Allah; there is no god except You. You are the Knower of secrets and what is yet more hidden. I beseech You by Your Name: the Name that You respond to him who beseeches You by it and the Name that You give him who asks You by it. And I beseech You in the name of the duty of Muhammad and his progeny towards You and in the name of the duty that You have made incumbent upon Yourself towards them to send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and to grant me my requests at this very hour! At this very hour! O Hearer of prayers! O my Master! O my Lord! O my Aide! I beseech You by all the Names that You used for Yourself and the Names that You take exclusively for Yourself in the Unseen Knowledge of You to send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and to expedite our relief to this very hour. O He Who changes hearts and sights! O Hearer of prayers!

Anta ‘llahu la elaha illah ant, Mubdiun al khalqi wamo a’ydohum, wa antallaho la elaha illa ant,Khaleqo Al Khalqy wa razeqohoom,wa antallaho la elaha illah ant,Al qabedho al baseto,wa antallaho la elaha ant,moodabberul omoore,wAbaethoo man fil qoboore, Ant warethool ardhe waman alayha,Aas’aloka bismeka’l makhzoone al maknooni’l hayyi’l qayyoom, wa antallaho la elaha illah ant, Aalemoo’l sirre wa akhfi,Asaloka bismek alladhee edha doaayta behi ajabta,wa-e-za suelat behi aatayta,wa as aloka be haqqeka alla muhammadiv wa aahle baytehi,abe haqqehemo al lazi awjabbtaho alla nafseka,Aan to swalle alla muhammadiw an takdheyah lee hajatee, assaatah assaatah,Yaa saameaddoaae,Yaa sayyedaho yaa maulaho ya gheyatho, Aasaloka bekoolle asmeen sammayta behi nafsaka,awistatharta behi fee ilme al ghaybe indaka,An to swalle alla muhammadiw wa Aale Muhammad,va an toajjeel farjana assaatah,Yaa moqallebal quloobe wal absare yaa samee addoa.

3- Maqame Ibrahim (A)

At the northwest corner of the Masjid is the place where the Prophet Ibrahim lived (A). Recite a prayer of 2 rakaat salaat and the tasbih of Zahra, then this dua :

اَللّهُمَّ بِحَقِّ هذِهِ الْبُقْعَةِ الشَّريفَةِ، وَبِحَقِّ مَنْ تَعَبَّدَ لَکَ فيها، قَدْ عَلِمْتَ حَوائِجى فَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاقْضِها وَقَدْ اَحْصَيْتَ ذُنُوبى فَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاغْفِرْها لى، اَللّهُمَّ اَحْيِنى ما كانَتِ الْحَياةُ خَيْراً لى، وَاَمِتْنى اِذا كانَتِ الْوَفاةُ خَيْراً لى، عَلى مُوالاةِ اَوْلِيآئِکَ وَمُعاداةِ اَعْدآئِکَ، وَافْعَلْ بى ما اَنْتَ اَهْلُهُ يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ.

O Allah, (I beseech You) in the name of this holy area and in the name of him who used to worship You here. You know my needs; so, (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and settle them for me. You have accounted my sins; so, (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and forgive them (sins) for me. O Allah, (please do) keep me Alive as long as life is better for me, cause me to die if death is better for me, cause me to die bearing loyalty to Your intimate servants and antagonism against Your enemies, and do to me that which befits You, O most merciful of all those who show mercy!

Allahhumma be haqqe hadhehi al booqaate asharifate wa be haqqe man ta’abbada laka fayha qad aalemta hawaejehi faswalle alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammad waqdheha waqad ahsayta dhonubi faswalle alla muhammadiw wa aale Muhammadin waghfirha li allahhumma aahyini ma kanatil hayato khyran li wa amitni edha kanatil wafatu khayran li alla muwalate awleyyaek wa muadate a’ada ek, wafaal bi ma aanta aahlohu yaa arhamar rahemin.

4- Maqame Idris (A)

At the southwest corner is the Maqàme Idris (A). Recite a prayer of 2 rakaat and the tasbih of Zahra, then this dua :

اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى صَلَّيْتُ هذِهِ الصَّلوةَ ابْتِغآءَ مَرْضاتِکَ، وَطَلَبَ نآئِلِکَ وَرَجآءَ رِفْدِکَ وَجَوآئِزِکَ فَصَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَتَقَبَّلْها مِنّى بِاَحْسَنِ قَبُولٍ، وَبَلِّغْنى بِرَحْمَتِکَ الْمَأْمُولَ، وَافْعَلْ بى ما اَنْتَ اَهْلُهُ يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ.

O Allah, I have offered this prayer seeking Your pleasure, wishing for Your gift, and hoping for Your prizes and rewards; so, (please do) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, accept it from me with the best acceptance, make me gain what I hope, out of Your mercy, and do to me that which befits You, O most merciful of all those who show mercy!

Allahhumma inni swallaitu hadhehi aas’salatab teghaa mardhateka wa talAba naaeleka warjaa a rifdeka wajawaezeka faswalle alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammad wataqabbalha minni be ahsane qabulin wa ballighni be rahmatekal mamool wafaal bee ma anta aahlohu yaa aar hamar rahemin.

5- Maqam Imam Zaman (A) - (12th Imam)

In the south of the Masjid, recite a prayer of 2 rakaat (it is better to recite in the first rakaat Surat Fath 'and in the 2nd rakaat Surah Nasr after Surah Al hamd, then recite this dua :

سَلامُ اللّهِ الْكامِلُ التّآمُّ الشّامِلُ الْعآمُّ، وَ صَلَواتُهُ الدّآئِمَةُ وَ بَرَكاتُهُ الْقآئِمَةُ التّآمَّةُ، عَلى حُجَّةِ اللّهِ وَ وَلِيِّهِ فى اَرْضِهِ وَ بِلادِهِ، وَ خَليفَتِهِ عَلى خَلْقِهِ وَ عِبادِهِ، وَ سُلالَةِ النُّبُوَّةِ وَ بَقِيَّةِ الْعِتْرَةِ وَ الصَّفْوَةِ صاحِبِ الزَّمانِ، وَمُظْهِرِ الاْيمانِ وَ مُلَقِّنِ اَحْكامِ الْقُرْانِ، وَمُطَهِّرِ الاَرْضِ وَ ناشِرِ الْعَدْلِ فِى الطُّولِ وَالْعَرْضِ، وَالْحُجِّةِ الْقآئِمِ الْمَهْدِىِّ الاِمامِ الْمُنْتَظَرِ الْمَرْضِىِّ، وَ ابْنِ الاَئِمَّةِ الطّاهِرينَ الْوَصِىِّ بْنِ الاَوْصِيآءِ الْمَرْضِيّينَ الْهادِى الْمَعْصُومِ ابْنِ الاَئِمَّةِ الْهُداةِ الْمَعْصُومينَ، السَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يامُعِزَّالْمُوْمِنينَ الْمُسْتَضْعَفينَ السَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا مُذِلَّ الْكافِرينَ الْمُتَكَبِّرينَ الظّالِمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا مَوْلاىَ يا صاحِبَ الزَّمانِ، السَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَاْبنَ رَسُولِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ اَميرِالْمُوْمِنينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ فاطِمَةَ الزَّهْرآءِ سَيِّدَةِ نِسآءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَا بْنَ الاَئِمَّةِ الْحُجَجِ الْمَعْصُومينَ وَالاْمامِ عَلَى الْخَلْقِ اَجْمَعينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا مَوْلاىَ سَلامَ مُخْلِصٍ لَکَ فِى الْوِلايَةِ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ الاْمامُ الْمَهْدِىُّ قَوْلاً وَ فِعْلاً، وَ اَنْتَ الَّذى تَمْلاُ الاَرْضَ قِسْطاً وَ عَدْلاً بَعْدَ ما مُلِئَتْ ظُلْماً وَ جَوْراً، فَعَجَّلَ اللّهُ فَرَجَکَ وَ سَهَّلَ مَخْرَجَکَ وَقَرَّبَ زَمانَکَ، وَكَثَّرَ اَنْصارَکَ وَ اَعْوانَکَ وَ اَنْجَزَ لَکَ ما وَعَدَکَ، فَهُوَ اَصْدَقُ الْقآئِلينَ: وَنُريدُ اَنْ نَمُنَّ عَلَى الَّذينَ اسْتُضْعِفُوا فِى‌الاَرْضِ وَنَجْعَلَهُمْ اَئِمَّةً وَنَجْعَلَهُمُ الْوارِثينَ، يا مَوْلاىَ يا صاحِبَ الزَّمانِ، يَابْنَ رَسُولِ اللّهِ حاجَتى كَذا وَ كَذا

The perfect complete, all-inclusive and general salutations and His continuous blessings and His established and complete grace be upon the Hujjat (Proof) of Allah and His vicegerent in His earth and His cities and His cAliph upon His creation and His servants and the progeny of Prophethood and the remnant of the lineage and the chosen one of Allah, the Master of the time and the manifestor of faith and the emphasiser of the of the rules of Quran and the purifier of the earth and the spreader of justice in the length and the breadth, and the Proof, the upright, the awaited, the satisfied and the son of the purified leaders and the vicegerent son of the satisfied vicegerents, the infallible guide son of the infallible guiding leaders. Peace be on you, O the giver of honour to the believers, the weakened ones. Peace be upon you, O the degrader of the disbelievers, the proud, the oppressors. Peace be upon you, O my master, O the master of the time. Peace be upon you, O the son of the Apostle of Allah, Peace be upon you, O the son of the commander of the faithful, Peace be upon you, O the son of the Fatemah Zehra, the leader of the women of Paradise. Peace be upon you, O the son of the infallible proofs and the leader upon the entire creation. Peace be on you, O my master, the salutation of one who is sincere in his friendship with you. I bear witness that you are the guided leader in word indeed and that you will fill the earth with peace and equity after it has been filled with injustice and oppression. Then, may Allah hasten your reappearance and make easy your uprising and make near your era and augment your friends and aides and fulfill for you all that He has promised you, then surely He is the most truthful. « And surely We intend to favour those who were deemed weak in the land and to make them the leaders and to make them the inheritors. O my master, on the master of the age, O the son of the Apostle of Allah, my needs are (that and that.)».

Salamullahe alkamelu aattammu' shamelo aal aammoo wa salawatohu addae'matoo wa barkatohu aal qaemato attammato alla hujjatillahe wa waliyyehi fi aardhehi wa beladehi wa khalifatehi alla khalqehi wa ebadehi wa sulalatin nobuwwate wa baqiyyate aAlitrate wassafwate sahebezzaman wamudhhere aalyamane wa mulaqqine ahkaame al qurane wa mutahhire al ardhe wa nashere al aadle fi aattule waalardhe waalhujjete al qayeme al mahdiyyil imame almuntadharil mardhiyyi wabne al aeemmate attahereen alwasiyyabne al waseyaae almardhiyyana alhadi al masoome abne aimmate alhudate al maasoomina assalaamo a’layka yaa moizzalmomeneen al mustadhafeena assalaamo a’layka yaa modhilla al kafereen al mutakabberin adhwalemeen assalaamo a’layka yaa maulay yaa sahebazzamane assalaamo a’layka yabna rasulillah assalaamo a’layka yabna ameeral maumeneena assalaamo a’layka yabna Fatemataz Zahra e saiyedetin nesaaeel aalameen assalaamo a’layka yaa abna aaimmatil lhojaje almaasoomina wal imame alla khalqil aajmaeen assalaamo a’layka yaa maulayi salam mukhlesin laka fil welayateh ash-hadoan naka al imamul mahdiun qawlan wa fealan wa antalladhi ta’amaloo al ardha qeestan wa adlan ba’adah ma muleat dhulman wa jauran fa azzalallaho farajaka wa sahhala makhrajaka wa qarraba zamanaka wakathhar ansaraka wa aawaanaka wa anjeza laka ma waadaka fahowa asdaqo alqayelin wa noreedo an’naunna alla alladhinas tudhefoa fi al ardhe wa naj alahoom aaimmatah wa naj alahomul warethin yaa maulayi yaa sahebaz zaman yabna rasoolillahe hajati kadha wa kadha.....

Express your needs and say :

فَاشْفَعْ لى فى نَجاحِها فَقَدْ تَوَجَّهْتُ اِلَيْکَ بِحاجَتى، لِعِلْمى اَنَّ لَکَ عِنْدَ اللّهِ شَفاعَةً مَقْبُولَةً، وَمَقاماً مَحْمُوداً، فَبِحَقِّ مَنِاخْتَصَّكُمْ بِاَمْرِهِ، وَ ارْتَضاكُمْ لِسِرِّهِ، وَ بِالشَّاْنِ الَّذى لَكُمْ عِنْدَاللّهِ بَيْنَكُمْ وَ بَيْنَهُ، سَلِاللّهَ تَعالى فى نُجْحِ طَلِبَتى وَ اِجابَةِ دَعْوَتى وَ كَشْفِ كُرْبَتى.

Then intercede for me for their fulfillment, for surely I have turned to you with my needs because I know that you have an accepted intercession and a praiseworthy station near Allah. Then for the sake of the One who has chosen you for His affair and has chosen you for His secrets and by the position which you enjoy near Allah, please implore Allah for the success in my endeavour and the fulfillment of my prayers and the removal of my troubles.

Fashfa’aaly fee najaheha faqad tawajjahtu ilayka be hajati le ilmi anna laka i’ndallahe shafa atan maqboolatan wa maqamam mahmuda fa be haqqe manikhtassakum be amrehi war tadhakum lisirrehi wa bishshanil ladhi lakoom endallahe baynakum wa baynahu saleellaha ta’aaly fee nujhe talebaty wa ejabati da’awati wa kashfe kurbatee.

6- Maqam Imam Sajjad (A) - (4th Imam)

This location is at the center of the Masjid, to the left of Imam Zaman maqam (A). Recite a prayer of 2 rakaat and this dua :

يا مَنْ هُوَ اَقْرَبُ اِلَىَّ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَريدِ، يا فَعّالاً لِما يُريدُ يا مَنْ يَحُولُ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَقَلْبِهِ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ، وَحُلْ بَيْنَنا وَبَيْنَ مَنْ يُؤْذينا بِحَوْلِکَ وَقُوَّتِکَ، يا كافى مِنْ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ، وَلا يَكْفى مِنْهُ شَىْءٌ، اِكْفِنَا الْمُهِمَّ مِنْ اَمْرِ الدُّنْيا وَالأْخِرَةِ، يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ.

O He Who is nearer to me than my life-vein! O He Who does whatever He wills! O He Who intervenes between man and his heart! ) Please do) send blessings upon Muhammad and his Progeny and intervene between us and those who intend harm to us, in the name of Your might and power. O He Who saves from all things and nothing can ever save from Him! (Please do) relieve us from whatever aggrieves us from our worldly and religious affairs. O most merciful of all those who show mercy!

Yaa man howa aqrabo elaiya min hablil warayde yaa fa’aalan lema yorido yaa man yahuwalo baynal mar e wa qalbe hi swalle alla muhammadiw wa alehi wahul baynana man yudhyna be hawleka wa quwwateka yaa kafi min kulle shay een wala yakfi minho shay aan ikfena al muhimma min amre ad duniya wal akherah yaa arhamar raahemeen

7- Maqame Khizr (A)

Located at the southeast corner. Recite a prayer of 2 rakaat and this dua :

اَللّهُمَّ اِنْ كانَتِ الذُّنُوبُ وَالْخَطـايا قَدْ اَخْلَقَتْ وَجْهى عِنْدَکَ، فَلَمْ تَرْفَعْ لى اِلَيْکَ صَوْتاً، وَلَمْ تَسْتَجِبْ لى دَعْوَةً، فَاِنّى اَسْئَلُکَ بِکَ يا اللهُ، فَاِنَّهُ لَيْسَ مِثْلَکَ اَحَدٌ، وَاَتَوَسِّلُ اِلَيْکَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ، وَاَسْئَلُکَ اَنْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاَنْ تُقْبِلَ اِلَىَّ بِوَجْهِکَ الْكَريمِ، وَتُقْبِلَ بِوَجْهى اِلَيْکَ، وَلا تُخَيِّبْنى حينَ اَدْعُوکَ، وَلا تَحْرِمْنى حينَ اَرْجُوکَ يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ.

O Allah, if my sins and faults have caused my face to be tattered in Your view; therefore, they impeded my voice from reaching You and You thus have not responded to any of my prayers, I then beseech You in Your Name, O Allah, for there is verily nothing like You, I seek the intercession of Muhammad and his progeny to You, and I beseech You to send blessings upon Muhammad and the offspring of Muhammad, to come to me with Your Noble Face, to accept my turning my face towards You, not to let me down when I supplicate You, and not to deprive me (of Your response) when I please You. O most merciful of all those who show mercy!

Allahumma inn kaanat-dhdhonubo wal khataya qad akhlaqtah wajhee i’ndaka falam tarfa’a ly elayka sawtah walam tastajib lee da’awatah fa inni asaloka beka yaa allaho fa innahu laysa mithaleka ahdun wa atawasselo elayka be Muhammadin wa alehi wa aasaloka an to swallee alla Muhammadin wa aale Muhammad wa an tuqbela elayya be wajhekal kareem watuqbela be wajhee elayka wala tokhayyebni hayna addooka wala wala tahrimnee hayna arjooka yaa arhamar raahemeen.

8- Maqamme Ambiya was-Sālihine (A)

Located at the north-east corner, recite a prayer of 2 rakaat and this dua :

اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى اَسْئَلُکَ بِاِسْمِکَ يا اَللهُ، اَنْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاَنْ تَجْعَلَ خَيْرَ عُمْرى آخِرَهُ، وَخَيْرَ اَعْمالى خَواتيمَها، وَخَيْرَ اَيّامى يَوْمَ اَلْقاکَ فيهِ، اِنَّکَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَديرٌ، اَللّهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ دُعآئى وَاسْمَعْ نَجْواىَ، يا عَلِىُّ يا عَظيمُ يا قادِرُ يا قاهِرُ، يا حَيّاً لا يَمُوتُ، صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاغْفِرْ لِىَ الذُّنُوبَ الَّتى بَيْنى وَبَيْنَکَ، وَلا تَفْضَحْنى عَلى رُؤُوسِ الأَشْهادِ، وَاحْرُسْنى بِعينِکَ الَّتى لا تَنامُ، وَارْحَمْنى بِقُدْرَتِکَ عَلَىَّ، يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ، وَصَلَّىَ اللهُ عَلى سَيِّدِنا مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ الطّاهِرينَ يا رَبَّ الْعالَمينَ.

O Allah, I do beseech You by Your Name, O Allah, to send blessings upon Muhammad and the offspring of Muhammad, to cause the best of my lifetime to be the last of it, the best of my deeds to be the last of them, and the best of my days to be the day on which I meet You. Verily, You have power over all things. O Allah, (please) accept my prayer and listen to my confidential speech (with You). O All-high! O All-great! O All-powerful! O All-prevalent! O He Who is Ever-living and never dies (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, forgive my sins that I have committed between You and me, do not expose me in the presence of the witnesses,guard me with Your Eye that never sleeps, and have mercy upon me as You have full power over me. O most merciful of all those who show mercy! May Allah send blessings upon our master Muhammad and upon his immaculate progeny! O Lord of the worlds!

Allahumma inni as aloka besmeka yaa allaho ann to salli alaa Muhammadin wa aale Muhammad wa an taj’ala khayra oomri aakherah wa khayra aa’amAli khawataymaha wa khayra ayyami yauma al qaka fihe innaka alla kulle shay-en qadeer allahumma taqabbal do ayi was ma’a najwaee yaa Aliyyo ya adheemo yaa qadero yaa qahero yaa haiya la yamuto salli alaa Muhammadin wa aale Muhammadiw waghfirli adhdhonuballati bayna wabynaka wala tafdhahnee alla ru-oose al ash hade wahrusnee be aynekallati la tanamo warhamnee be qudrateka alayya yaa arhamar raahemeen wa salli alla sayyedna muhammadiw wa alehi attaherina ya rabbal aalameen.
