children.name: 4- The first Ziyarat to Imam Hussein (A) inside the courtyard

text.html:
اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا رَسُولَ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا نَبِىَّ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا خاتَمَ النَّبِيّينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا سَيِّدَ الْمُرْسَلينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا حَبيبَ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا اَميرَالْمُؤْمِنينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا سَيِّدَ الْوَصِيّينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا قآئِدَ الْغُرِّالْمُحَجَّلينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ فاطِمَةَ سَيِّدَةِ نِسآءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ وَ عَلَى الاَئِمَّةِ مِنْ وُلْدِکَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا وَصِىَّ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ اَيُّهَا الصِّدّيقُ الشَّهيدُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يا مَلائِكَةَاللّهِ الْمُقيمينَ فى هذَا الْمَقامِ الشَّريفِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يا مَلائِكَةَ رَبّى الْمُحْدِقينَ بِقَبْرِ الْحُسَينِ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ مِنّى اَبَدآ ما بَقيتُ وَ بَقِىَ اللَّيْلُ وَ النَّهارُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا اَبا عَبْدِاللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ رَسُولِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ، عَبْدُکَ وَ ابْنُ عَبْدِکَ وَابْنُ اَمَتِکَ اَلْمُقِّرُ بِالرِّقِّ، وَالتّارِکُ لِلخِلافِ عَلَيْكُمْ، وَ الْمُوالى لِوَلِيِّكُمْ وَ الْمُعادى لِعَدُوِّكُمْ، قَصَدَ حَرَمَکَ وَ اسْتَجارَ بِمَشْهَدِکَ، وَ تَقَرَّبَ اِلَيْکَ بِقَصْدِکَ
ءَاَدْخُلُ يا رَسُولَ اللّهِ ءَاَدْخُلُ يا نَبِىَّ اللّهِ، ءَاَدْخُلُ يا اَميرَالْمُؤْمِنينَ، ءَاَدْخُلُ يا سَيِّدَ الْوَصِيّينَ، ءَاَدْخُلُ يا فاطِمَةُ سَيِّدَةَ نِسآءِ الْعالَمينَ، ءَاَدْخُلُ يا مَوْلاىَ يآ اَباعَبْدِاللّهِ، ءَاَدْخُلُ يا مَوْلاىَ يَابْنَ رَسُولِ اللّهِ.

Peace be upon you O Messenger of God, peace be upon you, O Prophet of God, Peace be upon you, O Seal of the Prophets, peace upon you, O Chief of Messengers, Peace be upon you, friend of Allah, peace upon you, Emir of the believers, Peace be upon you, chief of successors (of Rasool), Peace be upon you, O the leader of of the Glorious, Peace be upon you, Fatima, the leader of the World's Women, Peace be upon you and the Imams from your generation. Peace be upon you, O the successor of Commander of Faithful, peace be upon you, the truthful martyr. Peace be upon you, O angels of Allah, who live in this holy place, peace be upon you, angels of the my Lord, who are standing by the grave of Hussain peace be upon him, peace be upon you forever, till I am Alive and the day and the night is there. Peace be upon you, Abba Abdullah, peace be upon you, son of the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon you, the son of the Emir of the believers. (I am) your servant and son of your servant and maid, (I) confess my slavery of yours and I neglect difference with you. I am loyal to your friend and enemy of your enemy. I have intended to your Haram to seek neighborhood of your presence and I want to bring myself closer to you.
May I enter O Messenger of Allah; May I enter O Prophet of Allah? May I enter O Commander of Faithful? May I enter of chief of successors (of Rasool)? May I enter O Fatima the leader of world’s women? May I enter my lord O Abu Abdullah? May I enter O my lord, O the son of Allah’s Messenger?

Assalaamo a’layka yaa rasoolallaahe,assalaamo a’layka yaa nabiyallahe,assalaamo a’layka yaa khataman nabiyeen,assalaamo a’layka yaa sayyedil mursaleen,assalaamo a’layka yaa habeeballahe,assalaamo a’layka ya ameeral momineen,assalaamo a’layka sayyedil wasiyyeen, assalaamo a’layka yaa qaedal ghurril mohajjalin,assalaamo a’layka yabna faatemata sayyedatil nesaaa-il a’alameen,assalaamo a’layka wa a’lal a-immatie min wuldeka, assalaamo a’layka ya wasiyyin ameeril momineen,assalaamo a’layka ayyohash siddeeqo ash-shahido,assalaamo a’laykum ya malaa ekatallahil muqimayna fee hadhal maqame ash-sharife,assalaamo a’laykum yaa malaekata rabbil mohhdeqina be qabril hussayne alayhissalam,assalaamo a’laykum minni abdaa maa baqeeto wa baqiyyil-laylo wannaharo,assalaamo a’layka yaa Aba Abdillahe,assalaamo a’layka yabna rasoolillahe,assalaamo a’layka yabna ameeral momineen,abdoka wabno abdeka wabno amateka al-muqqiro birr-riqqe,wattareko lekhelafe alaykum,wa al-mowalee le waliyyekum wa al-moaadi le-aduwwekum,qasada haramaka wastajar be mash-hadeka,wa taqarraba elayka be qasdeka wa aa adkholo yaa rasulallahe wa adkholo yaa nabiyyallahe,wa adkholo yaa ameeral momineen, wa adkholo yaa sayyedal wasiyyeen,wa adkholo yaa faatemato sayyedata nesaeel aalamin,wa adkholo yaa maulaee yaa Abaabdillahe,wa adkholo yaa maulaee yabna rasoolillah.

When one's heart is filled with humility and one has tears in his eyes, this is a sign of authorization. One should also enter and say :

اَلْحَمْدُ للهِ الْواحِدِ الاَحَدِ الْفَرْدِ الصَّمَدِ، الَّذى هَدانى لِوِلايَتِکَ، وَخَصَّنى بِزِيارَتِکَ وَسَهَّلَ لى قَصْدَکَ

Praise be to Allah the only and one, the perseverant, who guided me to your guardianship, selected me for your pilgrimage and made my intension easy towards you.

Alhamdu lillaahil wahede al-ahde al-farde as-samde, all-ladhee hadanee le wilayateka, wa khassani be ziyarateka wa sahhala lee qasdak.

Face towards the head and say :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا وارِثَ ادَمَ صَفْوَةِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا وارِثَ نُوحٍ نَبِىِّ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا وارِثَ اِبْراهيمَ خَليلِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا وارِثَ مُوسى كَليمِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا وارِثَ عيسى رُوحِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا وارِثَ مُحَمَّدٍ حَبيبِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا وارِثَ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ محُمَّدٍالْمُصْطَفى، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ عَلِّىٍ الْمُرْتَضى، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَا بْنَ فاطِمَةَ الزَّهْرآءِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ خَديجَةَ الْكُبْرى، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا ثارَاللّهِ وَ ابْنَ ثارِهِ وَ الْوِتْرَ الْمَوْتوُرَ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ قَدْ اَقَمْتَ الصَّلوةَ وَ اتَيْتَ الزَّكوةَ وَ اَمَرْتَ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ، وَنَهَيْتَ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ، وَ اَطَعْتَ اللّهَ وَ رَسُولَهُ حَتّى اَتيکَ الْيَقينُ، فَلَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً قَتَلَتْکَ وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً ظَلَمَتْکَ، وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً سَمِعَتْ بِذلِکَ فَرَضِيَتْ بِهِ يا مَوْلاىَ يآ اَبا عَبْدِاللّهِ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ كُنْتَ نُورآ فِى الاَصْلابِ الشّامِخَةِوَ الاَرْحامِ الْمُطَهَّرَةِ، لَمْ تُنَجِّسْکَ الْجاهِلِيَّةُ بِاَ نْجاسِها، وَ لَمْ تُلْبِسْکَ مِنْ مُدْلَهِمّاتِ ثِيابِها، وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ مِنْ دَعآئِمِ الدّينِ وَ اَركانِ الْمُؤْمِنينَ، وَاَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ الاْمامُ الْبَرُّ التَّقِىُّ الرَّضِىُّ الزَّكِىُّ الْهادِى الْمَهْدِىُّ، وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّ الاْئِمَّةَ مِنْ وُ لْدِکَ كَلِمَةُ التَّقْوى وَ اَعْلامُ الْهُدى وَالْعُرْوةُ الْوُثْقى وَ الْحُجَّةُ عَلى اَهْلِ الدُّنْيا، وَ اُشْهِدُ اللّهَ وَ مَلائِكَتَهُ وَ اَنْبِيآئَهُ وَ رُسُلَهُ اَنّى بِكُمْ مُؤْمِنٌ، وَ بِاِيابِكُمْ مُوقِنٌ، بِشَرايِعِ دينى وَ خَواتيمِ عَمَلى وَ قَلْبى لِقَلْبِكُمْ سِلْمٌ وَ اَمْرى لاَمْرِكُمْ مُتَّبِـعٌ، صَلَواتُ اللّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَ عَلى اَرْواحِكُمْ وَ عَلى اَجْسادِكُمْ وَ عَلى اَجْسامِكُمْ، وَ عَلى شاهِدِكُمْ وَ عَلى غآئِبِكُمْ وَ عَلى ظاهِرِكُمْ وَ عَلى باطِنِكُمْ.
بِاَبى اَنْتَ وَ اُمّى يَابْنَ رَسُولِ اللّهِ، بِاَبى اَنْتَ وَ اُمّى يا اَباعَبْدِاللّهِ، لَقَدْ عَظُمَتِ الرَّزِيَّةُ وَ جَلَّتِ الْمُصيبَةُ بِکَ عَلَيْنا وَ عَلى جَميعِ اَهْلِ السَّمواتِ وَالاَرْضِ، فَلَعَنَاللّهُ اُمَّةً اَسْرَجَتْ وَ اَلْجَمَتْ وَ تَهَيَّاَتْ لِقِتالِکَ يا مَوْلاىَ يا اَباعَبْدِاللّهِ، قَصَدْتُ حَرَمَکَ وَ اَتَيْتُ اِلى مَشْهَدِکَ، اَسْئَلُ اللّهَ بِالشَّاْنِ الَّذى لَکَ عِنْدَهُ وَ بِالْمَحَلِّ الَّذى لَکَ لَدَيْهِ، اَنْ يُصَّلِىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ الِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَ اَن يَجْعَلَنى مَعَكُمْ فِى الدُّنْيا وَ الاْخِرَةِ.

Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Adam the choice of Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Noah the prophet of Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Abraham the intimate friend of Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Moses the chatterer with Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Jesus the spirit of Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Muhammad the most beloved by Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of the Commander of the Faithful, peace be upon him. Peace be upon you, O son of Muhammad the well-chosen Prophet. Peace be upon you, O son of Ali the well-pleased. Peace be upon you, O son of Fatimah the luminous lady. Peace be upon you, O son of Khadijah the grand lady. Peace be upon you, O vengeance of Allah, son of His vengeance, and the unavenged so far. I bear witness that you performed the prayers, defrayed the poor-rate, enjoined the right, forbade the wrong and obeyed Allah and His Messenger until death came upon you. So, may Allah curse the people who killed you! May Allah curse the people who persecuted you! May Allah curse the people who were pleased when they had heard of that! O’ my Master, O’ Abu- Abdillah! I bear witness that you were light in the sublime loins and purified wombs; the impurities of the Ignorance Era could not object you to filth nor could it dress you its murky clothes. I also bear witness that you are one of the mainstays of the religion and the supports of the faithful believers. I also bear witness that you are the God-fearing, pious, pleased, immaculate, guide, and well-guided Imam. And (I bear witness) that the Imams from your progeny are the spokesmen of piety, the signs of guidance, the firmest handle (of Islam), and the decisive argument against the inhabitants of the world. And I call Allah, His angels, His Prophets, and His Messenger to witness for me that I believe in you all and in your return, I have full confidence in the laws of my religion and in the seals of my deeds, my heart is at peace with you all, and all my affairs are based on your commands. May Allah’s benedictions be on your souls, your bodies, your forms, the present and the absent from you, and the apparent and the invisible from you. My father and mother be sacrificed for you, O son of the Messenger of Allah! My father and mother be sacrificed for you, O Aba Abdillah! Extremely terrible was the calamity and astounding is the misfortune that you suffered upon us and upon all the inhabitants of the heavens and the earth. Therefore, Allah may curse the people who saddled up, gave rein to their horses, and prepared themselves to kill you. O my Master, O Aba Abdillah! I moved towards your sanctuary and came to your shrine beseeching Allah in the name of the standing that you enjoy with Him and the position that you occupy with Him to send blessings on Muhammad and on the offspring of Muhammad and to keep me with you in this world and in the Hereafter.

Assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha Aadam-a- safwatillah, assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha noohin nabiyillah, Assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha Ibrahim-a-khaleelillah, assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha Moosa kaleemillah,assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha iss-a-roohillah,assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha Mohammadin habeebillah,assalaamo a’layka yaa ameeril mo’meneena alayhis-salam, assalaamo a’layka yabna Mohammadil Mustafa,assalaamo a’layka yabna Aliyyil Murtadha,assalaamo a’layka yabna faat-e-mat-az-Zahra, assalaamo a’layka yaa khadija-tal kubra, assalaamo a’layka yaa tharal-laahe wabna tharehi wal witral mautoor, ash-hado anna qad aqamtas swalaata wa aataytaz zakaata wa amarta bill maaruf wa nahaita anil munkar,wa ata’tal-laaha wa rasoolahoo hatta ataykal yaqeen, fa-la’na-llaho ummatan qatalatka,wa-la’na-llaho ummatan dhalamatka, wa la’nal-laaho ummatan same’at be dha-leka far-ziyat behi yaa maulaaya yaa Abaa Abdillah, ash-hado annaka kunta noora fil ashlaabish sham-e-khate wal ar-haamil motah’harate, lam tonaj-jiskal jaaheliyato be-anjaa-sehaa,wa lam tulbis ka min mud-laheem-maate theya behaa, wa ash-hado an-naka min da aaaa-e-mid-deen wa ar-kaanil mo’meneen, wa ash hado annakal imaamul bar-rut –taqi-yur-razi-yul-zaki-yul-haadi al-mahdiyo,wa ash-hado an-nal a’aim-mate min wuldeka kalematut taqwa wa a’laamul hoda wal urawatul wuthqaa wal-hujjato alaa ahlid-duniyaa,wa ush hedul-laaha wa malaaekatahoo wa wambeyaa –a-hoo wa rosolahu anni bekum mo’menun, wa be-ya-bekum muqenoon,be sharaaye deeni wa khawateem-e-amli wa qalbi le-qalbekum silmun wa amri laa amrekum mut-tabe-un, salwaatullahe alaykum wa alla arwaahekum wa alla aj-saa-dekum wa alla aj-saa-mekum wa alla shahedekum wa alla ghaaebekum wa alla dhaaherekum wa alla baatenekum, be abee anta wa ummi yabna rasoolillahe, be abee anta wa ummi yaa Abaa Abdillaahe, laqad a-zomatir-radhiyyato wa jallaatil musibato beka alayna wa alla Jamie ahlis-samavate wal ardhe, fala-a-nallaho ummatan asarjat wa ajomat wa tahaiyyat le qetaleka yaa mawlaee yaa Aba Abdillaahe, qasadto haramaka wa atayto ela mash-hadek, as-alullah bishshanil-ladhee laka endahu wa bil mahallil-ladhee laka ladayhe, ay-yosalli alla muhammadiw wa aale Muhammad,wa ann yaj-alnee ma-aa-kum feed-duniya wal aakherah

Stand up, pray 2 rakaat at the level of the head and say :

اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى صَلَّيْتُ وَرَكَعْتُ وَسَجَدْتُ لَکَ، وَحْدَکَ لا شَريکَ لَکَ، لِاَنَّ الصَّلاةَ وَالرُّكُوعَ وَالسُّجُودَ لا تَكُونُ اِلّا لَکَ، لِاَنَّکَ اَنْتَ اللّهُ لا اِلهَ اِلّا اَنْتَ، اَللّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَالِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَاَبْلِغْهُمْ عَنّى اَفْضَلَ السَّلامِ وَالتَّحِيَّةِ،وَارْدُدْ عَلَىَّ مِنْهُمُ السَّلامَ، اَللّهُمَّ وَهاتانِ الرَّكْعَتانِ هَدِيَّةٌ مِنّى اِلى مَوْلاىَ الْحُسَيْنِ بْنِ عَلِىٍّ عَلَيْهِمَا السَّلامُ، اَللّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَيْهِ، وَتَقَبَّلْ مِنّى، وَأْجُرْنى عَلى ذلِکَ، بِاَفْضَلِ اَمَلى وَرَجائى فيکَ وَفى وَلِيِّکَ، يا وَلِىَّ الْمُؤْمِنينَ

O Allah, I have offered a prayer for You and I have genuflected and prostrated myself for You alone without setting any partner to You, because prayers, genuflections, and prostrations are illegal for anyone except You, because You are Allah; there is no god but You. O Allah, (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, convey to them the most favorite salutations and greetings from me, and convey to me their response to my greeting. O Allah, these two units of prayer are a present from me to my master Hussain the son of Ali, peace be upon both of them. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and upon him, accept these two units of prayer from me, and reward me for them by granting me the best of my hope and expectation in You and in Your friend; O Guardian of the believers!

Allahummaa innee sallayto wa raka-a-to wa sajadd-to laka,wahdaka laa shareeka laka,le annas-salatah warrukuaa was sujuda laa takunu illa laka, le annaka antallaho laa elaha illa anta,allahummaa s’alli a’laa muha’mmadin wa aale Muhammad,wa abligh-hum annee afdhalassalame wat-tahiyyate,wardud alayyee minhomussalam,allahummaa wa hatanir rak-a-taane hadiyyato minni ili mawlayee al- Husaynibne Aliyyeen alayhemas-salamo,allahummaa s’alli a’laa Muhammadin wa alayhe,wataqabbal minni,wa akhurnee alla daleka,be afdhale amali wa rajaee feeka wa fee waliyyeka,yaa waliyyal momineen

Face towards the feet of the tomb, stop at the head level of Ali ibn al-Hussein (Ali Akbar) and say :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ رَسُولِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ نَبِىِّ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ اَميِرالْمُؤْمِنينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَا بْنَ الْحُسَيْنِ الشَّهيدِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ اَيُّها الشَّهيدُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ اَيُّها الْمَظْلُومُ وَ ابْنُ الْمَظْلُومِ، لَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً قَتَلَتْکَ، وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً ظَلَمَتْکَ، وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً سَمِعَتْ بِذلِکَ فَرَضِيَتْ بِهِ

Peace be upon you, O son of the Messenger of Allah. Peace be upon you, O son of the Prophet of Allah. Peace be upon you, O son of the commander of the faithful. Peace be upon you, O son of Hussain the martyr. Peace be upon you, O martyr. Peace be upon you, O mistreated and harassed and the son of the mistreated and harassed one. Curse of Allah be upon those who killed you. Curse of Allah be upon those who persecuted you. Curse of Allah be on those who heard this even but rested satisfied.

Assalaamo a’layka yabna rasoolillaahe, assalaamo a’layka yabna ameeril momineen, assalaamo a’layka yabnal hussaynis-shahide, assalaamo a’layka ayyohash-shahido, assalaamo a’layka ayyohal madhloom wabnal madhloom la-aa-nalllaho ummaatan qatalatka, wa la-aa-nallaho ummaatan dhalamatka,wa la-aa-nallaho ummaatan sameaat be dhaleka faradheeyat beh,

Kiss the grave and say :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ ياوَلِىَّ اللّهِ وَابْنَ وَلِيِّهِ، لَقَدْ عَظُمَتِ الْمُصيبَةُ، وَجَلَّتِ الرَّزِيَّةُ بِکَ عَلَيْنا، وَعَلى جَميعِ الْمُسْلِمينَ، فَلَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً قَتَلَتْکَ، وَاَبْرَءُ اِلَى اللّهِ وَاِلَيْکَ مِنْهُمْ

Peace be upon you, O intimate servant of Allah and the son of His intimate servant. Extremely terrible was the calamity and astounding is the misfortune that you suffered, upon us and upon all Muslims. So, curse of Allah be on those who killed you and I disavow them in the presence of Allah and You.

Assalaamo a’layka yaa wali-yallahe wabna waliyyehi, laqad aadhomatil mosibate, wa jallate arr-rajiyyato beka alayna, wa alla Jami-il muslemeen, fala a nallaho ummaatan qatalatka wa abrao elalllahe wa ilayka minhoom.

Turn to the Martyrs and say : (Ziyarat Shohada-e-Karbala)

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يا اَوْلِيآءَ اللّهِ وَ اَحِبّآئَهُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يا اَصْفِياءَ اللّهِ وَ اَوِ دّآئَهُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يا اَنْصارَ دينِاللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يا اَنْصارَ رَسُولِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يا اَنْصارَ اَمْيرِالْمُؤْمِنينِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلْيَكُمْ يا اَنْصارَفاطِمَةَ سَيِّدَةِ نِسآءِالْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يا اَنْصارَ اَبي مُحَمَّدٍ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِىٍّ الْوَلِىِّ النّاصِحِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكُمْ يا اَنْصارَ اَبي عَبِداللّهِ، بِاَبى اَنْتُمْ وَ اُمّى طِبْتُمْ وَ طابَتِ الاَرْضُ الَّتى فيها دُفِنْتُمْ وَفُزْتُمْ فَوْزآ عَظيماً، فيالَيْتَنى كُنْتُ مَعَكُمْ فَاَفْوزَ مَعَكُمْ.

Peace be upon all of you, O friends and dears of Allah. Peace be upon all of you, O choice of Allah and sincerely attached to Him. Peace be upon all of you, O supporters of Allah’s religion. Peace be upon all of you, O supporters of the Messenger of Allah. Peace be upon all of you, O supporters of the Commander of the Faithful. Peace be upon all of you, O supporters of Fatimah the leader of the women of this world. Peace be upon all of you, O supporters of Abu Mohammad, Hasan the son of Ali, the saintly and sincere. Peace be upon all of you, O supporters of Aba-Abdillah. My father and mother be sacrificed for you. Verily, pure be you and pure be the soil in which you were buried. You attained great success. Would that I were with you so that I could also share the accomplishment with you!

Assalaamo a’laykum yaa awliyaa-allaahe wa ahibbaa-ahu assalaamo a’laykum yaa asfeyaa-allahe wa ahiddaa-ahu,assalaamo a’laykum yaa ansaara deenillaah, assalaamo a’laykum yaa ansaaraa rasoolillaah,assalaamo a’laykum yaa ansaaraa ameeril moominina,assalaamo a’laykum yaa ansaaraa Faatemata sayyedate nesaail a’alemeena,assalaamo a’laykum yaa ansaaraa abee muhammadenil Hasan ibne a’liyyin waliyyin naaseh, assalaamo a’laykum yaa ansaara abee A’bdillaahe, be abee antum wa ummi tibtum wa taabate ardhul latee feeha dofintum wa fuztum fawzan adheemaa, fa yaa laytanee kunto ma-a’kum fa afooza ma-a’kum

Return to the head and invoke a lot for oneself, one's family, children, parents, and brothers, because the invocations in this sanctuary are not refused.

From the tomb of Imam Hussein (A), it is recommended to pray 2 rakaat : in the 1st rakaat after the Surah Hamd recite surah ar-Rahman, and in the 2nd rakaat, recite Surah Mulk.

children.name: 5- The second Ziyarat to Imam Hussein (A), reported from Imam as-Sadiq (A)

text.html:
اَلسَّـلامُ عَـلَـيْـکَ يَـابْـنَ رَسُولِ اللهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَا بْنَ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَا اَبا عَبْدِاللهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا سَيِّدَ شَبابِ اَهْلِ الْجَنَّةِ وَرَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ، يامَنْ رِضاهُ مِنْ رِضَى الرَّحْمنِ وَسَخَطُهُ مِنْ سَخَطِ الرَّحْمنِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا اَمينَ اللهِ وَحُجَّةَ اللهِ، وَبابَ اللهِ وَالدَّليلَ عَلَى اللهِ وَالدّاعِىَ اِلَى اللهِ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ قَدْ حَلَّلْتَ حَلالَ اللهِ وَحَرَّمْتَ حَرامَ اللهِ، وَاَقَمْتَ الصَّلوةَ وَآتَيْتَ الزَّكاةَ وَاَمَرْتَ بِالْمَعْروُفِ وَنَهَيْتَ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ، وَدَعَوْتَ اِلى سَبيلِ رَبِّکَ بِالْحِكْمَةِ وَالْمَوْعِظَةِ الْحَسَنَةِ، وَاَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ وَمَنْ قُتِلَ مَعَکَ شُهَدآءٌ اَحْيآءٌ عِنْدَ رَبِّكُمْ تُرْزَقُونَ، وَاَشْهَدُ اَنَّ قاتِلَکَ فِى النّارِ، اَدينُ اللهَ بِالْبَرآئَةِ مِمَّنْ قَتَلَکَ وَمِمَّنْ قاتَلَکَ وَشايَعَ عَلَيْکَ وَمِمَّنْ جَمَعَ عَلَيْکَ، وَمِمَّنْ سَمِعَ صَوْتَکَ وَلَمْ يُعِنْکَ، يا لَيْتَنى كُنْتُ مَعَكُمْ فَاَفُوزَ فَوْزاً عَظيماً.

Peace be upon you, the son of the Messenger of Allah, peace be upon you, O son of the Amir of the believers, Peace be upon you O Aba Abdillah, Peace, mercy and blessings be upon you, O master of the youth of Paradise. O one who contents with the gratification of the Mercyful (Allah) and wraths with displeasure of the Mercyful (Allah). Peace be upon you O trustee of Allah and argument of Allah and door of Allah and the proof and advocate of Allah. I bear witness that you have prescribed that which Allah has made lawful, proscribed that which Allah has made unlawful. (I bear witness that) you performed the prayers, defrayed the poor-rate, enjoined the right and forbade the wrong and called to the path of your Lord with wisdom and noble advice. I bear witness that verily you and your fellows who were killed are verily Alive martyrs and getting their livelihood from Allah. I bear witness, surely your murdere is in hell. I want to be close to Allah by acquitting myself from those who killed you, fought against you, gathered against you and who heard your voice but did not help you. Would that I were with you so that I could also achieve the fabulous triumph!

Assalaamo a’layka yabna rasoolillahe, assalaamo a’layka yabna ameeril mo-meneena, assalaamo a’layka yaa Aba abdillaah, assalaamo a’layka sayyeday shabaabe ahlil jannate wa rahmatullaahe wa barakaatohu, yaa man redhaho meen redhi arr-hamne wa sakhatohu min sakhatir rahmane, assalaamo a’layka yaa ameenallahe wa hujjatallahe,wababallahe wad-dalila alallahe wad-da-e-ee elallahe,ash-hado annaka qad hallaata hala lallahe wa harrammta haramallahe, wa aqamta assaloota wa aatayttaz-zakat wa amar-ta bil maa-a-roofe wa nahayta anil moonkare,wa daa-a-wata elal sabile rabbeka bil hikmate wal maw’edhatil Hasanate,wa ash-hado annaka wa man qotela ma-a-ka shohada a ahhyao inda rabbekum turjaqun,wa ash-hado anna qatelaka feenare,adaynullaho bilbaraaate mimman qatalaka wa mimman qatalataka wa shaya a alayka wa mimman jama aa a’layka,wa mimman same’aa sawtaka walam yoenka,yaa laytanee kunto ma-a’kum fa afooza fawzan adhweema.

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا اَبا عَبْدِاللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ رَسُولِ اللّهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ اَميرِالْمُوْمِنينَ وَابْنَ سَيِّدِ الْوَصِيّينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يَابْنَ فاطِمَةَ سَيِّدَةِ نِسآءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا ثارَ اللّهِ وَابْنَ ثارِهِ وَالْوِتْرَ الْمَوْتُورَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ وَ عَلَى الاَرْواحِ الَّتى حَلَّتْ بِفِنآئِکَ، عَلَيْكُمْ مِنّى جَميعاً سَلامُ اللّهِ اَبَداً ما بَقيتُ وَ بَقِىَ اللَّيْلُ وَ النَّهارُ، يا اَباعَبْدِاللّهِ لَقَدْ عَظُمَتِ الرَّزِيَّةُ وَ جَلَّتْ وَ عَظُمَتِ الْمُصيبَةُ بِکَ عَلَيْنا وَ عَلى جَميعِ اَهْلِ الاِسْلامِ، وَ جَلَّتْ وَ عَظُمَتْ مُصيبَتُکَ فِى السَّمواتِ عَلى جَميعِ اَهْلِ السَّمواتِ، فَلَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً اَسَّسَتْ اَساسَ الظُّلْمِ وَ الْجَوْرِ عَلَيْكُمْ اَهْلَ الْبَيْتِ، وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً دَفَعَتْكُمْ عَنْ مَقامِكُمْ، وَ اَزالَتْكُمْ عَنْ مَراتِبِكُمُ الَّتى رَتَّبَكُمُ اللّهُ فيها، وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً قَتَلَتْكُمْ، وَ لَعَنَاللّهُ الْمُمَهِّدينَ لَهُمْ بِالتَّمْكينِ مِنْ قِتالِكُمْ، بَرِئْتُ اِلَى اللّهِ وَ اِلَيْكُمْ مِنْهُمْ وَ مِنْ اَشْياعِهِمْ وَ اَتْباعِهِمْ وَ اَوْلِيآئِهِم، يا اَبا عَبْدِاللّهِ اِنّى سِلْمٌ لِمَنْ سالَمَكُمْ وَ حَرْبٌ لِمَنْ حارَبَكُمْ اِلى يَوْمِ الْقِيمَةِ، وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ آلَ زِيادٍ وَ آلَ مَرْوانَ وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ بَنى اُمَيَّةَ قاطِبَةً، وَلَعَنَاللّهُ ابْنَ مَرْجانَةَ وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ عُمَرَ بْنَ سَعْدٍ، وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ شِمْراً وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً اَسْرَجَتْ وَ اَلْجَمَتْ وَ تَنَقَّبَتْ لِقِتالِکَ، بِاَبى اَنْتَ وَ اُمّى، لَقَدْ عَظُمَ مُصابى بِکَ، فَاَسْئَلُ اللّهَ الَّذى اَكْرَمَ مَقامَکَ وَ اَكْرَمَنى، اَنْ يَرْزُقَنى طَلَبَ ثارِکَ مَعَ اِمامٍ مَنْصُورٍ، مِنْ اَهْلِ بَيْتِ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى‌اللّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ، اَللّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى عِنْدَکَ وَجيهاً بِالْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ فِى الدُّنْيا وَالاْخِرَةِ، يا اَبا عَبْدِاللّهِ اِنّى اَتَقَرَّبُ اِلى اللّهِ وَاِلى رَسُولِهِ وَاِلى اَميرِالْمُوْمِنينَ، وَ اِلى فاطِمَةَ وَ اِلَى الْحَسَنِ وَ اِلَيْکَ بِمُوالاتِکَ وَ بِالْبَرآئَةِ مِمَّنْ قاتَلَکَ وَ نَصَبَ لَکَ الْحَرْبَ، وَبِالْبَرآئَةِ مِمَّنْ اَسَسَّ اَساسَ الظُّلْمِ وَالْجَوْرِ عَلَيْكُمْ، وَ اَبْرَءُ اِلَى اللّهِ وَ اِلى رَسُولِهِ مِمَّنْ اَسَسَّ اَساسَ ذلِکَ، وَ بَنى عَلَيْهِ بُنْيانَهُ، وَ جَرى فى ظُلْمِهِ وَ جَوْرِهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَ عَلى اَشْياعِكُمْ، بَرِئْتُ اِلَى اللّهِ وَ اِلَيْكُمْ مِنْهُمْ، وَ اَتَقَرَّبُ اِلَى اللّهِ ثُمَّ اِلَيْكُمْ بِمُوالاتِكُمْ وَ مُوالاةِ وَلِيِّكُمْ، وَ بِالْبَرآئَةِ مِنْ اَعْدآئِكُمْ وَ النّاصِبينَ لَكُمُ الْحَرْبَ وَ بِالْبَرآئَةِ مِنْ اَشْياعِهِمْ وَاَتْباعِهِمْ، اِنّى سِلْمٌ لِمَنْ سالَمَكُمْ وَ حَرْبٌ لِمَنْ حارَبَكُمْ وَ وَلِىٌّ لِمَنْ والاكُمْ وَعَدُوٌّ لِمَنْ عاداكُمْ، فَاَسْئَلُ اللّهَ الَّذى اَكْرَمَنى بِمَعْرِفَتِكُمْ وَ مَعْرِفَةِ اَوْلِيآئِكُمْ، وَ رَزَقَنِى الْبَرآئَةَ مِنْ اَعْدآئِكُمْ، اَنْ يَجْعَلَنى مَعَكُمْ فِى الدُّنْيا وَالاْخِرَةِ، وَ اَنْ يُثَبِّتَ لى عِنْدَكُمْ قَدَمَ صِدْقٍ فِى‌الدُّنْيا وَالاْخِرَةِ، وَ اَسْئَلُهُ اَنْ يُبَلِّغَنِى الْمَقامَ الْمَحْمُودَ لَكُمْ عِنْدَ اللّهِ، وَ اَنْ يَرْزُقَنى طَلَبَ ثارِكُمْ مَعَ اِمامٍ هُدىً ظاهِرٍ ناطِقٍ بِالْحَقِّ مِنْكُمْ، وَ اَسْئَلُ اللّهَ بِحَقِّكُمْ وَ بِالشَّاْنِ الَّذى لَكُمْ عِنْدَهُ اَنْ يُعْطِيَنى بِمُصابى بِكُمْ اَفْضَلَ ما يُعْطى مُصاباً بِمُصيبَتِهِ مُصيبَةً، مآ اَعْظَمَها، وَ اَعْظَمَ رَزِيَّتَها فِى الاِسْلامِ، وَ فى جَميعِ السَّمواتِ وَالاَرْضِ اَللّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنى فى مَقامى هذا مِمَّنْ تَنالُهُ مِنْکَ صَلَواتٌ وَ رَحْمَةٌ وَ مَغْفِرَةٌ، اَللّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ مَحْياىَ مَحْيا مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَ مَماتى مَماتَ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ اَللّهُمَّ اِنَّ هذا يَوْمٌ تَبَرَّكَتْ بِهِ بَنُواُمَيَّةَ وَ ابْنُ آكِلَةِ الاَكبادِ اللَّعينُ ابْنُ اللَّعينِ، عَلى لِسانِکَ وَ لِسانِ نَبِيِّکَ صَلَّى اللّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ، فى كُلِّ مَوْطِنٍ وَ مَوْقِفٍ وَقَفَ فيهِ نَبِيُّکَ صَلَّى اللّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ، اَللّهُمَّ الْعَنْ اَبا سُفْيانَ وَ مُعوِيَةَ وَ يَزيدَبْنَ مُعاوِيَةَ، عَلَيْهِمْ مِنْکَ اللَّعْنَةُ اَبَدَ الاْبِدينَ وَ هذا يَوْمٌ فَرِحَتْ بِهِ آلُ زِيادٍ وَآلُ مَرْوانَ بِقَتْلِهِمُ الْحُسَيْنَ صَلَواتُ اللّهِ عَلَيْهِ، اَللّهُمَّ فَضاعِفْ عَلَيْهِمُ اللَّعْنَ مِنْکَ وَ الْعَذابَ الاَليمَ، اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى اَتَقَرَّبُ اِلَيْکَ فى هذَاالْيَوْمِ وَ فى مَوْقِفى هذا وَ اَيّامِ حَيوتى، بِالْبَرآئَهِ مِنْهُمْ وَ اللَّعْنَةِ عَلَيْهِمْ، وَ بِالْمُوالاتِ لِنَبِيِّکَ وَآلِ نَبِيِّکَ عَلَيْهِ وَ عَلَيْهِمُ اَلسَّلامُ

Peace be on you, O Aba Abdullah! Peace be on you, O son of RasoolAllah (S)! Peace be on you, O the select, surpassing, chosen in preference over all goodness of Allah, and son of Allah’s (such) goodness. Peace be on you, O Son of Ameerul Momineen (A), and Son of the Master of the successors! Peace be on you, O son of Fatima (A), Syedatul Nisa al Alameen! Peace be on you, who was martyred while fighting heroically in the cause of Allah, the son of Allah’s fearless warrior, you were isolated and had been attacked with a vengeance! Peace be on you and on those souls who accompanied You in Your journey. On You be from me the salam of Allah, for as long as the nights and days follow each other.
O Aba AbduIlah (A)! unbearable is the sorrow, overwhelming is the agony, You endured for us and for all of Ahlul Islam (people of Islam), ll of the inhabitants of the heavens were shocked and upset over the crimes committed against You, May the lanaat of Allah be upon the people who laid the foundations of the tyranny and oppression that was committed against You and Ahlul Bayt (A). May the lanaat of Allah be upon the people who tried to hide and deny Your station and prestige and who deprived You of Your rank which Allah bestowed upon You. May the lanaat of Allah be upon the people who martyred You. May the lanaat of Allah be upon those who had any part in your murder. I turn to you and Allah, away from them, their henchmen, their followers and their friends.
O Abaa Abdullah (A), I make peace with those who make their peace with you, I make war on those who go to war against you, till the Day of Judgement. May the lanaat of Allah be upon the family of Ziyaad (la) and the family of Marwaan (la); May the lanaat of Allah be upon Bani Ummayyah (la) one and all; May the lanaat of Allah be upon ibn Marjanah (la); May the lanaat of Allah be upon Umar (la) bin Saad (la); may Allah curse Shimr (la); May the lanaat of Allah be upon the people who bridled the horses, saddled them and set off to fight You.
May my mother and father be sacrificed upon You. Profound is my sorrow for You. I beg Allah, who honoured You above others, and honored me that he blesses me to avenge Your blood, and give me the opportunity to be with the victorious Imam (A) who is from the descendants of Muhammad (blessings and peace be on Him and on His Progeny from Allah) at the time of the final and decisive war against Allah’s enemies.
O my Allah make me respected before You through Hussain (A), in this world and the hereafter. O Abaa Abdullah (A), I seek nearness of Allah, of His Messenger (S), of Ameerul Momineen (A), of Fatimah (A), of Hasan (A) and of You (asws) through the help of my love for You and patronage, cutting off every connection with those who took up arms against You and martyred You. I disassociate myself completely from those who took the first steps towards the oppression and injustices that were committed against You.
I take refuge with Allah and His Messenger (S) free from the guilt of associating with those who laid the foundation for Your suffering, those who devised and carried out their corrupt plan of action, who boldly committed injustices and oppressed You and Your Shia; I disassociate myself from them and present myself before Allah and You,I seek nearness of Allah and then of You to gain Your love and protection, and to make friends with Your friends, and disassociate completely with Your enemies, and with those who planted the seeds of hostility against You, and I reject and discard their associates, their followers and their friends.
. I make peace with those who made their peace with you, I search out and confront those who waged war against you, I make friends with those who stood by you, I strive against those who came in conflict with You.
therefore, I ask Allah to associate me with that which will allow me to gain the marifat of You and Your Auwliya (friends), and to set me free from the corrupting influence of Your enemies, to place me in Your company, in this world and in the Hereafter, and to stand firm beside You and follow Your footsteps closely in this world and in the next world. I beseech Him to tell me of Your highly praised station, which was given to You by Allah, that He provides me the opportunity to fight for justice along with and under the leadership of the rightly guided Imam (A) who is from Your Progeny who surely will come and speak the truth. I beseech Allah for the sake of Your right and the purpose He assigned to you, that He overwhelms me with grief in memory of Your sorrows, more than the personal grief that torments any one who is in great agony,
what great sorrows You experienced! How great was Your tragedy for Islam and in all of the heavens and the earths. O my Allah, make me at this moment like one who receives from You blessings, mercy and forgiveness. O my Allah, make me live my life like Muhammad (S) wa Aal e Muhammad (A) and make my departure from this world be like that of Muhammad (S) wa Aal e Muhammad (A).
O my Allah this day is a day of rejoicing for the Bani Umayyah (la) and also for the son of the liver eater, the accursed son of the one who was accursed by You and Your Prophet (S) at every occasion and in every location which Your Prophet (S) stood.
O my Allah send lanaat upon Abu Sufyaan (la), Mu-a’awiyah (la) bin Abu Sufyan (la), Yazid (la) bin Muwa’awiyah (la) with an everlasting lanaat upon them from Thee. Today is the day when the family of Ziyaad (la) and Marwan (la) are happy and rejoice because on this day they marytered Hussain (A). O my Allah, therefore, increase the lanaat upon them from You and also the punishment which You have decreed for them.
O my Allah, I seek nearness to You on this day and in this position, for the rest of my life. Through my disassociating myself from them (enemies of Hussain asws) because of my love for Your Prophet (S) and His Progeny, peace be on Him and Them.

hadha wa ayyami hayati bilbara'ati minhum walla`nati `alayhim wa bilmuwalati linabiyyika wa ali nabiyyika `alayhi wa `alayhim alssalamu

Then repeat the following one hundred times :

اَللّهُمَّ الْعَنْ اَوَّلَ ظالِمٍ ظَلَمَ حَقَّ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَ آخِرَ تابِعٍ لَهُ عَلى ذلِکَ، اَللّهُمَّ الْعَنِ الْعِصابَةَ الَّتى جاهَدَتِ الْحُسَيْنَ ، وَ شايَعَتْ وَ بايَعَتْ وَ تابَعَتْ عَلى قَتْلِهِ اَللّهُمَّ الْعَنْهُمْ جَميعاً.

O my Allah send lanaat upon the first tyrant who oppressed the right of Muhammad (S) and the Progeny of Muhammad (A), and send lanaat upon those who came after him in this oppression.O my Allah send lanaat upon those who fought Hussain (A), and those who eagerly followed and showed support to kill Him (Hussain A). O my Allah send lanaat upon upon all of them.

allahumma il`an awwala zalimin zalama haqqa muhammadin wa ali muhammadin wa akhira tabi`in lahu `ala dhalika allahumma il`an al`isabata allati jahadat alhusayna wa shaya`at wa baya`at wa taba`at `ala qatlihi allahumma il`anhum jami`an

Then repeat the following one hundred times :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يااَبا عَبْدِاللّهِ، وَعَلَى الاَرْواحِ الَّتى حَلَّتْ بِفِنآئِکَ، عَلَيْکَ مِنّى سَلامُ اللّهِ اَبَداً ما بَقيتُ وَ بَقِىَ اللَّيْلُ وَ النَّهارُ، وَلا جَعَلَهُ اللّهُ آخِرَالْعَهْدِ مِنّى لِزِيارَتِكُمْ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى الْحُسَيْنِ وَ عَلى عَلِىِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ وَ عَلى اَوْلادِ الْحُسَيْنِ وَ عَلى اَصْحابِ الْحُسَيْنِ.

Peace be on you, O Abaa Abdullah (A), and on those souls who were martyred with You on that day. On You be the salam of Allah from me for as long as I am alive and as long as the night and day remain and for all of eternity. May Allah not make this ziarat the last ziarat I perform of You. Peace be on Hussain (A), and on Ali (A) son of Hussain (A), and on the Offspring (A) of Hussain (A), and on the companions of Hussain (A)

alssalamu `alayka ya aba `abdillahi wa `ala al-arwahi allati hallat bifina'ika `alayka minni salamu allahi Abadan ma baqitu wa baqiya allaylu walnnaharu wa la ja`alahu allahu akhira al`ahdi minni liziyaratikum alssalamu `ala alhusayni wa `ala `aliyyi bni alhusayni wa `ala awladi alhusayni wa `ala ashabi alhusayni

Then say :

اَللّهُمَّ خُصَّ اَنْتَ اَوَّلَ ظالِمٍ بِاللَّعْنِ مِنّى وَ ابْدَأْبِهِ اَوَّلاً ثُمَّ الثّانى وَ الثّالِثَ وَ الرّابِعَ، اَللّهُمَّ الْعَنْ يَزيدَ خامِساً، وَ الْعَنْ عُبَيْدَاللّهِ بْنِ زِيادٍ وَ ابْنَ مَرْجانَةَ وَ عُمَرَ بْنَ سَعْدٍ وَ شِمْراً، وَ آلَ اَبى سُفْيانَ وَ آلَ زِيادٍ وَ آلَ مَرْوانَ اِلى يَوْمِ الْقِيٰمَةِ.

O my Allah, specify the first tyrant with my exclusive lanaat; and on the first, then the second, the third and the fourth. O my Allah send lanaat upon the fifth, Yazid (la) and send lanaat upon Ubaydullah (la) bin Ziyaad (la), ibn Marjanah (la), And Umar (la) bin Saad (la), and Shimr (la), and on the family of Abu Sufyaan (la), on the family of Ziyaad (la), on the family of Marwaan (la), till the Day of Judgement.

allahumma khussa anta awwala zalimin billa`ni minni wabda' bihi awwalan thumma il`an alththaniya walththalitha walrrabi`a allahumma il`an yazida khamisan wal`an `ubaydallahi bna ziyadin wabna marjanata wa `umara bna sa`din wa shimran wa ala abi sufyana wa ala ziyadin wa ala marwana ila yawmi alqiyamati

Then perform sajda (prostration) and say :

اَللّهُمَّ لَکَ الْحَمْدُ حَمْدَ الشّاكِرينَ لَکَ عَلى مُصابِهِمْ، اَلْحَمْدُلِلّهِ عَلى عَظيمِ رَزِيَّتى، اَللّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنى شَفاعَةَ الْحُسَيْنِ يَوْمَ الْوُرُودِ، وَثَبِّتْ لى قَدَمَ صِدْقٍ عِنْدَکَ مَعَ الْحُسَيْنِ وَ اَصْحابِ الْحُسَيْنِ، اَلَّذينَ بَذَلُوا مُهَجَهُمْ دُونَ الْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ.

O my Allah! All praise is for Thee alone; the praise of those who are grateful to You during afflictions. All praise is for Allah for my intense grief. O my Allah grant me the intercession of Hussain (A) on the day I present myself before Thee, let me stand firm in safety before Thee on account of my sincere devotion to Hussain (A) and the companions of Hussain (A), those who sacrificed their lives without regret in the way of Hussain (A)

allahumma laka alhamdu hamda alshshakirina laka `ala musabihim alhamdu lillahi `ala `azimi raziyyati allahumma irzuqni shafa`ata alhusayni yawma alwurudi wa thabbit li qadama sidqin `indaka ma`a alhusayni wa ashabi alhusayni alladhina badhalu muhajahum duna alhusayni

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا مَوْلاىَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا حُجَّةَ اللهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا صَفْوَةَ اللهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا خالِصَةَ اللهِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا قَتيلَ الظَّمآءِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا غَريبَ الْغُرَبآءِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ سَلامَ مُوَدِّعٍ لا سَئِمٍ وَلا قالٍ، فَاِنْ اَمْضِ فَلا عَنْ مَلالَةٍ، وَ اِنْ اُقِمْ فَلاعَنْ سُوءِ ظَنٍّ بِما وَ عَدَ اللّهُ الصّابِرينَ، لاجَعَلَهُ اللّهُ اخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنّى لِزِيارِتِکَ وَ رَزَقَنِىَاللّهُ الْعَوْدَ اِلى مَشْهَدِکَ، وَالْمَقامَ بِفِنآئِکَ، وَالْقِيامَ فى حَرَمِکَ، وَ اِيّاهُ اَسْئَلُ اَنْ يُسْعِدَنى بِكُمْ وَ يَجْعَلَنى مَعَكُمْ فى الدُّنْيا وَ الاْخِرَةِ.

Peace be upon you, O my master. Peace be upon you, O Allah’s Argument (against His creatures). Peace be upon you, O Allah’s choice. Peace be upon you, O Allah’s handpicked. Peace be upon you, O victim of thirst. Peace be upon you, O strangest of all strangers. Peace be upon you; this is the greeting of one who has to bid farewell to you although he is neither bored with you nor tired of you. If I leave (you), this is not because of weariness; and if I reside, this is not because of mistrusting the promise that Allah has made for the serene ones. May Allah not decide this time of my visit to be the last! May He bless me with more chances to return to your shrine, to reside in your courtyard, and to stay in your sanctuary! To Him do I pray to make me delightful with you and to include me with you in this world and in the Hereafter.

Assalaamo a’layka yaa mawlaee, assalaamo a’layka yaa hujjatallahe, assalaamo a’layka yaa swaf-wata Allah, assalaamo a’layka yaa khalesatallahe, assalaamo a’layka yaa qateeladhamaaae, assalaamo a’layka yaa ghareebal ghurabaaa, assalaamo a’layka mowaddea laa saeemin wala qalin, faeen a’mze fala a’nn malalatin, wa inn oqeem fala-ann sue dhannin bema wa adallaho assabereen,laa ja aa lahoollaho akhiral ahde minni le ziyarateka wa razaqanillahul auda ella mashhaseka,wal maqama be feenaeka wal qeyame fee harameka,wa iyyaho as-alu ann yusedani bekum wa yajalni ma-a’kum feed duniya wal aakherate.

The Tomb of Hazrat Abbas (A) is located to the east of Imam Hussein's haram (A), at a distance of 350 meters. This distance is called « Baynul haramayn ».

Hazrat Abbas's father (A) was Imam Ali (A) and his mother Fatema Ummul Banine. He was born on the 4th of Shaban of year 26 of Hijra in Medina.

On the night of 21 Ramazan 40 AH, just before his death, Imam Ali (A) had brought his son Abbas (A) and told him : « O my son! When the day of Ashura comes and you reach the Euphrates, do not drink a single drop while your brother is thirsty » He was 14 years old.

Abbas (A) had exceptional physical and moral strength. In Karbala, he was the standard bearer of Imam Hussein (A) and died as a Martyr at the age of 34.

Once all the friends and relatives of Imam Hussein (A) had given their lives in a state of fighting, Abbas (A) appeared again before his brother. He had his reasons not to allow him to fight. Abbas (A) asked him permission to fetch some water for the thirsty children. Imam Hussein (A), knowing that his brother would not come back alive, felt his heart waver.

According to the Riwayat, a tent was specifically intended to store the bottles. Abbas (A) entered and saw the children vainly seeking comfort in those empty, parched skins. He comforted them by saying to them: « O my rays of light, wait, I'll get you some water! »

He grabbed a container, jumped on his horse and headed straight for the Euphrates. Nearly 10,000 soldiers and mercenaries guarded every corner of the river and barred access to it. The standard in his hand, the intrepid Abbas (A) who had not eaten anything for three days, descended on a group of them, sowing panic and confusion across their ranks. He managed to make his way to the much desired water. The Euphrates glittered peacefully in all its splendor and called on him to come and draw some of its inexhaustible treasure.

Abbas (A) squatted down and filled the container, while the miserable soldiers, knowing the bravery of this son of Ali (A), kept their distance. Once filled, he collected a little water in his hands to quench his own thirst. But thinking of the thirst of his companions, he immediately rejected it without drinking a single drop and turned around, loaded with his precious booty and full of hope.

Yazid's men surrounded him immediately. Abbas (A) defended himself like a lion until the moment when, emerging from the horde, a man struck him with a terrible blow on the right hand, with a sharp edge. Controlling his pain, Abbas (A) grabbed the bottle with his left hand and continued to fight fiercely. Another blow fell on his other arm. With the energy of despair, he squeezed the bottle between his teeth and forcefully made his way. The thought of little Sakina and the other children increased tenfold. An arrow pierced the bottle, tipping out the water and with it, his last hopes. Another brought him down to the burning earth.65

Imam Hussein (A) came running, bent over the pain of seeing him in such a state. « O my brother! My back is now broken and my hope annihilated! » Abbas (A) asked Imam Hussein (A) not to bring back his body : « I promised Sakina to bring her water, but I could not keep my promise! Besides, I was your standard bearer. If you take me back there, we will lose all hope!» Imam Hussein (A) left the body bruised near the Euphrates, and went away sadly, unable to hide his despair.

65: Muntaha al-Amal, volume 1 page 279

When one wants to perform the Ziyarat of Hazrate Abbas (A), stop at the door of the haram and say :

سَلامُ اللّهِ وَ سَلامُ مَلائِكَتِهِ الْمُقَرَّبينَ، وَ اَنْبِيآئِهِ الْمُرْسَلينَ، وَ عِبادِهِ الصّالِحينَ، وَ جَميعِ الشُّهَدآءِ وَ الصِّدّيقينَ، وَالزَّاكِياتُ الطَّيِّباتُ فيما تَغْتَدى وَتَرُوحُ عَلَيْکَ يَا بْنَ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ، اَشْهَدُ لَکَ بِالتَّسْليمِ وَالتَّصْديقِ وَ الْوَفآءِ وَالنَّصيحَةِ، لِخَلَفِ النَّبِىِّ صَلَّى‌اللّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ الْمُرْسَلِ، وَ السِّبْطِ الْمُنْتَجَبِ وَ الدَّليلِ الْعالِمِ، وَالْوَصِّىِ الْمُبَلِّغِ وَالْمَظْلُومِ الْمُهْتَضَمِ، فَجَزاکَ اللّهُ عَنْ رَسُولِهِ وَ عَنْ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ، وَ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ وَ الْحُسَيْنِ صَلَواتُ اللّهِ عَلَيْهِمْ، اَفْضَلَ الْجَزآءِ بِماصَبَرْتَ وَ احْتَسَبْتَ وَاَعَنْتَ فَنِعْمَ عُقْبَى‌الدّارِ، لَعَنَاللّهُ مَنْ قَتَلَکَ وَ لَعَنَاللّهُ مَنْ جَهِلَ حَقَّکَ وَ اسْتَخَفَّ بِحُرْمَتِکَ، وَ لَعَنَ اللّهُ مَنْحالَ بَيْنَکَ وَ بَيْنَ مآءِ الْفُراتِ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ قُتِلْتَ مَظْلُوماً، وَ اَنَّ اللّهَ مُنْجِزٌ لَكُمْ ما وَعَدَكُمْ، جِئْتُکَ يَا بْنَ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ وَافِداً اِلَيْكُمْ، وَقَلْبى مُسَلِّمٌ لَكُمْ وَ تابِـعٌ، وَ اَنـَا لَكُمْ تابِـعٌ، وَنُصْرَتى لَكُمْ مُعَدَّةٌ، حَتّى يَحْكُمَ اللّهُ وَ هُوَخَيْرُالْحاكِمينَ، فَمَعَكُمْ مَعَكُمْ لامَعَ عَدُوِّكُمْ، اِنّى بِكُمْ وَ بِإِيابِكُمْ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنينَ، وَ بِمَنْ خالَفَكُمْ وَ قَتَلَكُمْ مِنَ الْكافَرينَ، قَتَلَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً قَتَلَتْكُمْ بِالاَيْدى وَ الاَلْسُنِ

Peace of Allah and peace of His favorite angels, His commissioned prophets, His righteous servants, all the martyrs, and all the veracious (ones), and also pure, true blessings that come and go, be upon you, O son of the Commander of the Faithful.
I testify to you of submission (to the will of God), honest acceptance as true, loyalty, and sincerity to the descendant of the commissioned Prophet, Allah’s blessings be upon him and his progeny, the chosen grandson (of the Prophet), the well knowledgeable guide (to the true religion), the conveying successor, and the wrongfully oppressed one. So, Allah may reward you on behalf of His Messenger, the Commander of the Faithful, Hasan, and Hussain, peace of Allah be upon them, with the best reward for your steadfastness, dedication (to the sake of God), and support (for the right party). Very excellent be the reward of the eternal life.
Allah’s curse be on him who killed you. Allah’s curse be on him who ignored your position and belittled your sanctity. Allah’s curse be on him who precluded you from having from the water of the Euphrates.
I testify that you were killed wrongfully and that Allah will verily fulfill His promise that He made with you.
O son of the Commander of the Faithful, I have come to you to present myself before you. My heart is submissive to you and is following you. And I am your follower. I am ready to support you until Allah decides. He is surely the best of all those who decide. I am verily with you, not with your enemy. I am one of those who believe in you and believe in your return. I am also one of those who deny your opposites and killers. Allah may kill the group who killed you with hands and tongues (by giving orders of killing you.)

Salaamullahe wa salamo malaekatehil moqarrabin, wa ambiyyaehil mursalin, wa ebadehis-salehin, wa jameeish-shohada e was-siddiqeena, wazzakeyaato at-tayyebato feema taghtadi wa taruho a’layka yabna ameeril momineen, ash-hado laka bitt-taslime wa att-tasdiqe wa al-wafaa e wan-nasihate, la khelafin-nabiyyinn sallallaaho alayhe wa aalehil mursale, was-sibtil muntajabe wad-daleelil aa’leme,wal wasiyyil-mughallebe wal-madhloome al-muhtadhame, fa jazakallaho ann rasoolehi wa ann ameeril momineen, wa anil Hasane wal hussyane salawatullahe alayhim,afdhala al-jazae bema sabarta wah tasabta wa a’anta fanima uqbiddare la-a’nallaho man qatalaka wa la-a’nallaho man jahela haqqaka was takhaffa be hurmateka, wa la-a’nallaho man hal baynaka wa bayna maa ill furate, ash-hado annaka qotelta madhlooma, wa annallaho munjezo lakoom ma wa adakum, jeatoka yaa ban ameeral momineena wafedaan elaykum, wa qalbee Muswallemo lakum wa tabeo,wa nusratee lakum moaddatun,hatti yahkumallaho wa howa khayrul hakemeena, fa ma-a’kum ma-a’kum la ma a aduwwekum, inni bekum wa be iyabekum menal momeneen wa be man khalafakum wa qatalakum menal kafareen,qatallaho ummatan qatalatkum be laydi wa alsoone.

Then come in, fall on the grave and say :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ اَيُّهَا الْعَبْدُ الصّالِحُ اَلْمُطيعُ لِلّهِ وَ لِرَسُولِهِ، وَ لاِميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ وَ الْحَسَنِ والْحُسَيْنِ صَلَّى اللّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ سَلَّمَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللّهِ وَ بَرَكاتُهُ، وَ مَغْفِرَتُهُ وَ رِضْوانُهُ وَ عَلى رُوحِکَ وَ بَدَنِکَ، اَشْهَدُ و اُشْهِدُ اللّهَ اَنَّکَ مَضَيْتَ عَلى ما مَضى بِهِ الْبَدْرِيُّونَ، وَ الْمُجاهِدُونَ فى سَبيلِ اللّهِ، الْمُناصِحُونَ لَهُ فى جِهادِ اَعْدآئِهِ، الْمُبالِغُونَ فى نُصْرَةِ اَوْلِيـآئِـهِ، الذّآبـُّونَ عَنْ اَحِبّـآئِـهِ، فَجَزاکَ اللّهُ اَفْضَلَ الْجَزآءِ، وَ اَكْثَرَ الْجَزآءِ وَ اَوْفَرَ الْجَزآءِ وَ اَوْفى جَزآءِ اَحَدٍ مِمَّنْ وَفى بِبَيْعَتِهِ، وَ اسْتَجابَ لَهُ دَعْوَتَهُ وَاَطاعَ وُلاةَ اَمْرِهِ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ قَدْ بالَغْتَ فِى النَّصيحَةِ وَ اَعْطَيْتَ غايَةَ اْلَمَجْهُودِ، فَبَعَثَکَ اللّهُ فَى الشُّهَدآءِ، وَ جَعَلَ رُوحَکَ مَعَ اَرْواحِ السُّعَدآءِ، وَ اَعْطاکَ مِنْ جِنانِهِ اَفْسَحَها مَنْزِلاً وَ اَفْضَلَها غُرَفاً، وَ رَفَعَ ذِكْرَکَ فى عِلِّيّينَ، وَ حَشَرَکَ مَعَ النَّبِيّينَ، وَ الصِّدّيقينَ وَ الشُّهَدآءِ وَالصّالِحينَ، وَ حَسُنَ اُولئِکَ رَفيقاً اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ لَمْ تَهِنْ وَ لَمْ تَنْكُلْ، وَ اَنَّکَ مَضَيْتَ عَلى بَصيرَةٍ مِنْ اَمْرِکَ، مُقْتَدِياً بِالصّالِحينَ وَ مُتَّبِعاً لِلنَّبِيّينَ، فَجَمَعَ اللّهُ بَيْنَنا وَ بَيْنَکَ وَ بَيْنَ رَسُولِهِ وَ اَوْلِيآئِهِ فى مَنازِلِ الْمُخْبِتيـنَ، فَـاِنَّهُ اَرْحَـمُ الـرّاحِمينَ

Peace be upon you, O righteous servant (of Allah) and obedient to Allah, to His Messenger, to the Commander of the Faithful, to Hasan, and to Hussain, peace and greetings of Allah be upon them. Peace, Allah’s mercy, blessings, forgiveness, and gratifications be upon you, your soul, and your body.
I testify, and call Allah to witness, that you abided by the same course that was taken by the soldiers of (the battle of) Badr and the strivers for Allah’s sake who sincerely served Him in the battlefields against His enemies, did their bests for supporting His disciples, and defended His intimate ones. So, Allah may reward you the best, the maximum, the most abundant, and the most conclusive reward that He may give to any one who fulfills his homage, answers the call (of the religion), and obeys his (divinely elected) leaders. I testify that you acted extremely sincerely and exerted all your efforts (in this regard). Allah may attach you to the martyrs, add your soul to the souls of the happy ones, give you the largest abode in His Paradise and the most handsome room, exalt your mention in Illiyyin (the most elevated position), and join you to the prophets, the veracious ones, the martyrs, and the righteous ones. Very excellent is the companionship of such ones.

I testify that you did not lag behind and did not turn away the face, and that you left this life with full awareness of the truth, following the examples of the righteous ones and sticking to the prophets. So, Allah may gather us with you, with His Messenger, and with His disciples in the abodes of those who practiced humbly (with their Lord). He is certainly the most merciful of all the merciful ones.

Assallamo a’layka ayyohal abdussaleho al-muteeo lillahe wa rasoolehi, wa le ameeril momenina wal Hasane wal hussayne sallallaaho alayhim wa sallam, assallamo a’layka wa rahmatoollahe wa barakaatohu, wa maghferatohu wa ridhwano hu wa alla ruheka wa badaneka, ash-hado wa ush-hadullah annaka madhayta alla ma madhee behil badriyyun, wal modhaheduna fee sabillilahe, al-monasehuna lahu fee jehade aa’adaehi,al-mobaleghuna fee nusrate awleyaehi, addhabuna ann ahibbaehi,fajazakallaho afdhalaljadae, wa aktharal jadae wa awfaral jazae wa aw fee jazae ahadin mimman wa fee be bayatehi,was taja ba lahu da-a’watahu wa ata a wo lata amrehi, ash-hado annaka qad ba laghta feen naseehate wa atayata ghayatal majhoode, fa ba athakallaho fees-shohada e,wa ja a la ruhaka ma a arwahis soa dae, wa a’ataka min jenabehi af-sahaha manzelan wa afdhalaha ghorafan, wa rafa a dhikaraka fee aleeyeena, wa hasharaka ma’ananiyyina,wassidiqina wash-shohda e was salehina, wa hasoona ulaeka rafeeqan ash-hado annaka lam tahin wa lam tankul, wa annaka majayta alla basiratin min amreka,muqtadeyan bissalehina wa muttabean lin-nabiyyin,fajama’a-llaho baynana wa baynaka wa bayna rasoolehi wa awleyaehi fee manazelil mukhbeteen, fa innaho arhamur-rahemeen

Then go to the head, pray 2 rakaat and say :

اَللّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَالِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَلا تَدَعْ لى فى هذَا الْمَكانِ الْمُكَرَّمِ، وَالْمَشْهَدِ الْمُعَظَّمِ، ذَنْباً اِلّا غَفَرْتَهُ، وَلا هَمّاً اِلّا فَرَّجْتَهُ، وَلامَرَضاً اِلّا شَفَيْتَهُ، وَلاعَيْباً اِلّا سَتَرْتَهُ، وَلا رِزْقاً اِلّا بَسَطْتَهُ، وَلا خَوْفاً اِلّا امَنْتَهُ، وَلا شَمْلاً اِلّا جَمَعْتَهُ، وَلا غائِباً اِلّا حَفِظْتَهُ وَاَدْنَيْتَهُ، وَلاحاجَةً مِنْ حَوائِـجِ الدُّنْيا وَالاْخِرَةِ ،لَکَ فيها رِضىً وَلِىَ فيها صَلاحٌ اِلّا قَضَيْتَها، يا اَرْحَمَ الرّاحِمينَ

O Allah, (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and do not leave for me, in this honored place and glorified shrine, any sin that I did but that You forgive it, any care but that You relieve it, any illness but that You cure it, any defect buth that You cover up, any source of sustenance but that You expand it, any item of terror but that You pacify it, any disunity but that You reunify it, any absent one but that You guard it and approach (him to me), and any single need, among the many needs for this life as well as the life to come whose settlement achieves your gratification and my good, but that You grant it. O He Who is the most merciful of all the merciful ones!

Allahumma s’alli a’laa muh’mmadin wa aale Muhammad, wala tada’a lee fee hadhal makanil mokarrame, wal mash-hade al-moadhame, dhanban illa gafartahu, wala hamman illa farrajtahu, wala maradhan illa shafaytahu, wala ayban illa satartahoo, wala rizkan illa basat-tahu, wala khaufan illa amantahu, wala shamlan illa jama’a-tahu, wala ghabeyan illa hafidhtahu wa add-naytahu, wala hajatan min hawaejid’dunya wal aakherate, laka feeha rejin waleya feeha salahun illa qadhaytaha, yaa ar hamar-rahemeen

Then return to the grave, at the level of the feet, and say :

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا اَبَا الْفَضْلِ لْعَبّاسَ ابْنَ اَميرِالْمُؤْمِنينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْـکَ يَابْنَ سَيِّدِ الْوَصِيّينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْـکَ يَا بْنَ اَوَّلِ الْقَوْمِ اِسْلاماً، وَاَقْدَمِهِمْ ايماناً، وَاَقْوَمِهِمْ بِدينِ اللّهِ، وَاَحْوَطِهِمْ عَلَى الاِْسْلامِ، اَشْهَدُ لَقَدْ نَصَحْتَ لِلّهِ وَلِرَسُولِهِ وَلاَِخيکَ، فَنِعْمَ الاَْخُ الْمُواسى، فَلَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً قَتَلَتْکَ، وَلَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً ظَلَمَتْکَ، وَلَعَنَ اللّهُ اُمَّةً اسْتَحَلَّتْ مِنْکَ الْمَحارِمَ، وَانْتَهَكَتْ حُرْمَةَ الاِْسْلامِ، فَنِعْمَ الصّابِرُ الْمُجاهِدُ الْمُحامِى النّاصِرُ، وَالاَْخُ الدّافِعُ عَنْ اَخيهِ، اَلْمُجيبُ اِلى طاعَةِ رَبِّهِ، اَلرّاغِبُ فيما زَهِدَفيهِ غَيْرُهُ، مِنَ الثَّوابِ الْجَزيلِ، وَالثَّناءِ الْجَميلِ، وَاَلْحَقَکَ اللّهُ بِدَرَجَةِ ابائِکَ فى جَنّاتِ النَّعيمِ، اَللّهُمَّ اِنّى تَعَرَّضْتُ لِزِيارَةِ اَوْلِيائِکَ، رَغْبَةً فى ثَوابِکَ، وَرَجاءً لِمَغْفِرَتِکَ وَجَزيلِ اِحْسانِکَ، فَاَسْئَلُکَ اَنْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَالِهِ الطّاهِرينَ، وَاَنْ تَجْعَلَ رِزْقى بِهِمْ دارّاً، وَعَيْشى بِهِمْ قارّاً، وَزِيارَتى بِهِمْ مَقْبُولَةً، وَحَياتى بِهِمْ طَيِّبَةً، وَاَدْرِجْنى اِدْراجَ الْمُكْرَمينَ، وَاجْعَلْنى مِمَّنْ يَنْقَلِبُ مِنْ زِيارَةِ مَشاهِدِ اَحِبّائِکَ، مُفْلِحاً مُنْجِحاً، قَدِاسْتَوْجَبَ غُفْرانَ الذُّنُوبِ، وَسَتْرَ الْعُيُوبِ، وَكَشْفَ الْكُرُوبِ، اِنَّکَ اَهْلُ التَّقْوى وَاَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ

Peace be upon you, O Abul-Fazl al-Abbas, the son of the Commander of the Faithful. Peace be upon you, O son of the chief of the successors (of the Prophets). Peace be upon you, O son of the foremost to Islam, the first to believe, the best to have served the religion of Allah, and the most careful for Islam. I bear witness that you served Allah, His Messenger, and your brother sincerely. You were the most excellent self-sacrificing brother. So, Allah’s curse be on the group who killed you. Allah’s curse be on the group who mistreated you. Allah’s curse be on the group who violated your sanctities and infringed the sanctity of Islam. You were the most excellent steadfast fighter, protector, supporter, and brother who defended his brother, responded to the obedience to his Lord, and worked desirably for gaining the abundant reward, which others refused, and the nice tribute. So, Allah may attach you to the rank of your fathers in the gardens of bliss. O Allah, I have done the pilgrimage to Your disciples out of my desire for (winning) your reward and my wish for Your forgiveness and Your abundant benevolence. So, I implore You to send Your blessings upon Muhammad and his immaculate progeny and to make my sustenance flow copiously in their names, my living delightful in their names, my pilgrimage rewardable in their names, and my life pleasant in their names, to make me take to the conduct of the honored ones, to make me one of those who, as returning from the pilgrimage to the tombs of Your beloved ones, win success and prosperity and deserve forgiveness of sins, covering up of defects, and relief of disasters. You are surely worthy of being feared and worthy of forgiving.

Assalaamo a’layka yaa Abal fadhlil Abbas abna ameeril momineena, assalaamo a’layka yabna sayyedil wasiyyin, assalaamo a’layka yabna awwalil qaume islama, wa aqdamehim aymanan, wa aqwamehim be deenillahe, wa ahwateheem alla laa, salame, ashhado laqad nasah’ta lillahe wale rasoolehi wale khayka,fa ne’amalla khulmowasee fala’a-nallaho ummataan qata lat ka,wa la’anallho ummataan dhalamatka, wa la’anallaho ummataas tahallat minkal maharem,wa an taha kat hurmatallahe salame,fa ne’a mass sabero al-mojahedo al-mohammin nasero, wa a’laa khuddafeo an akheehe,al-mojeebo illa ta’a-te rabbehi,arr-ragebo feema zaheda feehe ghayrohu,menatthawabil jazeel,watthanail jameel, wa al-haqakallaho be darajate ba e ka fee jannatin naeem,allahhumma inni ta arr-rajto lezeyarate aw-leyaeka ,raghbatan fee thawabeka,wa raja ann le maghferateka wa jazeele ehsaneka, fa as-aloka ann to swalle a’lla muhammadiw walehittahereen, wa an-taj’al rizqee behim darran, wa ayshee behim qarran, wa ziyaratee behim maqbulata, wa hayatee behim tayyebatan, wa ad’rijnee idrajal mukrameen,waj-alnee mimman yan qalebo min zeyarate mashahede ahibbaeka,muflehan munjihan,qadistaw jaba ghufranad dhonube, wa satral oyube, wa qashfal korube, innaka ahluttaqwee wa ahlul maghferate

children.name: 2- The Farewell Ziyarat of Hazrate Abbas (A)

text.html:
اَسْتَوْدِعُکَاللّهَ وَ اَسْتَرْعيکَ وَ اَقْرَءُ عَلَيْکَ السَّلامَ، آمَنّا بِاللّهِ وَ بِرَسُولِهِ وَبِكِتابِهِ، وَ بِماجآءَ بِهِ مِنْ عِنْدِاللّهِ، اَلّلهُمَّ فَاكْتُبْنا مَعَ الشّاهِدينَ، اَلّلهُمَّ لا تَجْعَلْهُ آخِرَ العَهْدِ مِنْ زِيارَتى قَبْرَ ابْنِ اَخى رَسُولِکَ صَلَّى اللّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ الِهِ، وَ ارْزُقْنى زِيارَتَهُ اَبَداً مآ اَبْقَيْتَنى، وَاحْشُرْنى مَعَهُ وَ مَعَ ابآئِهِ فى الجِنانِ، وَ عَرِّفْ بَيْنى وَ بَيْنَهُ وَ بَيْنَ رَسُولِکَ وَ اَوْلِيآئِکَ، اَللّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَتَوَفَّنى عَلَى‌الإيمانِ بِکَ، وَالتَّصْديقِ بِرَسُولِکَ وَ الوِلايَةِ لِعَلىِّ بْنِ اَبيطالِبٍ، وَ الاَئِمَّةِ مِنْ وُلْدِهِ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ، وَ البَرآئَةِ مِنْ عَدُوِّهِمْ، فَاِنّى قَدْ رَضيتُ يا رَبّى بِذلِکَ وَ صَلَّى اللّهُ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ.

I entrust you with Allah, beseech Him to keep you under His guard, and invoke peace upon you. We have believed in Allah, in His Messenger, in His Book, and in that which he conveyed from Allah. O Allah, record our names with the witnesses. O Allah, do not decide this pilgrimage to the tomb of the son of Your Messenger’s brother to be the last one of mine. Peace be upon him (the Messenger) and upon his progeny. Grant me opportunities to visit him so long as You keep me Alive, join me to him and to his fathers in the gardens of Paradise, and introduce me to him, to Your Messenger, and to Your disciples. O Allah, send Your blessings to Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad and take me to You while I am abiding by the believing in You, giving credibility to Your Messenger, being faithful to Ali the son of Abu-TAlib and the Imams from his progeny, and disavowing their enemy. My Lord, I have accepted such. Allah may send blessings upon Muhammad and the offspring of Muhammad.

As-tawdeokallaha wa astar a’yka wa aqra o a’laykas salama, aamanna billahe wa be rasoolehi wa be ketabehi, wa bema jaaa’a behi min indillahe, allahhumma faktubna ma’ash-shahedeen, allahhumma laa taj-alhu aakhera al-ahde min ziyarati qabrabne akhee rasooleka sallallaaho a’layhe wa aalehi, war zuqnee ziyaratahu abdan maa abqaytanee, wah shurnee ma a hu wa ma aa ba ehi feel jenani, wa arreef baynee wa baynahu wa bayna rasuleka wa awleyaka, allahhumma s’alle a’lla muhammadiw wa aale Muhammad,wa ta waffani allal imane beka,wat-tasdiqe be rasuleka wal welayate le Ali ibne Abeetalib, wa la aa-immate min wuldehi a’layhemussalamo, wal bara’ate min aduwwehim, fa inni qad radhayto yaa rabbi be dhaleka wa s’alli a’laa Muh’ammadiw wa aale Muhammad

This place is located southwest of Imam Hussein's forecourt (A) (Zaynabya Gate). Zaynab (A) rushed to this mound or hill, worried about the fate of her brother against the enemy army, on the day of Ashurah. The pilgrims go there, remembering the misfortunes of Zaynab (A).

Recall that when Imam Hussein (A) reached Karbala, the enemy prevented him from continuing his way to Kufa. He was forced to set up camp there. This place is known as « Khaymegah » or « Moukhayyam ». After the death of Imam Hussein (A), the enemy hordes swept over this camp, looting and burning down the tents, with no respect for the women and children of the Prophet's family (S) whom they dared to claim! This place is 300 meters from Imam Hussein's Haram (mausoleum).

children.name: 3- The different maqam, or places of commemoration

text.html:
a) The meeting place of Imam Hussein (A) with Omar Saad

This place is located in the «Babus-salama » This place is located in the "Babus-salama" and was built in 1113 AH. It recalls the face-to-face meeting between Imam Hussein (A) and Umar Saad, commander of Yazid's army, in these terms :

- Imam Hussein (A) : « Do you really want to take part in my murder? »
- Umar Saad : « I'm afraid to see my house destroyed in retaliation if I do not do it. »
- Imam Hussein (A) : « I will rebuild it for you. »
- Umar Saad : « I am also afraid that I will be robbed of my property. »
- Imam Hussein (A) : « I have better in the Hijaz, and I will give it to you.»
- Umar Saad : « I fear that Ibn Zyad will attack my family ... »
The Imam, seeing his bad faith, got up and said : « By God! You will not be allowed to eat the wheat of Iraq! »66

b) Maqame Ali Akbar

This is the place where Ali Akbar, son of Imam Hussein (A), was killed in action.

c) Maqame Ali Asghar

This is the place where Ali Asghar, Imam Hussein's little infant, was horribly slaughtered with a three-pointed arrow.

d) Maqam Musa ibne Ja'far (A)

This place was built in memory of Imam Musa al-Kadhim (A) - (7th Imam), in Babus-salama.

e) Maqame Sher-e-Fizza

In this place, Bibi Fizza, the faithful servant of Fatéma Zahra (A), met a lion who was protecting the bodies of Imam Hussein (A) and the martyrs of Karbala after the day of Ashura.

f) Maqame Imam Sadiq (A)

When Imam as-Sadiq (A) - (6th Imam) came to visit the mausoleum of Imam Hussein (A) in Karbala, he was staying there.

g) Maqame Imam Zaman (A) - (12th Imam)

North of the city of Karbala flows a long river in the name of Alqamah. This is a branch of the Euphrates. This is where the place of Al Mahdi (A) - (12th Imam) is located.

66: Bihar al Anwar, volume 44, page 388

children.name: 4- The tomb of Hur ibn Yazid Riyahi

text.html:
The haram of Hur ibn Yazid Riyahi is located in the small town of Hur at 6 km from Karbala. His haram was built by King Ismail Safawi. After the conquest of Baghdad, this king went to Karbala to perform the pilgrimage of Imam Hussein (A). He questioned the acceptance of Hur's forgiveness. He gave the order to exhume his grave, believing that the body of a martyr could not decompose. What he saw reassured him : Hur's body was still intact, with on his forehead the handkerchief that Imam Hussein (A) had tied with his hands around his wound. It was the handkerchief of his own mother Fatema (A). The king wanted to detach him but blood began to flow again. He closed the wound with this same handkerchief and then gave the order to build the haram of Hur.67

The reason for the remoteness of Hur's grave from Karbala was

Hur was part of the Bani Tamim clan. On Imam Hussein (A) 's Day of Martyrdom, the Bani Tamim, who lived 6km from Karbala, learned that Umar Saad' s troops wanted to trample on the bodies of all the martyrs. So, for the sake of solidarity, they recalled Hur's body and brought him back to their village.

Hur was also one of the great figures of Kufa. Ubaydullah ibn Zyad had appointed him commander of an army of 30,000 men. His mission was to block the road to Imam Hussein (A). Yet when he arrived before him with his thirsty troops, the Imam did not fail in his duties of hospitality and humanity. He gave them water to drink until they were satiated, as well as their horses. It is indeed the greatness of the Imam (A) to quench his enemies' thirst with his own hands. This generosity had a beneficial effect on Hur, upsetting his destiny. On the evening of Ashura, he made the decision that liberated his heart, that of deserting the army of Ibn Zyad in order to join the camp of Imam Hussein (A). Accompanied by his son Ali, his brother Muss'ab and his servant, he first addressed God in a lament : « O my God, I have terrorized the pure heart of the children of the Holy Prophet (S)! I return to the Just, accept my repentance! Then, when he reached the camp of Imam Hussein (A), he implored forgiveness for himself and his family. The Imam (A) greeted him warmly and forgave him without hesitation. And when he was mortally wounded, the Imam (A) cleansed the wound of his forehead by saying to him: « Hur, your mother has named you well, because you are free in this world and you will be free in the world of the 'beyond'»68

Ziyarat

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ اَیُّهَا الْعَبْدُ الصَالحُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ اَیُّهَا الْمُجاهِدُ النّاصِحُ، اَلسّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا مَنْ وَفی بِالسَّعادَةِ الرّابِحَةِ،‌السّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا مَنْ نَکَثَ بِیعَةٌ یَزیدَ وَ فَدی بِرُوحِهِ لِلْحُسَیْنِ الشَّهیدِ، اَلسّلامُ عَلَیْکَ اَیُّها الْبَطَلُ الصِّنْدِیدُ، اَلسَلامُ عَلَیْکَ اَیُّها الفارِسُ الشُّجاعُ، اَلسّلامُ عَلَیْکَ اَیُّها الْبَطَلُ المَناعُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا مَنْ تَرَکَ الطُّغْیانَ، وَ اَطاعَ الْواحِدَ الدَیّانَ، وَ دَخَلُ فی طاعةِ الرّحْمنِ، وَ فَدی بِرُوحِهِ لِلْحُسَیْنِ الشَّهیدِ الْغَرِیبِ الْعَطشانِ، وَصالَ عَلَی الْعُدوانِ، وَ هَوی صَریعاً عَلَی التّربانِ، وَ حَظِیَ بِالْخُلْدِ وَ الْجَنانِ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللهِ و بَرَکاتُهُ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا مَنْ فَدی بِنَفْسِهِ لابْنِ الرَّسُولِ، اَلسّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یا مُجاهِداً دُونَ ابْنِ الْبَتُولِ، اَلسّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا مَن ثَبَتِ لِلطّعنِ وَ ضَرْبَ السُّیُوفِ، اَلسّلامُ عَلَیْکَ وَ عَلی وَ لَدِکَ الْمَقْتُولِ، اَلسّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا مَنْ بَکاهُ الْحُسَینُ عَلَیْهِ السّلامُ وَ قَالُ: مَا أخْطَاتْ اُمُّکَ إذ سَمَّتْکَ الْحُرَّ، فَاَنّتَ حُرٌّ فِی الدُّنْیا وَ سَعیدُ فِی الآخِرَة، فِیا لَیْتَنی کُنْتُ مَعَکَ فَافوزُ مَعَکَ کَما فُزْتَ مَعَ الْحُسَین وَ اصْحابِ الْحُسَین، وَ السَّلامُ عَلَیْکَ یَا حُرَّ بْنَ یَزیدَ الرِّیَاحی وَ رَحْمَةُ اللهِ وّ بَرَکاتُهُ.

Peace be upon you, good slave, peace be upon you advice-giver fighter, peace be upon you who presented loyalty with profitable pleasure. Peace be upon you who broke the fidelity to Yazid and sacrified for Hussain the martyr. Peace be upon you O brave soldier, peace be upon you O brave rider, peace be upon you who stoped enemy (to approach Hussain). Peace be upon you who left the wrong and obeyed the One who is owner of Doomsday and became obedient of Allah the Merciful and sacrified himself for Hussain the Alien the thirsty and faced the enenmy (in battle) and fell on the battlefield and achieved share in Paradise. Blessings and mercy of Allah be upon you! Peace be upon you who sacrified himself for the Son of the Prophet. Peace be upon you who fought infront of the son of Batool, peace be upon you who martyred infront of Hussain, peace be upon him who remaind persistent infront of spears and swords. Peace be upon you and your martyred son. Peace be upon ypu for whom Hussain shed his tears and said : Your mother did named you wrongly, you are, verily Hurr (independent) in this world and honorable in Hereafter. Would that I were with you to achieve that triumph with you like you and (other) companions of Hussain achieved. Peace, blessing and mercy be upon you O Hurr Bin Yazid Al-Tiyahi.

Assalaamo a’layka ayyohal abdus-salehu, assalaamo a’layka ayyohal mujahedun-naseho, assalaamo a’layka yaa man wa fee bis-sa’aa date arr-rabehate, assalaamo a’layka yaa man nakatha be ya a’tto yazeeda wa fadee be ruhehi leel Husaynis-shahide, assalaamo a’layka ayyohal batalus sindidoo, assalaamo a’layka ayyohal faareso ash-shujao, assalaamo a’layka ayyohal batalu al-manao,assalaamo a’layka yaa man tarakat’tughyana,wa ataa’al wahedal dayyan,wa dakhlu fee taa’atir rahmane,wa fadee be roohe hi leel Husaynish-shahidil gharibil aatashane,wa saal alla al-udwan,wa ha wee sariann allat-tarbane, wa hazeya bil khulde wal janane wa rahmatullaahe wa barakaatohu, assalaamo a’layka yaa man fadee be nafsehi labnir rasoole,assalaamo a’layka yaa mujahedoo-nabnil batoole,assalaamo a’layka yaa man thabate litt-ta’ane wa dharbas soyufe,assalaamo a’layka wa alla wa ladekal maqtoole, assalaamo a’layka yaa man bakahu al-Husayno alayhissalaamo wa qalu,ma akhtat ummuka idh sam’matka al-hurra,fa annata hurrun fid’dunya wa saeedo feel akhera, feeya laytani kunto ma’aa ka kama fuzta ma’al-Husayna wa as-habil Husayna,wassalaamo a’layka yaa hurrabna yazidar riyahi wa rahmatullhe wa barakaatohu.

67: Ba man be Karbala, page 292
68: Ba man be Karbala, page 294

children.name: 5- The tomb of Aun ibn Abdullah Ja'ffar Tayyar

text.html:
His tomb is in the small town of Aun, 11 km from Karbala. History has four martyrs in Karbala bearing this name (Aun ibn Ja'ffar Tayyar, Aun ibn Abdullah Ja’ffar Tayyar, Aun ibn Ali, Aun ibn Aqil).69

But the name of Aun ibn Abdullah ibn Ja'ffar at-Tayyar is quoted more, and also appears in the Ziyarate Nahiya. This is one of the two sons of Bibi Zaynab (A), the sister of Imam Hussein (A).70 This is one of the two sons of Bibi Zaynab (A), the sister of Imam Hussein (A).71

اَلسَّلامُ عَلى عَوْنِ بْنِ عَبْدِاللّهِ بْنِ جَعْفَرٍ الطَّيّارِ فِى الْجِنانِ، حَليفِ الاْيمانِ، وَ مُنازِلِ الاَقْرانِ، اَلنّاصِحِ لِلرَّحْمنِ، اَلتّالى لِلْمَثانى وَ الْقُرْآنِ، لَعَنَ اللّهُ قاتِلَهُ عَبْدَ اللّهِ بْنِ قُطْنَةَ الْنَبْهانِىّ

Peace be upon Aun Bin Abdullah Bin Jafar Tayyar (who is) in Paradise, Ally of faith, advocate of the Rehman (Merciful), next to the Mathani and Quran. Allah may curse his murdere Abdullah Bin Qutnah Al-Nabhani.

Assalaamo alla aoun’ibne Abdillah ibne Jaa’a-farin Tayyare feel jenane, haleefe al-imane, wa munajele al-aqrane, ann-nasehe lir rahmane, al-latta lee lil mathani feel quraane, laa’na-llaho qatelahu A’bdallah ibne qutnatal nabhannee.

69: Bihar al Anwar, volume 45 page 71
70: Bihar al Anwar, volume 45 page 68
71: When one goes there, one discovers there a written Ziyarat concerning Aun ibn Abdullah ibn Jaffar. Yet some scholars reject the belief that he is buried there. Indeed, Sheikh Moufid in his book Irshad, Allama Majlissi in Bihàr al Anwàr, Sheikh Abbas Qummi in the Mountahal Amal, and other scholars indicate that the martyrs of the Bani Hashim, besides Hazrat Abbas (A), are buried at foot of the tomb of Imam Hussein (A). It has been concluded that this tomb is rather that of Aun ibn Abdullah ibn Jaffar ibn Mar'i, who is among the descendants of Imam Hassan (A) (Rahnemaye Musawwar safar Ziyarati Iraq, page 327)

children.name: 6- The tomb of the children of Muslim ibn Aqil

text.html:
This is located 40 km northwest of Karbala, near a town called Moussayyeb.

According to great historians, including Sheikh Saddouq, two sons of Muslim ibn Aqil, Mohammad and Ibrahim, were captured and taken prisoner by Ubaydullah ibn Zyad.

These children were mistreated in the prison for a year. One day, they introduced themselves to the jailer, who knew nothing of their kinship with the Prophet (S), asking him for some water and bread. The jailer was a supporter of the Ahl-al-Bayt. When he learned of their true identity, he became confused in regret and released them immediately. Mohammad and Ibrahim began to roam while seeking the road to Medina.

At night they asked an old woman to house them. She told them : « I have a son-in-law who is cruel and vicious, he participated in the murder of Imam Hussein (A) in Karbala. They were not reassured. » The children told her that they would only stay at night and that they would leave her house as soon as day broke.

Meanwhile, Ubaydullah ibn Zyad learned of the children’s escape. He immediately executed the jailer and announced a reward of 1000 dirhams for the one who would capture or bring back the heads of the two children. The son-in-law of this woman, Harith ibn Urwa, went after them. Tired, he went home and discovered the children. He bound them hand and foot and ordered his servant to kill them near the Euphrates. When the servant recognized the identity of the children, refrained from committing such a crime and escaped into the river. Harith then confided this thankless task to his son, who saved himself in the same way. He finally went out with his own sword and murdered them coldly. This crime was so heinous that when he proudly presented the two bloody little heads to Ibn Zyad, he was shocked. Harith had murdered his own guests! Instead of rewarding him, he ordered his guard to execute him on the spot.72

72: Bihar al Anwar, volume 45 page 100

The Euphrates is a river marked by the sacred history of Karbala. It recalls the thirst of Imam Hussein (A) and his loved ones on the day of Ashura. According to Riwayat, its water has many virtues :

- It is recommended to drink it because it is a cure for diseases,

- It is recommended to rub the newborn's palate with water from the Euphrates and the land of Imam Hussein (A),

- Whoever makes the ghusl with the water of the Euphrates and then visits the tomb of Imam Hussein (A) is like the child who has left his mother's womb and is cleansed from all sin.

children.name: Ziyarat for all Imam zadas (descendants of the Imams).

text.html:
اَلسَّلامُ عَلى جَدِّکَ الْمُصْطَفى، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى اَبيکَ الْمُرْتَضَى الرِّضا، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيِّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى خَديجَةَ اُمِّ سَيِّدَةِ نِسآءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى فاطِمَةَ اُمِّ الْاَئِمَّةِ الطّاهِرينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ، بُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزّاخِرَةِ، شُفَعآئى فِى الاْخِرَةِ وَاَوْلِيآئى عِنْدَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ اِلَى الْعِظـامِ النّاخِرَةِ، اَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقِّ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ اَيُّهَا الشَّخْصُ الشَّريفُ الطّاهِرُ الْكَريمُ، اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا اِلـهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ، وَاَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ، وَاَنَّ عَلِيّاً وَلِيُّهُ وَمُجْتَباهُ، وَاَنَّ الْاِمامَةَ فى وُلْدِهِ اِلى يَوْمِ الدّينِ، نَعْلَمُ ذلِکَ عِلْمَ الْيَقينِ، وَنَحْنُ لِذلِکَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفى نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, prace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace br upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of ctratures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

Assalaamo alla jaddeka al-mustafi, assalaamo alla abeeka al-murtadhee ar-redhaa, assalaamo alla as-sayyedayne al-Hasane wal Husayne, assalaamo alla khadijata umme sayyedate nesaail aalameen, assalaamo alla faatemata ummil a-immatit taahereen, assalaamo alla an-nofuse al-faakherate, bohuril olume az-zaakherate, shofa aaee fee al kherate wa awliyaaee inda awde ar-roohe elal ezaame an-naakherate, a-immate al-khalqe wa woolaate al-haqqe, assalaamo alayka ayyohash shakhsho ash-sharifo at-taahero al-kareemo, ash-hado an laa elaha illallaaho, wa anna Muhammadan abdohu wa mustafaao, wa anna Aliyyan waliyyohu wa mujtabaaho,wa annal imaamata fee wuldehi ela yawmiddeene, na’alamu dhaleka ilmal yaqeene, wa nahno le dhaleka moa’taqedoona wa fee nasrehim moojtahedun.

The holy city of Kadhmayn is 8 km northwest of Baghdad. It houses the tomb of Imam al-Kadhim (A) - (7th Imam) and his grandson Imam Mohammed al-Jawad (A) - (9th Imam). The name of this city comes from the nickname given to Imam al-Kadhim (A), and the suffix "ayn" refers to 2 entities that can be grouped because of their affinities. Here, it is the sanctuary that houses the tomb of 2 Imams.

Baghdad is the symbol of the domination and perversion of the Abbasid caliphs at the height of their power and the outrageous persecution of the Shiite population.

Imam ar-Redha (A) - (8th Imam) said, speaking of Baghdad, that if God spared this city, it is only thanks to the blessings of the tomb of Imam Moussa ibn Jaffar - (7th Imam).73

73: Bihar al Anwar, volume 102 page 2

children.name: Ziyarat to Imam al-Kadhim and Imam al-Jawad (A)

text.html:
Imam Musa ibn Ja'far al-Kadhim (A) is the 7th Imam of the Twelve Aimmah. He was born in a place between Mecca and Medina, on the 7th of Safar in the year 128 or 129 of the Hijra.

When he was only a child, great jurists and scholars came to him to submit the questions to which they could not find an answer and to learn from him. As Imam, he succeeded his father, Imam as-Sadiq (A) - (6th Imam), at the age of 20 years. His imamate lasted 35 years. He had 37 children, including the eighth Imam, Ali ibn Mussa ar-Redha (A) and his sister Fatima Massuma (A), who are buried in Iran (Mashad and Qum respectively).

Renowned for his piety, he was also known for his patience in the face of hardship, his composure in front of anger and his good character. This is why he was nicknamed « al-Kadhim », the one who holds back his anger.

Some people thought that after the death of Imam as-Sadiq (A), the Imamate would be his son Ismail. But he died well before his father. In order to clarify his succession to the Imamate, Imam as-Sadiq (A) designated Musa ibn Ja'far (A) as his spiritual heir. In spite of this, a group formed after his death to consider the late Ismael as the 7th Imam, and to designate Mohammad, son of Ismail as his successor, then his son, and so on (this is the belief of the Ismaïlis of today).

Imam Musa ibn Ja'far (A) had such a vast knowledge that his imamate was in no doubt. Moreover, he was exemplary for his long-suffering, his humility and his generosity. He prayed all night until dawn, and after the morning prayer, recited invocations, his beard wet with tears, out of reverential fear of God. As he recited the Qur'an, people gathered around him and let his melodious voice penetrate their hearts. He often repeated: « O my God, when death comes to find me, make it easier for me, and when I meet with you to present my accounts, grant me forgiveness! »

In the darkness of the night, he walked the streets of Medina without being recognized, in order to provide the needs of the poor, distributing bags of money, flour and dates.

One day, on the occasion of a pilgrimage, the Abbasid caliph Harun ar-Rashid went to the tomb of the Holy Prophet (S) and said arrogantly: « Peace be upon you, O son of my uncle! » (Abbas, an ancestor of Harun, was the uncle of the Holy Prophet (S)). At the same time, came Imam al-Kadhim (A), who greeted quite naturally: « Peace be upon you, O Prophet of God (S), peace be upon you, O Father! » Harun did not appreciate these words that awoke his bad conscience and jealousy against the legitimate heir of the Holy Prophet (S) whose rights he had simply usurped. Another source tells us the betrayal of his own nephew, Ali ibn Ismail ibn Imam as-Sadiq (A). Despite his uncle's attempt to dissuade him, he went to the caliph in Baghdad to pretend that the Imam (A) called himself caliph in Medina.74

Still, Harun, waiting only for a pretext, immediately arrested the Imam and transported him to Basra at night, where he was imprisoned. The governor, cousin of the caliph, seeing in him only devotion and disinterest for all materialism, was embarrassed and asked him to release the Imam. Harun, still intransigent, had him transferred to Baghdad, from prison to prison, putting him in the most sinister of them. But the Imam (A) saw on the contrary an unexpected opportunity to devote himself exclusively to the worship of God.
