Address in Arabic to facilitate your movements :

یقع مسجد الامام الحسین بن علی بجوار المسجد ایضا یوجد خان الخلیلی الشهیر والجامع الازهر

This mosque was built in 549 AH. Some historians say that this masjid bears the name of Imam Hussein (A), because the blessed head of Imam Hussein (A) was placed on this place for some time.

The mosque is located between Khan Khalili, the old souk swarming with people, and the famous Al Azhar mosque, place alongside with the university of the same name.

Ziyarat

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَارِثَ آدَمَ صَفْوَةِ اللَّهِ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَارِثَ نُوحٍ نَبِيِّ اللَّهِ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَارِثَ إِبْرَاهِيمَ خَلِيلِ اللَّهِ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَارِثَ مُوسَى كَلِيمِ اللَّهِ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَارِثَ عِيسَى رُوحِ اللَّهِ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَارِثَ مُحَمَّدٍ حَبِيبِ اللَّهِ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَارِثَ أَمِيرِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ عليه السلام [وَلِيِّ اللَّهِ‏] اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا ابْنَ مُحَمَّدٍ الْمُصْطَفَى اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا ابْنَ عَلِيٍّ الْمُرْتَضَى اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا ابْنَ فَاطِمَةَ الزَّهْرَاءِ َالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا ابْنَ خَدِيجَةَ الْكُبْرَى اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا ثَارَاللَّهِ وَ ابْنَ ثَارِهِ وَ الْوِتْرَ الْمَوْتُورَ أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ قَدْ أَقَمْتَ الصَّلاةَ وَ آتَيْتَ الزَّكَاةَ وَ أَمَرْتَ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَ نَهَيْتَ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ وَ أَطَعْتَ اللَّهَ وَ رَسُولَهُ حَتَّى أَتَاكَ الْيَقِينُفَلَعَنَ اللَّهُ أُمَّةً قَتَلَتْكَ وَ لَعَنَ اللَّهُ أُمَّةً ظَلَمَتْكَ، وَ لَعَنَ اللَّهُ أُمَّةً سَمِعَتْ بِذَلِكَ فَرَضِيَتْ بِهِ يَا مَوْلايَ يَا أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ كُنْتَ نُورا فِي الْأَصْلابِ الشَّامِخَةِ وَ الْأَرْحَامِ الْمُطَهَّرَةِ لَمْ تُنَجِّسْكَ الْجَاهِلِيَّةُ بِأَنْجَاسِهَا وَ لَمْ تُلْبِسْكَ مِنْ مُدْلَهِمَّاتِ ثِيَابِهَا وَ أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ مِنْ دَعَائِمِ الدِّينِ وَ أَرْكَانِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَ أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ الْإِمَامُ الْبَرُّ التَّقِيُّ الرَّضِيُّ الزَّكِيُّ الْهَادِي الْمَهْدِيُّ وَ أَشْهَدُ أَنَّ الْأَئِمَّةَ مِنْ وُلْدِكَ كَلِمَةُ التَّقْوَى وَ أَعْلامُ الْهُدَى وَ الْعُرْوَةُ الْوُثْقَى وَ الْحُجَّةُ عَلَى أَهْلِ الدُّنْيَا وَ أُشْهِدُ اللَّهَ وَ مَلائِكَتَهُ وَ أَنْبِيَاءَهُ وَ رُسُلَهُ أَنِّي بِكُمْ مُؤْمِنٌ وَ بِإِيَابِكُمْ [بِآيَاتِكُمْ‏] مُوقِنٌ بِشَرَائِعِ دِينِي وَ خَوَاتِيمِ عَمَلِي وَ قَلْبِي لِقَلْبِكُمْ سِلْمٌ وَ أَمْرِي لِأَمْرِكُمْ مُتَّبِعٌ صَلَوَاتُ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَ عَلَى أَرْوَاحِكُمْ وَ عَلَى أَجْسَادِكُمْ وَ عَلَى أَجْسَامِكُمْ وَ عَلَى شَاهِدِكُمْ وَ عَلَى غَائِبِكُمْ وَ عَلَى ظَاهِرِكُمْ وَ عَلَى بَاطِنِكُمْبِأَبِي أَنْتَ وَ أُمِّي يَا ابْنَ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ بِأَبِي أَنْتَ وَ أُمِّي يَا أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ لَقَدْ عَظُمَتِ الرَّزِيَّةُ وَ جَلَّتِ الْمُصِيبَةُ بِكَ عَلَيْنَا وَ عَلَى جَمِيعِ أَهْلِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَ الْأَرْضِ فَلَعَنَ اللَّهُ أُمَّةً أَسْرَجَتْ وَ أَلْجَمَتْ وَ تَهَيَّأَتْ لِقِتَالِكَ يَا مَوْلايَ يَا أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ قَصَدْتُ حَرَمَكَ وَ أَتَيْتُ إِلَى مَشْهَدِكَ أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ بِالشَّأْنِ الَّذِي لَكَ عِنْدَهُ وَ بِالْمَحَلِّ الَّذِي لَكَ لَدَيْهِ أَنْ يُصَلِّيَ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ أَنْ يَجْعَلَنِي مَعَكُمْ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَ الْآخِرَةِ

Assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha Aadam-a- safwatillah,assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha noohin nabiyillah, Assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha Ibrahim-a-khaleelillah,assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha Moosa kaleemillah,assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha iss-a-roohillah,assalaamo a’layka yaa waaritha Mohammadin habeebillah,assalaamo a’layka yaa ameeril mo’meneena alayhis-salam,assalaamo a’layka yabna Mohammadil Mustafa,assalaamo a’layka yabna Aliyyil Murtadha,assalaamo a’layka yabna faat-e-mat-az-Zahra,assalaamo a’layka yaa khadija-tal kubra,assalaamo a’layka yaa tharal-laahe wabna tharehi wal witral mautoor,ash-hado anna qad aqamtas swalaata wa aataytaz zakaata wa amarta bill maaruf wa nahaita anil munkar,wa ata’tal-laaha wa rasoolahoo hatta ataykal yaqeen,fa-la’na-llaho ummatan qatalatka,wa-la’na-llaho ummatan dhalamatka,wa la’nal-laaho ummatan same’at be dha-leka far-ziyat behi yaa maulaaya yaa Abaa Abdillah,ash-hado annaka kunta noora fil ashlaabish sham-e-khate wal ar-haamil motah’harate,lam tonaj-jiskal jaaheliyato be-anjaa-sehaa,wa lam tulbis ka min mud-laheem-maate theya behaa, wa ash-hado an-naka min da aaaa-e-mid-deen wa ar-kaanil mo’meneen,wa ash hado annakal imaamul bar-rut –taqi-yur-razi-yul-zaki-yul-haadi al-mahdiyo,wa ash-hado an-nal a’aim-mate min wuldeka kalematut taqwa wa a’laamul hoda wal urawatul wuthqaa wal-hujjato alaa ahlid-duniyaa,wa ush hedul-laaha wa malaaekatahoo wa wambeyaa –a-hoo wa rosolahu anni bekum mo’menun,wa be-ya-bekum muqenoon,be sharaaye deeni wa khawateem-e-amli wa qalbi le-qalbekum silmun wa amri laa amrekum mut-tabe-un, salwaatullahe alaykum wa alla arwaahekum wa alla aj-saa-dekum wa alla aj-saa-mekum wa alla shahedekum wa alla ghaaebekum wa alla dhaaherekum wa alla baatenekum, be abee anta wa ummi yabna rasoolillahe, be abee anta wa ummi yaa Abaa Abdillaahe, laqad a-zomatir-radhiyyato wa jallaatil musibato beka alayna wa alla Jamie ahlis-samavate wal ardhe, fala-a-nallaho ummatan asarjat wa ajomat wa tahaiyyat le qetaleka yaa mawlaee yaa Aba Abdillaahe,qasadto haramaka wa atayto ela mash-hadek,as-alullah bishshanil-ladhee laka endahu wa bil mahallil-ladhee laka ladayhe,ay-yosalli alla muhammadiw wa aale Muhammad,wa ann yaj-alnee ma-aa-kum feed-duniya wal aakherah

Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Adam the choice of Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Noah the prophet of Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Abraham the intimate friend of Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Moses the chatterer with Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Jesus the spirit of Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of Muhammad the most beloved by Allah. Peace be upon you, O inheritor of the Commander of the Faithful, peace be upon him. Peace be upon you, O son of Muhammad the well-chosen Prophet. Peace be upon you, O son of Ali the well-pleased. Peace be upon you, O son of Fatimah the luminous lady. Peace be upon you, O son of Khadijah the grand lady. Peace be upon you, O vengeance of Allah, son of His vengeance, and the unavenged so far. I bear witness that you performed the prayers, defrayed the poor-rate, enjoined the right, forbade the wrong and obeyed Allah and His Messenger until death came upon you. So, may Allah curse the people who killed you! May Allah curse the people who persecuted you! May Allah curse the people who were pleased when they had heard of that! O’ my Master, O’ Abu- Abdillah! I bear witness that you were light in the sublime loins and purified wombs; the impurities of the Ignorance Era could not object you to filth nor could it dress you its murky clothes. I also bear witness that you are one of the mainstays of the religion and the supports of the faithful believers. I also bear witness that you are the God-fearing, pious, pleased, immaculate, guide, and well-guided Imam. And (I bear witness) that the Imams from your progeny are the spokesmen of piety, the signs of guidance, the firmest handle (of Islam), and the decisive argument against the inhabitants of the world. And I call Allah, His angels, His Prophets, and His Messenger to witness for me that I believe in you all and in your return, I have full confidence in the laws of my religion and in the seals of my deeds, my heart is at peace with you all, and all my affairs are based on your commands. May Allah’s benedictions be on your souls, your bodies, your forms, the present and the absent from you, and the apparent and the invisible from you. My father and mother be sacrificed for you, O son of the Messenger of Allah! My father and mother be sacrificed for you, O Aba Abdillah! Extremely terrible was the calamity and astounding is the misfortune that you suffered upon us and upon all the inhabitants of the heavens and the earth. Therefore, Allah may curse the people who saddled up, gave rein to their horses, and prepared themselves to kill you. O my Master, O Aba Abdillah! I moved towards your sanctuary and came to your shrine beseeching Allah in the name of the standing that you enjoy with Him and the position that you occupy with Him to send blessings on Muhammad and on the offspring of Muhammad and to keep me with you in this world and in the Hereafter.

Address in Arabic to facilitate your movements :

مشهد السيدة نفيسة أو مسجد السيدة نفيسة في منطقة السيدة نفيسة بالقاهرة

Sayeda Nafissa was born in 145 AH in Mecca and is a descendant of Imam Hassan (A). She married Ishak al-Mu'taman, one of the sons of Imam as-Sadiq (A) at the age of 15, and she had 2 children. She was an extremely pious woman who had made more than 30 times the pilgrimage to Mecca on foot ; She said: 'I am ashamed to go to meet my Lord without having walked for it'. She prayed at night and fasted during the day, she was very rich but she used her wealth to help the poor. She had learned the whole Quran by heart and she died while reciting it. Her piety was so famous that people came from afar to seek her blessings and she was highly respected by the people of Cairo. She died in the year 208 AH, during the month of Ramadhan, and was buried at home in Egypt, in the grave that she had dug with her own hands to remind her of death.50

50: Nasik al-Tawarikh, volume 3, page 120 ; Muntaha al-Amal, volume 2, page 1418

Address in Arabic to facilitate your movements :

یقع مقام مالك الأشتر فی منتصف شارع القلج بحى المرج بشرق القاهرة، ويعرفه الأهالى بالسيد العجمى

Malik al-Ashtar was the most faithful companion of Imam Ali (A), he always accompanied him. Imam Ali (A) said, 'Malik is for me what I was for the Prophet (S)'.

He was a man who embodied passion, dedication and loyalty to Islam. He was born about 30 years before Hijrah in Yemen. He accepted Islam while still in Yemen without seeing the Holy Prophet (S). If Imam Ali (A) became the 4th Caliph, it is thanks to the efforts of Malik al-Ashtar.

Imam Ali (A) appointed Mohamad ibn Abu Bakr as governor of Egypt but after the Siffin war, the situation in Egypt was worrying, Imam Ali (A) then chose Malik al-Ashtar for the aid of Mohamad ibn Abu Bakr. When Mu'awiya's spies informed him that Malik al-Ashtar was about to become governor of Egypt, Mu'awiyah proposed to an Egyptian to poison Malik al-Ashtar, in exchange for which he would be exempted taxes. When Malik al-Ashtar arrived in Egypt, the person invited him to eat at home and made him drink poisoned honey. Malik al-Ashtar died as a result of the poisoning and it was a great loss for Imam Ali (A).

Address in Arabic to facilitate your movements :

مقام محمد بن آبی بکر، قریه میت دمسیس المنصوره، شارع الجاز،۱۰۰ کیلومتر من القاهره

There is about 100 km of travel from Cairo, it is best to leave early in the morning to avoid traffic jams.

Mohammad ibn Abu Bakr was among the companions of the Holy Prophet (S). He was born during the year of the Farewell pilgrimage of the Holy Prophet (s) to Medina. He is the son of the 1st caliph, and Asma bint Umays. He lost his father when he was 2 years old. After the death of Abu Bakr, Asma married Imam Ali (A). Mohammad was raised and educated by Imam Ali (A) who loved him as his own son. He was very close to Imam Ali (A). In year 36 AH, Imam Ali (A) chose him as governor of Egypt. He died during the month of Safar in year 38 AH by Mu'awiyah's army. Imam Ali (A) cried a lot when he heard of his death.51

51: Sharh Nahj al-Balagha, Ibn Abi al-Hadid, volume 6, page 88 ; Assbab al-Ashraf, volume 2, page 393 ; Majalis al-Mo’minin, volume 1, page 277

children.name: Ziyarat to the Prophets (S) in general, 'The 1st ziyārat al-jami'at'

text.html:
السَّلامُ عَلَى أَوْلِياءِ اللَّهِ وَأَصْفِيائِهِ ,السَّلامُ عَلَى أُمَناءِ اللَّهِ وَأَحِبَّائِهِ , السَّلامُ عَلَى أَنْصارِ اللَّهِ وَخُلَفائِهِ , السَّلامُ عَلَى مَحالِّ مَعْرِفَةِ اللَّهِ , السَّلامُ عَلَى مَساكِنِ ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ , السَّلامُ عَلَى مُظْهِرِي أَمْرِ اللَّهِ وَنَهْيِهِ,السَّلامُ عَلَى الدُّعاةِ إِلَى اللَّهِ , السَّلامُ عَلَى الْمُسْتَقِرِّينَ فِي مَرْضاةِ اللَّهِ , السَّلامُ عَلَى الْمُخْلِصِينَ فِي طاعَةِ اللَّهِ , السَّلامُ عَلَى الأَدِلاَّءِ عَلَى اللَّهِ ,السَّلامُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مَنْ وَالاهُمْ فَقَدْ والَى اللَّهَ وَمَنْ عاداهُمْ فَقَدْ عادَى اللَّهَ وَمَنْ عَرَفَهُمْ فَقَدْ عَرَفَ اللَّهَ وَمَنْ جَهِلَهُمْ فَقَدْ جَهِلَ اللَّهَ , وَمَنِ اعْتَصَمَ بِهِمْ فَقَدِ اعْتَصَمَ بِاللَّهِ وَمَنْ تَخَلَّى مِنْهُمْ فَقَدْ تَخَلَّى مِنَ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ ,وَأُشْهِدُ اللَّهَ أَنِّي سِلْمٌ لِمَنْ سالَمْتُمْ وَحَرْبٌ لِمَنْ حارَبْتُمْ مُؤْمِنٌ بِسِرِّكُمْ وَعَلانِيَتِكُمْ مُفَوِّضٌ فِي ذلِكَ كُلِّهِ إِلَيْكُمْ , لَعَنَ اللَّهُ عَدُوَّ الِ مُحَمَّدٍ مِنَ الْجِنِّ وَالإْنْسِ وَأَبْرَأُ إِلَى اللَّهِ مِنْهُمْ وَصَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَالِهِ.

assalaamu a’laa awliyaaa-illaahi wa as’fiyaaa-ihi
assalaamu a’laa umanaaa-illaahi wa ah’ibbaaa-ihi
assalaamu a’laa ans’aarillaahi wa khulafaaa-ihi
assalaamu a’laa mah’aalli maa’-rifatillaah
assalaamu a’laa masaakini dhi’ikrillaah
assalaamu a’laa mudh’hiree amrillaah wa nahyihi
assalaamu a’lad dua-a’ati ilallaah
assalaamu a’lal mustaqirreena fee mardh”aatillaah
assalaamu a’lal mukhlis’eena fee t’aa-a’tillaah
assalaamu a’lal a-dillaaa-i a’lallaah
assalaamu a’lallad’eena man walaahum faqad waalallaah wa man a’adaahum faqad a’adallaah wa man a’rafahum faqad a’rafallaah wa man jahilahum faqad jahilallaah wa mania’-tas’ama bihim faqadia’-tas’ama billaah wa man takhallaa minhum faqad takhallaa minallaahi a’zza wa jall wa ush-hidullaaha annee silmun liman saalamtum wa h’arbun liman h’aarabtum muwminun bisirrikum wa a’laaniyatikum mufawwidh”un fee d’aalika kullihi ilaykum la-a’nallaahu a’duwwa aAli muh’ammad minal jinni wal ins wa abra-u ilallaahi minhum wa s’allallaahu a’laa Muhammadin wa aalehi

Peace be on the sincere believers of Allah, who are also His exceptional favourites, peace be on the trustees of Allah, who are also His dearest friends, peace be on the supporters of Allah, who are also His representatives, peace be on the medium of the awareness of Allah, peace be on the centre of the remembrance of Allah, peace be on (you) who make clear His lawful and unlawful, peace be on (you) who invite mankind unto Allah, peace be on (you) who occupy and supervise the centre through which Allah's pleasure is routed, peace be on (you)( who truly obey and serve Allah, peace be on (you) who show the right path leading unto Allah, peace be on (you) whom who befriends, in fact, makes friends with Allah, whom who opposes, in fact, runs counter to Allah, whom who understands, in fact, recognises Allah, whom who passes over, in fact, ignores Allah, whom who defends, in fact, supports Allah, whom who so deserts, in fact, Abandons the Almighty Allah. I request Allah to vouch for me that I make peace with those who are at peace with you, I make war upon those who declare war on you, I believe in that which is concealed and in that which is evident concerning you, I give total control of my affairs in your hands. May Allah curse the enemies of 'Aal-e-Muhammad', be they jinn or men, I disconnect all links with them and turn to Allah, Allah's blessings be on Muhammad and on his children.

children.name: Ziyarat to the daughters of Imams (A)

text.html:
اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ جَدِّكِ الْمُصْطَفى‏، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى اَبيكِ الْمُرْتَضَى الرِّضا، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيِّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ خَديجَةَ اُمِّ سَيِّدَةِ نِساءِ الْعالَمينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى‏ فاطِمَةَ اُمِّ الْائِمَّةِ الطاهِرينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ، وَبُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزَّاخِرَةِ، وَشُفَعائى فِى الْآخِرَةِ، وَاَوْلِيائى عِندَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ الَى الْعِظامِ الناخِرَةِ، اَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقِّ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكِ اَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الشَّريفَةُ الطاهِرَةُ الْكَريمَةُ، اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لا الهَ الَّا اللَّهُ، وَاَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ، وَاَنَّ عَليّاً وَليُّهُ وَمُجْتَباهُ، وَاَنَّ الْاِمامَةَ فى وُلْدِهِ الى‏ يَوْمِ الدينِ، نَعْلَمُ ذلِكَ عِلْمَ اْليَقينِ، وَنَحْنُ لِذلِكَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفى نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ.

Assalaamo alaa jaddekil mustafaa, assalaamo alaa abeekil murtadhee ar redhaa, assalaamo alaa as-sayyedaynil hasane wal husayne, assalaamo alaa khadijata umme sayyedate nesaail aalamina, assalaamo alaa faatemata ummil a-immatit taaherina, assalaamo alaa an-nofusil faakherate, wa johuril olumiz zaakherate, wa shofa’aaee feel aakherate, wa awliyaaee inda awdir roohe alal edhaame an-naakherate, a-immatil khalqe wa wulaatil haqqin, assalaamo a’layke ayyatohan nafso ash-shareefato at-taaheratul kareemato, ash-hado an laa elaaha illallaaho, wa anna muhammadan abdohu wa mustafaao, wa anna alayyan waliyyohu wa mujtabaao, wa annal imaamata fee wuldehi alaa yawmiddine, na’a-lamo dhaaleka ilmal yaqeene, wa nahno le dhaaleka mu’ataqeduna wafee nasrehim mujtaheduna.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, peace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace be upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of creatures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat (Leadership of Ummah) is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

children.name: Ziyarat to the children of Imams (A)

text.html:
Sayed Ali ibn Ta'us (may God be pleased with him) reported in Misbah az-Za'ir, 2 Ziyarats with whom we visit the children of the Imam (A).

The first Ziyarat to the children of Imams

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها السَّيّدُ الزَّكِيُّ الطَّاهِرُ الْوَلِيُّ وَالدَّاعِي الْحَفِيُّ ، اَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ قُلْتَ حَقَّاً وَنَطَقْتَ حَقّاً وَصِدْقاً وَدَعَوْتَ إِلَى مَوْلايَ وَمَوْلاكَ عَلانِيَةً وَسِرّاً ، فازَ مُتَّبِعُكَ وَنَجا مُصَدّقُكَ وَخابَ وَخَسِرَ مُكَذّبُكَ وَالْمُتَخَلِّفُ عَنْكَ ، إشْهَدْ لِي بِهذِهِ الشَّهَادَةِ لأِكُونَ مِنَ الْفائِزِينَ بِمَعْرِفَتِكَ وَطاعَتِكَ وَتَصْدِيقِكَ وَاتّباعِكَ ، وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يا سَيّدِي وَابْنَ سَيّدِي اَنْتَ بابُ اللَّهِ الْمُؤْتَى وَالْمَأْخُوذُ عَنْهُ اَتَيْتُكَ زائِراً وَحاجاتِي لَكَ مُسْتَوْدِعاً وَها اَنَا ذا اَسْتَوْدِعُكَ دِينِي وَاَمانَتِي وَخَواتِيمَ عَمَلِي وَجَوامِعَ اَمَلِي إِلَى مُنْتَهَى اَجَلِي وَالسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ

Assalamo alayka ayyohas sayyeduz zakiyut taheerul waliyyo wad da’eeyil hafeeyo, ash'hado annak qul'taa haqqan wa nataq'taa haqqan wa sidqan wa da’aw'taa ela mawlaya wa mawlak aala niyatan wa sirra, faaz muttabeok wa naja mosaddeqok wa khab wa khaser mokadhebok wal motakhallefo ankaa, ish'had lee be hadeheesh shahadate le akun menal faizeen be marefatek wa taa'tek wa tas'deeqek wat'tabayek was salamo alayka ya sayyidi wab'na sayyidi antaa babul'llahil mowta wal makhuzoo an'hu. Atay'tok zaeran wa hajatee lak mus'taw dean waha aana zaa astawdi‘ook deeni wa amanatee wa khawateema aamalee wa jawameaa aamali elaa munta'haa aajali, was salamo alyek wa rahmtullahe waba rakatooh.

Peace be upon you, O the noble, pure, purified, beloved and a prudent preacher. I bear witness that verily you told aright and spoke truth and invited to my and your lord publicly and secretly. Successful is one who obeyed you, survived who testified you while disappointed and lost who disapproved and opposed you. Be the witness of my acknowledgment of you, my compliance, ratification and obedience of you. Peace be upon you, O my lord and son of my lord. You are the door from where (benefit) is provided and taken. I have come to you for pilgrimage and ask you for my needs. Fulfil my needs of religion, duty, (better) costs of my deeds and (fulfil) all my hopes before my death. Peace, mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you.

The second Ziyarat to the children of Imams

اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى جَدّكَ الْمُصْطَفَى اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى اَبِيكَ الْمُرْتَضَى الرِّضا اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى السَّيّدَيْنِ الْحَسَنِ وَالْحُسَيْنِ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى خَدِيجَةَ أُمِّ سَيّدَةِ نِساءِ الْعالَمِينَ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى فاطِمَةَ أُمِّ الأَئِمَّةِ الطَّاهِرِينَ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى النُّفُوسِ الْفاخِرَةِ بُحُورِ الْعُلُومِ الزَّاخِرَةِ شُفَعائِي فِي الآخِرَةِ وَأَوْلِيائِي عِنْدَ عَوْدِ الرُّوحِ إِلَى الْعِظامِ النَّاخِرَةِ أَئِمَّةِ الْخَلْقِ وَوُلاةِ الْحَقّ اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّها الشَّخْصُ الشَّرِيفُ الطَّاهِرُ الْكَرِيمُ أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَمُصْطَفاهُ وَأَنَّ عَلِيّاً وَلِيُّهُ وَمُجْتَبَاهُ وَأَنَّ الإْمامَةَ فِي وُلْدِهِ إِلَى يَوْمِ الدّينِ نَعْلَمُ ذلِكَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ وَنَحْنُ لِذلِكَ مُعْتَقِدُونَ وَفِي نَصْرِهِمْ مُجْتَهِدُونَ .

Assalaamo alla jaddeka al-mustafi, assalaamo alla abeeka al-murtadhee ar-redhaa, assalaamo alla as-sayyedayne al-Hasane wal Husayne, assalaamo alla khadijata umme sayyedate nesaail aalameen, assalaamo alla faatemata ummil a-immatit taahereen, assalaamo alla an-nofuse al-faakherate, bohuril olume az-zaakherate, shofa aaee fee al kherate wa awliyaaee inda awde ar-roohe elal ezaame an-naakherate, a-immate al-khalqe wa woolaate al-haqqe, assalaamo alayka ayyohash shakhsho ash-sharifo at-taahero al-kareemo, ash-hado an laa elaha illallaaho, wa anna Muhammadan abdohu wa mustafaao, wa anna Aliyyan waliyyohu wa mujtabaaho,wa annal imaamata fee wuldehi ela yawmiddeene, na’alamu dhaleka ilmal yaqeene, wa nahno le dhaleka moa’taqedoona wa fee nasrehim moojtahedun.

Peace be upon your grandfather Mustafa, peace be upon your father Murtaza Al- Reza, prace be upon masters Hasan and Hussain. Peace be upon Khadija the mother of the leader of women of all the worlds. Peace br upon Fatima mother of immaculate Imams; peace be upon the gratified souls, the deep oceans of knowledge and my intercessors on Doomsday, my powers when the spirit returns to bones, (you are) Imams of ctratures and powers of righteousness. Peace be upon you the honest, pure and gracious soul. I bear witness that there is no God but Allah, and that Muhammad is his servant and his choice. Ali is his representative and selected and Imamat is in his family till Doomsday. We know that for sure and we have firm faith in it and we struggle to assist them.

children.name: Ziyarat of the companions of the Holy Prophet (S)

text.html:
اَلسَّلامُ عَلى رَسُولِ اللهِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ اللهِ خاتَمِ النَّبِيّينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلى اَميرِ الْمُؤْمِنينَ سَيِّدِ الْوَصِيّينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَى الْاَئِمَّةِ الْمَعْصُومينَ الرّاشِدينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلـَى الْمَلائِكَةِ الْمُقَرَّبينَ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا صاحِبَ رَسُولِ اللهِ الْاَمينِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا مُودَعَ اَسْرارِ السّادَةِ الْمَيامينِ، اَلسَّلامُ عَلَيْکَ يا مَنْ اُوتِیَ الْعِلْمَ بِاَسْمَاءِ الْمُنَافِقِینَ، اَشْهَدُ اَنَّکَ اَطَعْتَ اللهَ كَما اَمَرَکَ، وَاتَّبَعْتَ الرَّسُولَ كَما نَدَبَکَ، وَتَوَلَّيْتَ خَليفَتَهُ كَما اَلْزَمَکَ، وَدَعَوْتَ اِلَى الْاِهْتِمامِ بِذُرِّيَّتِهِ كَما وَقَفَکَ، وَعَلِمْتَ الْحَقَّ يَقيناً وَاعْتَمَدْتَهُ، كَما اَمَرَکَ، وَاَقَمْتَ الصَّلاةَ، وَ آتَيْتَ الزَّكاةَ، وَ اَمَرْتَ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ، وَنَهَيْتَ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ، وَاَدَّيْتَ الْاَمانَةَ، وَنَصَحْتَ لِلهِ وَلِرَسُولِهِ، صَلَّى اللهُ عَلى رُوحِکَ الطَّيِّبِ، وَ جَسَدِکَ الطّاهِرِ، وَاَلْحَقَنا بِکَ وَبِمَحَلَّةِ السّادَةِ الْمَيامينِ، وَجَمَعَنا مَعَهُمْ بِجِوارِهِمْ فى جَنّاتِ النَّعيِمِ، وَلا جَعَلَهُ اللهُ آخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنَّا لِزِیَارَتِکَ والسَّلامُ وَرَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكاتُهُ.

Assalaamo alaa rasoolilaahe muhammadibne abdillaahe khaatamin nabiyyin, assalaamo alaa ameeril momineena sayyadil wasiyyina, assalaamo alal aimmatil ma’a-soomina ar raashedina, assalaamo alaa al malaaekatil muqarrabina, assalaamo a’layka yaa saaheba rasoolillaahil ameene,assalaamo alayka yaa moda’a asraaris saadatil mayaameene, assalaamo alayka yaa man uteya al ilme be asmaail munaafeqina, ash-hado annaka ata’a-tallaaha kamaa amaraka, wat-taba’atar rasoola kamaa nadabaka watawallayta khalifatahu kamaa al zamaka, wada’awta ilal ehtimaame be dhurriyatehi kamaa wa qafaka, wa alimtal haqqa yaqeenan wa’atamad’tahu, kamaa amraka, wa aqamtas salaata, wa aataytaz zakaata, wa amratal bil ma’a-roofe, wa nahayta anal munkare, wa addayatal amaanata, wa nasahta lillaahe wa le rasoolehi, sallallaaho alaa rooheka at-tayyebe, wa jasadeka at-taahere, wa alhaqanaa beka wa be mahallatis saadate al mayaamine, wa jama’anaa ma’ahum be jiwwaarehim fee jannatin naeeme, wa laa ja’alahullaaho aakhiral ahde minnaa ziyaarateka wassalaamo wa rahmatullaahe wa barakaatohu.

Peace be upon the Messenger of Allah Muhammad bin Abdullah, the Seal of the Prophets. Peace be upon the Emir of believers and the master of successors! Peace be upon the guided, infallible imams. Peace be upon the angels, close to Allah, peace be upon you the companion of the faithful messenger of Allah. Peace be upon you who is given the secrets of gentlemen. Peace be upon you who knew the names of hypocrites. I bear witness that you obeyed Allah as He commanded you and followed the Prophet as he asked you and showed loyalty to his successor as he took promise from you and you called people as your duty towards the significance of his progeny and you recognized the right (path) with surety and trusted upon it as you were required. You offered the prayers, gave alms (zakat), you enjoined the right, forbade the wrong, and did your duty, advised for Allah and His prophet. Peace be upon your pure soul and body. May Allah join us with you and gentle leaders by his mercy and sympathy and gather us with them in their neighborhood in the gardens of blessings. May Allah not decide this time of our visit to be the last! Peace, mercy and blessing of Allah be upon you!
